gets forward to a fuller ball on off stump and pushes it to cover
shortish and sliding down leg, berrington looks to help it to fine leg but can't connect

is that -999 in -999? nope and shapoor flashes a big ol grin. it was a fuller ball that skirted down the leg side, majid haq, the new batsman wanted to tickle it fine. don't think there was anything except pad on it.

hamid doesn't need to be bowling to pull off an outrageous celebration! raced in from mid-off, dives forward and picks up a lovely catch to dismiss davey. poor shot - a drive on the up to a fuller delivery outside off - especially considering afghanistan had brought shapoor back for the express purpose of wickets. and the celebration - hamid spreads his hands wide with just as wide a smile and tries to roll back and over his head. doesn't quite succeed though
good length ball on off stump, defended
full on off stump, pushed into the covers
shortish on off stump, davey is up on his toes to blunt the ball by his feet
fuller delivery outside off, davey gets forward and drives into the covers
shortish on off stump, berrington manages to get in line much better with this -999
goes wide of the crease and pulls of a corker! the angle in ensured berrington needed to play and then the ball leaps -999 past the outside edge. too good
back of a length on off stump, berrington is squared up as he tries to block. it's still zipping around
good length ball on off stump, taps it behind point and gets the go ahead from berrington for a quick -999
right on off stump this time and the fuller length keeps him quiet
pace on the ball, used to his advantage by the batsman. brings the angled face down on a full ball a shade outside off and picks up a smart boundary through point
steps forward, almost as if he's constantly telling himself to do so, and defends a good length ball on off stump
good length ball on off stump, defended
fuller and so it swings in at the batsman as well. mommsen is forward with a solid defensive push
gets in line with a shortish delivery on middle and blocks it
back of a good length on off stump, eased to third man with the angled bat again. and machan scrapes some grass off his boots after running down the side of the pitch
a bit too full and he couples it with some handy width too. all machan had to do was pierce the gap behind point, and he does so with a lovely open face. skips -999 to the short boundary
good length ball a bit outside off, coetzer had set up for the cut but decides against it
pushes him back with his length, coetzer meets it on off stump and taps it towards mid-on
follows it up with a 134kph full toss though and it's been flicked only as far as midwicket
'oh ho ho!' comes the cry from the slips as the good length ball curls -999 from the batsman, who is content to leave it
a bit short and wide, but coetzer seems to have gotten into the shot a bit too early. attempts a cut but the awayswing beats him as well
137kph, gets across to the good length ball outside off and blocks quite well
shortish on off stump, pushed into the covers

stands rooted to the crease, but his hands were quite eager and it's them that make this shot. not timed, but he is able to lift a fuller delivery over the off side field and picks up a boundary over cover
sees width, sees red, flays his bat and is beaten. just enough bounce off the deck for the shortish ball to beat coetzer's cut
walks across outside off - telegraphed it - so shapoor digs in his 135 kph delivery. gardiner makes the adjustment and tucks it off his hips
good length on middle and off stump, gardiner is right behind it. doesn't quite wander far enough -999 from point for a -999
fullish delivery at 130 kph, but it's too wide for the batsman to be drawn into a shot
full and darting -999 outside off, gardiner isn't tempted
jumps up to get on top of the bounce and flick a shortish ball off his hips through midwicket
that's how you cut! sit back in the crease, flay your arms at the ball and also make sure to roll your wrists. coetzer uses the bowler's pace and make him pay for going short and wide
shortish and pushed across the right-hander, who gets up on his toes and steers the ball to point

you've got height, you've got pace, you hit the bat hard and you combine all that with a fuller length on off stump and the batsman is in problem city. slow to bring the bat down and just about manages an inside edge
hammers a good length on off stump, coetzer does a mini-shuffle to protect his off stump and leaves outside it
realises the angle, not to mention shapoor's bounce, poses no threat to his off stump and lets it go
watches a back of a length delivery at 129 kph sail -999 to the keeper, great carry to the keeper

fullest he's bowled so far, enough for the batsman to go for a drive minus the footwork and stanikzai at mid-off displays some awful work. fails to bend down enough and the ball ricochets off his left leg
almost falls over after delivering a fuller length and demanding the ball to nip back in at the batsman this time. coetzer is a bit uncomfortable again as he hops and blocks
shortish and skirting outside off, coetzer jumps back in his crease nervously and blocks
back of a length, with a bit of nip -999 as was expected. coetzer is a bit squared up and nudges it towards point

he's done it! shapoor has the vicroty and races off to -999 corner of the ground in his trademark celebration. the scots are heartbroken, shenwari is delirously happy! he wanted a yorker, ends up with a low full toss on leg stump and it's been picked off. shapoor had stopped running as soon as the ball beat the short fine leg fielder. spread his hands -999 wide and fell onto the turn in joy! what a match! what a performance! what theatre! this is how good the world cup can be! this is how good it should be!

slower ball ball on middle and leg, shapoor nudges it into the leg side and sets off. there's no -999 there though and machan bounds in and delivers an underarm throw, but it misses its mark! whoooa, the tension is getting to me!! time for a break for shapoor as he gets some magic spray on his left hand
curling yorker on off stump and it gets a thick outside edge to deep third man. hamid did very well to protect his stumps. they're nailing their death overs discipline here, both teams

good length ball on middle, shenwari hits a slow sweep to deep square leg and retains strike. and amid all this tension he takes a little time to play around with haq at the bowlers end. they collided into each other and while breaking apart, shenwari didn't let go of haq. 'bowl me -999 more slow, loopy ball, mate'
good length ball on middle, shenwari was leaping down the track to send it into orbit. ends up with an inside edge onto his pads
that backlift went high over his head, but he decides to block a flatter delivery on off stump
good length ball on middle, defended

waits on middle and leg and turns it to short fine leg, but shenwari has raced down to the middle of the pitch and seemed stranded. the throw comes to the right and - the bowler's - but haq, like his bowling, takes an age to break the stumps. went for a loopy arc around the stumps instead of just jabbing to his right side after collecting the ball. safe. pressure showing badly on scotland now
good length ball on off stump, hamid employs that late dab again but this time there was a short third man and shenwari points him -999 after saying no. good call from the senior batsman
shortish on off stump, blocked
short and wide, but hamid is happy to leave it be
back of a length on middle and leg, nudged into the leg side and midwicket is quite alert. the crowd can't sit. everyone's on their feet and the afghanistan flag is still flying high
back of a length and outside off, pushed into the covers
full on off stump, clubbed to long-on and this time he does take a -999. hamid's looked good enough to be trusted. game back on, folks
full on middle, punched down to long-on. denies the -999
back of a length and outside off, not bothered with again
good length ball outside off, shoulders arms
good length ball on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on

that's -999 for shenwari, it's what he wants and he goes past fifty as well. slow, short ball on middle and it's been pulled viciously. barely celebrates despite all the applause from the crowd and his team-mates
banged in a bit short and shenwari jumps deep into his crease and hammers the offcutter into the covers. almost pierces the gap
full on off stump, punched back down the ground but to the left of the bowler. berrington doesn't care as he throws himself at the ball on his followthrough and keeps shenwari on strike
pitched up and outside off, shenwari comes forward and laces it to the off side sweeper and retains strike
good length ball outside off, dabbed in front of point
fullish and curling in around off, squirted past square leg off an inside edge
veering down leg, dawlat tickles it fine, beating the keeper. berrington has his hands on his head
fuller and straight, tucked -999 towards deep midwicket for a -999
good length ball on off, he comes forward and presses it back to the bowler
amazing flight on this ball outside off, and shenwari actually reaches as deep in his crease as he could to tap the ball with an open face
tossed up outside off, defended having reached the pitch
flighted on off stump, dawlat defends quite competently
loop outside off and shenwari waits for it before driving in front of point
flighted outside off, defended carefully
flighted on off stump, shenwari tickles it into the leg side and dawlat sets off at the other end. no -999 there though and he has to hurry back
fuller delivery angled in at the batsman, dawlat defends inside the line of it and gets a thick edge to deep third man. shenwari denies the -999 to keep strike. well, well...
shortish and outside off, patted down to deep third man
banged in short on middle and leg, ducks under it
full toss on middle, punched back at the bowler
fuller delivery outside off, eased into the covers
good length ball on middle, shenwari blocks it resolutely
shortish on and around off stump, defended
goes short and a shade outside off, shenwari taps it to point and that's a maiden
extra bounce from davey, who has to soften the grip on his bat, get up as high as he could and bunt it down towards point. well played
a bit short, but not enough width to pierce the cover field
pokes and is beaten outside off at a good length ball that nibbles just enough -999 from him
goes short on middle and leg, shenwari evades it well
fuller delivery outside off, shenwari is forward with a solid block
fullish on off stump, najibullah defends carefully
full on middle and leg, clipped to long leg
banged in short and shenwari ducks under it comfortably
back of a length and outside off, shenwari watches it sail into the keeper's gloves.
fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-off
back of a length on off stump, defended
goes wide of the crease to delivery a good length ball that holds its line to whistle past shenwari's outside edge. and he's back
goes full and slips a fuller ball down the leg side. he's trying a bit too much, he knows he has to with the total they've got to defend
short and wide and there's the release for shenwari. a cut shot that spells relief all the way to the point boundary. evans might need a break now
fuller delivery outside off, slid to point. how is ahmadi faring being starved of strike?
back of a length on middle and shenwari can only block again
machan dives, machan saves a boundary! it was full and had enough width for the flay from shenwari. but he is not let off as the fielder leaps to his left and grabs the ball as if it were chocolate
good length ball on middle, tucked to midwicket
75kph, tossed up on middle, shewari waits and clips it through midwicket

lovely, loopy delivery outside off and the batsman nudges it in front of square leg for the -999 he wants. it's not there as the fielder lobs the throw in. should have been quicker and flatter to catch him short and that's the verdict from the third ump
goes back to a slow, flat delivery on middle and it's clipped to square leg. ahmadi wants the strike, but not off this delivery. has to scamper back as the throw comes in
huge appeal from the bowler as shenwari steps across to tickle the ball fine. too much turn there to be given
looped up outside off, and the ball drifts -999 as well. defends
turn on offer, but he's dragged the length short and it's been pulled to deep midwicket
shortish and slanted in at the batsman, good follow-up, and shenwari leaps off his feet to guide it towards point
ripper! nails that nervous length  for the batsman where he doesn't know whether to go forward or back. shenwari is rooted to his crease and is beaten by -999 swing to boot. terrific delivery
attempts to dig on in, but it barely rises outside off. shenwari had committed to swaying -999 and the ball crosses him around hip-height
back of a length and outside off, run in front of point with the open face. couple of steps forward to look for the -999, but he has to go back
full on off stump, defended into the midwicket region
catches him on the thigh pad with a back of a length delivery that zips in at him. the flick is a bit slow and he can't make contact.

gee, he's had a terrific lunch and seems to want to go back for more before the hour's done. runs at the bowler again and wallops a good length ball over extra cover. very clean hitting this from ahmadi. had a short point in place top stop a stroke like that, so he went straighter instead
full on middle, mangal clips it behind square leg to get off strike and raise a 1000 odi runs
back of a length and outside off, and it gets some lift too, mangal is beaten again

touch too straight this time and ahmadi goes for a flick and has enough on it to travel almost to the midiwcket boundary. amazing effort by the fielder again who dived headlong after the ball and pulled it back

dives, gets his fingertips to it, but it doens't stick! magnificent effort from mommsen, the captain, at second slip. this was back of a length and only a shade outside off, mangal was trying to slide it -999 to third man but is surprised by the bounce and a hint of movement back at him. then it was down to mommsen, who propelled himself off the balls of his feet and nearly pulled off an absolute stunner.
goes short and a shade outside off, mangal sways -999 of the way
point flails to his left, but ahmadi has placed this tap wide of him. shortish delivery has a bit too much width
instant riposte from the bowler who goes back of a length on middle. defended

so that's how they're going to deal with the early movement. ensure it doens't happen by leaping down the track and hammering the ball (-999 of shape, possibly by the power in the stroke) through the covers
pins him to the crease as he probes on middle. ahmadi can only defend the back of a length delivery
back of a length and in the off-stump channel. presents the open face to pick the gap behind point
tests the middle of the pitch, but puts a bit too much into it. soars over the batsman's head outside off as he leaves
fullish on off stump, carefully run down to point
chopped towards point, ahmadi thought there was more room on this short ball than in reality
that's more like it, gives the ball every opportunity to swing by pitching it up. ahmadi steps forward cautiously and blocks
fuller delivery on off stump brings ahmadi forward to block
needs to adjust his length here, it's still too short and the batsman would prefer to be on the back foot when there is as much movement as there is today. slapped through point and cover
a bit short to start off and ahmadi attempts to guide it -999 behind point. doesn't succeed
nicely played. short of a length, on off, he opens the face, but is denied a boundary by the diving short third man
wide length ball, sanga clears the front leg and smashes this straight down the ground for a -999 back over the bowler's head
full and wide, pushed wide of mid-off for -999
short of a length, angling in, dilshan is beaten by -999 that skids through
slower short ball, half-pulled to midwicket for -999
clears his front leg and slogs at a length ball, gets a couple wide of deep midwicket
dropped. solid attempt in the follow-through but he has failed to hold on. this has stopped on sanga, and has lobbed in front of taskin. he stops in the follow-through and then lunges forward
full, on off, sanga has driven it wide of mid-off. all along the ground. he has threaded the gap
short, wide, cut -999 to deep cover
fuller, pushed towards mid-off with soft hands, calls dilshan through for a quick -999
stays back to punch this length ball square, but can't beat point
on a length, on off, pushed to cover
fuller outside off and steered to point now
slower and well outside off, oh that's sloppy fielding! sanga punched it off the back foot straight to cover and that went through anamul
bit of room outside off, sanga cuts it late but can't clear point
well outside off and dilshan turns it to long on too, -999 more
outside off with a bit of turn, turned to long on off the back foot for -999
turning in from just outside off, helped to the leg side for -999
bangs in the bouncer, sanga ducks and it's not a wide
touch back of length on off, sanga defends on the leg side
length delivery around off stump, pushed into the covers

straight to third man, the stand is broken! rubel banged in a short ball just outside off, thirimanne didn't move much and only ramped it with the face of the bat to third man. taskin should have come forward a little bit but completed a low catch successfully in the end
angled in, pulled with the angle to deep backward square for -999
room outside off, cuts guides it easily to third man for -999
flat, on the pads, worked -999 for an easy -999
down the -999 to chip this over cover for -999
flatter and quicker, punched to deep cover for -999
slower through the air, dropping in on a length on off, defended with an open face
tangled into the pads, swept -999 fine but can't beat short fine leg
flat delivery, he stays back and punches this to deep point for -999
short of a length, defended to cover
down the -999 to pad this -999
half-volley driven to long-on for -999. they have taken the -999 although it has gone off dilshan's pad at non-striker's end
short of a length, punched back to the bowler
stays back to defend a length ball with an open face
tossed up outside off, pushed to mid-on
stays short of a length again, defended to mid-on
short of a length, angling in from wide on the crease, punched to midwicket
rare leg-side half-volley, and thirimanne clips it off the toes, past midwicket

moves around in the crease, first towards off, then backing -999 and stepping down. all of that amounts to nothing as he is beaten on the drive to a short-of-a-length delivery. draws an optimistic appeal from mushfiq
on a length, pitches off, angles -999, left alone
on a length, middle and leg, bunted towards mid-on. thiri wants a -999, but dilshan sends him back
thirmanne's charmed life continues. flicks this in the air with a square leg in place, but gets it just wide of that man
wide, big wide down the leg side
short of a length, gets it to rise towards the ribs, defended back to him
short of a length, on the pads, defended back to him
bouncer, he ducks under it, mushfiq has to leap in the air to just get a hand on it. dilshan wants the bye, but thirimanne is not alert
dilshan drives on the up, with an open face, past the diving man at point
short of a length, outside off, steered -999 to third man for -999
good short ball angling in, mashrafe looks to ramp it on off but misses. it angled in too sharply for that
short ball outside off, pulled to deep midwicket for -999
offcutter outside off, the batsman defends it back
offcutter well outside off, guides it to third man for -999
dances down and swats the short ball over mid on with a horizontal bat for -999. mid on in the circle hard to be cleared and was cleared easily
loud appeal from the bowler as he traps the batsman in front of leg but it's going down leg
hurries him up this time, 134kph, sabbir fails to tuck it on the leg side and takes it on the body
slow bouncer outside off, at 127kph, sabbir lets it go
outside off with not much room, punched off the back foot to point
fuller outside off now and he drives it down to mid off
short of length outside the off stump, sliced to third man for -999
outside the off stump on length, defends off the back foot to point
slow full toss around the thighs, steered easily behind square on the leg side for -999
yorker on middle stump, digs it -999 to midwicket from the crease
short and outside off, he guides it by opening the face of the bat between point and third man and gets -999
goes back in the crease to cover his stumps and defends the straight delivery solidly
quicker and short of length again outside off, sabbir blocks off the back foot
back of length just outside off, taps it late to third man for -999
full, middle and leg, played wide of mid-on, but they decide against the -999 after both have come halfway down the -999. they make it back in time, though
short of a length, hits him on the thigh pad
short of a length, on off, beats his closed face and hits him on the forearm
slightly off-pace low full toss. actually it is a slower ball. at 121. goes uppishly towards short midwicket, but clears the leaping thirimanne there
full, nearly a yorker, quick, pushed to mid-on
length ball, angling in, defended from the crease
goes back to a flatter delivery and clips it to deep square leg
tossed up outside off, punched into the covers. miller isn't usually the best against spin
fuller delivery slipping down the leg side. not a bad ploy that considering miller almost overbalanced
down the track and whips a fuller ball to deep midwicket and miller is up for ab's call of -999
shortish and outside off, cracked to deep point
this is good length and ab's still been able to get that front foot across, bend it and sweep it over the short fine leg fielder. it's almost like the length and line of the ball doesn't matter
flighted on leg stump and ab has swept it past the short leg fielder. reaches as far forward as he could to get to the pitch, and also outside the line of the ball to help it on its way
bang! races down the track and turns a wide length ball into a wider, overpitched half volley and creams it over extra cover. is he hunting another demolition of a century?
just a shade short, but ab has seen it early, camped back and pulled with great ferocity. seemed a slower ball too so he made all the pace himself and hit the gap in front of midwicket
fuller delivery outside off, punched to wide mid-off
back of a length slower ball on middle and leg, worked behind square leg
fuller delivery outside off, drilled to extra cover
down the track to a slower ball on middle, rossouw pushes to mid-off and runs
seeks the blockhole on middle and off, but ab is safely beside it and thumps it through extra cover. end of the batting powerplay, which has for once favoured the batting side: 72 runs for no wickets
backs -999 and cracks a short ball over cover and brings up his fifty. ab has taken hold of the innings. but this was there to be put -999
full toss on middle and leg, ab says thank you with a whip off his legs to the midwicket boundary. smiles all around as he hugs rossouw for the 100 partnership in only 9.5 overs
they are hitting some unbelievable sixes! moves outside leg, picked up a length ball on leg stump and hammers it over extra cover. sheer magic
lands a yorker on leg stump and it's squeezed down to long-on
cuts from middle stump and despite -999 men up on the off side, they've pinched another -999. carter under pressure there
goes back and clips a good length ball to deep midwicket
jumps back, picks up a short ball on off and hammers it over extra cover. pure, startling power that was set up by his footwork to get himself going outside leg
down the track, but samuels has seen him early and pulled his length back. so faf has to adjust and can only clip to short fine leg
flighted outside off and faf gets forward, goes down on his knees and scoops it over the keeper
flighted outside off, amla reaches -999 and drives to deep cover
short and flat and outside off, slapped to deep cover
short ball sets up for faf to rock back and pull to smith at deep midwicket
goes back and clips a good length ball to deep midwicket again
turns down the leg side and amla flicks it to the left of deep midwicket - smith is the man - and he sends a wayward throw which allows the batsmen -999
flatter and on a length outside off, slashed through point
slid down the leg side, was he preempting faf running at him?
strays on the legs of the batsman and it's amla too. easy whip to long leg
goes back and clips a flatter delivery from the stumps to deep midwicket
runs at the bowler and nearly beheads faf at the other end! brutal hit from amla, and faf did equally well to drop to the floor and then get up to pick up the -999 to long-on
a shade short and amla had rocked back to cut powerfully, only he can't beat sammy at point
flighted outside off, faf eases it through the covers
advances on the bowler and whips a fuller delivery to long-on. almost yorked himself, but brings up south africa's hundred
gets down the track and taps a good length delivery to long-on
stays put in his crease to make sure he has the room to slap the shortish delivery -999 to the sweeper
reaches outside off and whips a tossed up delivery down to long-on
pushes into the off side as he gets forward to the pitch of the ball
tossed up on off stump, faf runs down and slaps it back at the bowler who fails to field it
lovely control of flight from benn as he brings faf forward and gets the ball to hold in the pitch and go on with the arm. hint more bounce as well as it is blocked with -999 hand
flighted on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
shortish and outside off, slapped to deep point
almost a yorker on middle and amla can only bunt it back at the bowler
fuller delivery on off stump, faf slices it in front of point and sets off
good length ball angled into the pads, amla nudges it to deep square leg
length ball outside off, amla tries to force it -999 through extra cover but mistimes it to mid-off
full and a hint outside off, amla pushes it back at the bowler
back of a length on middle and off, worked into the gap to the right of midwicket
tossed up outside off, amla makes some room and almost straight-drives it to extra cover
eased down the ground as this is flighted on middle and leg
tossed up on middle, gets down the track and pushes it down the ground. benn's good off his own bowling
goes back to punches a good lengt hball through to deep point again
stays back to a good length ball and drills it to deep point

benn lumbers around, willing himself to get to the ball and the big boot helps. amla gets down with the full half-volley and slices it through point. good placement to get it so far to the right of third man
hammers it wide of mid-on! first boundary since the fourth over and it comes off a rank short ball and faf pulls it strongly through the gap
shortish and outside off, shoulders arms
gets up off his toes and works a back of a length delivery to deep square leg. more evidence of his scarcely believable wrists
shortish and outside off, amla stands and pushes to cover
shortish on middle and off, clipped straight of midwicket
shortish and outside off and he barely reached it with his cut shot. finds cover point as he makes contact with only the bottom of the bat
shortish and outside off, punched to short cover where sammy makes a smart save.
back of a length and outside off, blocked
back of a length and outside off, refuses to play and checks something beyond the sightscreen
shortish and outside off, faf is unable to time his lash through the covers. batsmen are getting into their strokes a bit earlier than they should, even against the new ball

good length ball on off stump, faf is across and blocks with half a bat, hence the inside edge that almost rolled back onto his stumps. holder did say at the toss that he didn't mind bowling first, and he's leading by example
got inside the line of this short ball and pulled it quite well to long leg and he's set off straight -999 for a couple. intelligent batting to take advantage of a weak fielding effort there
shortish and outside off and it gains ample bounce as holder usually generates, faf hoists his bat well over his head
back of a length on off stump, whipped to midwicket
keeps the ball well outside off, and faf is quite uninterested
just back of a good length and he clips it into the midwicket region for a quick -999
fuller delivery pushed down to mid-on

point was running back, third man was running in. a call needed to be made, but it hadn't come and taylor is able to get -999 with a thick outside edge that flew over the cordon. length ball gets taylor playing wildly
shortish and outside off gets a mistimed pull as the answer. doesnt go beyond the inner circle
low full toss, that curls in quite late as well. taylor is able to put his feet -999 of the way and clip it, -999-handed, through wide mid-on
fuller delivery, drilled through the covers
banged in short and a shade outside off, holder sways -999 of the way

no, says umpire gould and abbott is thoroughly shocked. it appeared very close, after the near-yorker curled in sharply to strike holder on his boots. there may have been an inside edge, the batsman was raising his bat. the bowler checks with his captain, but there is no decision to go for the review. if there wasn't any bat involved and there wasn't, it was gone. another review missed, another umpiring error
that's the slower short ball and holder's got into the pull far too early. gets a blow to his stomach to remind him not to do so
opens the face and slices a back of a length ball from off stump through point
fuller delivery outside off, holder runs it down to deep third man and takes the -999
moves across, like ab kept doing, to flick a shortish delivery from outside off. thuds into the pads and abbott appeals wildly. holder was struck miles outside off though
back of a length on off stump, blocked

through him and he has a five-for! celebrates it with kisses blown to the heavens and south africa are playing the perfect game. this is a flighted googly that slips through ramdin's defences as he plays all around it
tossed up into the base of off stump, drilled to the left of long-off
good length ball on off stump, swept behind square leg
flighted delivery on leg stump, ramdin goes onto -999 knee to sweep and gets a top edge. there is no short fine leg though, and it might not have carried anyway
flighted on off stump, tapped back at the bowler
tossed up on off stump, eased to long-off
defends a shortish ball on off stump
goes deep in his crease and is nearly caught in front. good thing he was able to bring the bat down with the flick
loopy full toss, tonked to long-on
gets forward to block a good length ball on off stump
flighted on off stump, pushed to long-off
goes back to a flat delivery and clips it to deep midwicket
fuller delivery to try and draw holder into a drive outside off, no such luck for steyn
back of a length and outside off, holder doesn't want anything to do with it again
shortish and outside off, holder shoulders arms

clipped to midwicket. full and straight
a low full toss, swinging -999. smith runs down and bunts -999 to mid-off for -999
legcutter, pushed towards extra cover, a quick run. the throw deflects of tripathi's bat, but tye saves the boundary.
good length delivery outside off, pushed towards mid-off

he waits on the back foot for the ball to turn and defends cautiously

on the pads, driven on the leg side for -999 to long-on

leans forward this time to defend patiently

too short and not towards the body, so yuvraj has no trouble dispatching it between long-on and deep midwicket with a powerful pull for a -999-bounce -999

fullish outside off, yuvraj swings and gets a thick edge to third man
slightly full on the off side, driven down to mid-off for a quick -999
good running as henriques tucks this -999 off the back foot towards long-on with soft hands so that he can come back for -999
turns it sharply into henriques who is beaten to put it -999. takes it on the body
pitches outside leg, warner goes back towards off and tucks it towards short fine leg for -999

turns it -999 from warner who is a bit surprised by the bounce too after the ball pitched around leg
power. good length outside off, this time the front leg goes -999 of the way and he absolutely smashes this back over the umpire's head

lucky. walks down at him and looks to send this full ball over the midwicket boundary. gets too close to it and gets an inside edge that just about rolls past the leg stump and forces short fine to chase and slide to his left

dropped short at middle stump, swivels and takes -999 hand off as he pulls this wide of long-on....where morgan does well to reach it but bungles it as the last moment with the slide. gets in a tangle and gives -999 -999
short, wide, whack. stays put and slaps it in front of point on the up
good length outside off, driven on the up to long-off

good length at middle stump, steps down the track and pushes on the up to long-on

short, down the leg side, well past the batsman's shot

good length outside off stump, short stride as he turns it to sweeper cover with an open face
back of a length at off stump, gets on his toes to defend into the off side

nair's wretched run continues. goes for the short -999 again, this is under his arm-pit and he fends at it to try and pick runs fine. but saha is across to catch it and the umpire raises the finger. good catch too, he dove to his left with both hands and performed a graceful tumble to keep it in
short ball, climbs at his chest, jumps up to defend it

no-fear batting. this must be tripathi's brief. get quick runs at the top. he races down at milne and crashes him through cover. makes room on the leg side and slaps it -999

a shortish delivery outside off, pulled on the bounce to deep midwicket. shot.

125 kph, in the slot, this isn't great bowling. hit a good length and take pace off. it's worked for mathews before. but this is in the arc. dhawan swings -999 over midwicket. clears the boundary too.
short delivery outside off, pulled down to long-off. not timed too well
well bowled. pace off the ball. slower ball outside off, inside-edged past square leg
shovelled in the gap at midwicket for a couple. full on middle, dhawan brings -999 the bottom hand. iyer does well again
full outside off, in the slot. not a good ball. hammered to long-off. couldn't quite get underneath that

ah, gets it wrong off the last ball. all the good work undone. goes for a yorker and ends up bowling a full toss on middle, whipped -999 backward of square leg for -999. and that is the fifty of the partnership. this pair is keeping daredevils alive
backs -999 and the bowler follows him with a very full ball, pushed down to long-on. this is good bowling. not much can be done if it is that full
yorker on leg, jams the bat down and digs it -999 between long-on and deep midwicket. this time they push for -999 and get it easily
moves across and -999, gets a low full toss that is pushed wide of long-on. there was a chance for the second run but they needed to push harder
good ball, hits the blockhole outside off and all the batsman can do is jam the bat down and squeeze it -999 to covers

good shot, well-played. backs -999 to give himself room and just responds with a whirl of the wrists. opens the face of his bat and clears short third man
fullish length, punched hard down to long-on
trying to take it -999 from the batsman again but this time he just sends it outside the line outside off

just short of long-on. walks across and bhuvneshwar tries to take it -999 from the batsman. fires it wide outside off and the batsman has to reach -999 for it, tries to loft and gets it off the toe end of the bat

looking for a yorker and ends up bowling a full toss outside off that is pushed down the ground, between long-off and long-on

good use of the feet. comes down the track, meets the pitch of this. it is pitching outside off and he makes sure to move towards it, keeps a still head and lofts it over long-off

on the pads, tries to flick off them but is late in closing the face of the bat and gets hit on the pad

drifting on the pads, tucked -999 to deep square leg

moving in late. nair gets a good stride across to this length ball, pitching outside off, finds the inside edge

full and outside off, drums it to long-off

reaches -999 to a full ball outside off and slaps it to deep point. would have been a wide had he left it

sees buttler jumping outside leg and so bowls a yorker outside off. the batsman has to reach -999 to make connection and gets a -999 towards point

into the crowd again, the people over long leg get a chance to show off to the cameras. pretty good ball this is too - short, fast, coming up to his nose, but rana swivels on his back foot and pulls it -999 powerfully
nudges it off his pads towards midwicket for a -999

back of a length, angled in at off stump. goes on the back foot and punches it to deep midwicket

round the -999 for a low full toss on leg stump, flicks it to long leg

he's holed -999 to mid-on, magician bipul strikes. rahane is nowhere near the pitch of the ball as he looks to go over the top. was hitting it against the breeze too, as he ended up dragging it from outside off to kaul. this -999 didn't turn either. poor from an experienced campaigner.
yorker on off stump, saha digs it -999 to cover and pinches a -999

excellent batting. he sees fine leg up, plants his front foot across, outside off, and lap sweeps a flatter delivery, using all its pace to his advantage

goes full and outside off, maxi, leaning back, drags it -999 to midwicket
loopy slower ball, which amla reads just in time. he had set up for the sweep, delays his shot just enough to pinch a -999 to short fine leg

no, no, no, you can't allow maxwell to get under the ball. he picks th e short delivery so early, rocks back, swivels on the back foot and launches it over midwicket
dabs it to point and since it is just enough to the right of the fielder, they take him on. jadeja gets in a direct hit at the keeper's end, but amla is well in

there for the drive and vohra times it superbly. lovely high elbow, good stride forward, the only thing missing is the placement. hits straight to cover

flighted delivery on off stump, eased to long-off

offers a touch of width and that's more than enough for -999 of the best batsmen in the world. amla holds his shape, gets to the pitch of the half-volley and caresses it past the left of the cover fielder

floats this full outside off from wide of the crease, narine uses his stretch to reach -999 and slice this over short third man. not sure it was deliberate, looked like he was trying to hit over point but he'll take the runs anyway

-999'm not sure aravind believes what he's just done! length ball angling -999, he punches this over cover, flew off the blade. raced to the boundary.

holes -999 to long off, warner takes the catch, turns around to the crowd and punches the air with aggression! siraj bowled it slow and well outside off, uthappa went for the big shot and slapped it straight to the captain
loud appeal for lbw as yusuf is struck in front of the stumps, but it hit his bat before the pad
takes the pace off and pitches it well outside off, uthappa likes it on leg, and he sends it towards sweeper cover

short slower ball outside off stump, looks to bludgeon this through the off side and is beaten...he goes for the run but aravind is not interested at the non-strikers for some reason. parthiv has enough time to run all the way to the stumps and whip the bails off

nice catch, pollard. mitch is over the -999 again, bowls it short and wide outside off like he does at this stage. jadhav runs down the pitch and looks to flat-bat this over long-off but the bounce is too much. he slices it from high on the bat and pollard maintains balance as he runs to his left and holds on to it
lifts -999 straight to long-on. this was a back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, back of a length. he couldn't get enough bat on the pull shot and hit it straight at pollard
good adjustment next ball. gets his back leg outside off stump in anticipation, gets the length ball outside off and clubs it flat over the umpire
bowls it full and wide. negi is looking to make room and he's not a particularly a big man. can't reach this, lets it go
steps -999 at this wide length ball outside off, has to take -999 hand off to get bat. once more it becomes a chip, lands in front of sweeper
full ball at off stump, slight shape -999, pushed off the front foot to extra cover

slower ball, back of a length outside off stump. he steps -999 again and this time he goes wide of long-off...where hardik gets under it and dives backwards with his right hand. manages to reach it too but it had crossed the boundary already
slower ball, full toss at off stump, looks to slog this but can only hit it back to the bowler on the bounce
slower ball outside off stump, steps down the track and reaches the pitch. hits it uppishly, inside -999, on the bounce to sweeper cover
the perfect yorker at off stump, gets the leading edge as he tries to keep this -999, straight to point
slower ball, good length at off stump. he backs -999 and uses the room to smack this on the up over extra cover...clears the boundary too. difficult shot, well executed
low full toss outside off stump and he carves this off the middle of the bat, past his opposite number at mid-off to seal the win
close. this is a good length ball outside off. looks to flay this through the off side on the up, gets an inside edge that misses off stump and trickles through to the keeper's left

low full toss at middle stump, shuffles across the stumps and whips this between long-on and deep midwicket....but they can't come back for the second. good fielding from milne, running to his left at deep midwicket
slower short ball at off stump, can't do more than pull this to long-on
full at off stump, driven on the up to long-off
full and well wide, rohit watches it go after walking at the bowler
slower ball, back of a length outside off. under edge on the cut goes straight to backward point. they take the -999 and that is his fifty
back of a length at off stump, cramped for room after shuffling across, pushed to long-off off the back foot
back of a length slower ball outside off stump, gives him the charge and drives on the up to extra cover, where chahal misfields...but sweeper was backing up

what a shot! oh he's back in form alright. everyone knows this is going to be a slower ball, but not everyone can respond like this. walks well outside off stump, gets down to this good length ball and sweeps him over the square leg boundary
slower ball, good length outside off, slashes hard to sweeper cover
slower ball outside off, back of a length, cut to sweeper cover
full at leg stump, pushed to long-on off the front foot
back of a length outside off, dabbed off the back foot to backward point
back of a length outside off stump, shoveled off the back foot to long-on
bouncer at middle stump, pulls off the front foot and gets it nicely too....but it is straight at milne at deep square leg
back of a length outside off stump, chopped off the under edge to short third man
shawwwt, folks. back of a length outside off, slight forward press to get to this, high elbow as he punches it past extra cover
tossed up at yorker length on middle stump, rohit waits for it to land and pushes it through the midwicket area. that'll be the last he sees of a ball turning -999 from him today, unless kohli bowls
flighted at middle stump, pushed watchfully to deep midwicket
full and flat, down the leg side, where jadhav can't collect cleanly
short ball at middle stump, pulled hard, straight to deep midwicket

tossed this up outside off stump, karn reaches the pitch of the ball and clubs this over the bowler....kohli's sticks -999 his right hand after running to his right at long-on, but can only parry it over the boundary after it bounces
good length at off stump, leans into it and pushes to deep extra cover
googly, full at middle stump. leans into it and pushes it to deep midwicket...wanted -999 but rohit didn't
dropped short at middle stump, back foot punch to long-on
good length outside off stump, punches it to long-on off the back foot
full at leg stump, flicked wide of long-on

drops it short at middle stump, he goes for the pull. it lands on the bounce to long-on...who realises krunal is hobbling halfway down the pitch thanks to his injury earlier while fielding. throws it in, full power and makes him sprint and leap to make his ground...which results in further pain. he is on the floor again...and he is going off again, retired hurt
tossed up full at leg stump, pushed to long-on off the front foot
full at middle stump, pushed to long-on off the front foot
back of a length at middle stump, misses -999 on the flick shot, deflection off the leg into the off side
oh man, what a sight. full ball at off stump, takes a few steps forward and offers the full face as he lifts this flat to long-off's right
good length outside off stump, leans in and opens the face to get this past backward point
back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side
shot. full and angled into the leg stump, gets a short stride forward and punches firmly past mid-on
offcutter, good length at off stump, times it beautifully on the up, ab is across to his left quickly at mid-off
slower, short ball outside off, jadeja picks it. goes on the back foot and pulls it in the gap at deep midwicket
full and angled in on off, whipped with the wrists to midwicket
jadeja comes down the track, nearly yorks himself but drills it down the ground past the outstretched right hand of stokes
back of a length and just outside off, chopped -999 to third man
back of a length on leg stump, worked to midwicket
full on off, clipped to leg for -999
very full on off, whipped down to long-on. time--999
just short of a good length and outside off, slower ball, punched to long-on off the inside half
short of a length and outside off, forced to cover again
back of a length and angled in on off, pushed back
slower ball, back of a length, punched just wide of cover
off-stump yorker, dug -999
very wide outside off, full, stokes reaches -999 and carves to deep point. might have been an off-side wide had he left it
short and outside off, dhoni slaps it to long-off for -999
full-toss on off, pushed down to long-off
dhoni uses his feet, this is darted flatter and quicker. he is hit on the pad, but this is heading down leg
stokes shapes for the reverse-sweep. soni bowls a full-toss down leg, hit past point
googly, full and breaks -999 around off, stokes reads it and defends to cover
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line for -999
back of a length on off, punched back to the bowler
left alone outside off

-999, horrible mix-up. stokes and tripathi are nearly at the striker's end. stokes uses his feet, yorks himself, and ends up digging the ball down towards long-on. stokes takes off for the second. tripathi took off as well, but stopped near the middle of the pitch. stokes is annoyed. finch swoops on the ball and nails the stumps at the non-striker's end with a rocket throw
short and wide outside off, stokes frees his arms, flat-batting it -999 between point and cover
slower and fuller outside off, stokes gets forward and plays a checked drive to cover

the helicopter is -999.  ms dhoni, are you watching?  rabada bowls this full on middle, yuvraj was standing outside leg. the ball tailed -999 late to come into his swinging arc and yuvraj drilled it straight over rabada's head. sensational. shot of the innings
oh, jayant. what have you done?  over-ran the ball at third man. low full toss, yuvraj looks to go over point but gets a thick edge down to third man
low full toss outside off, squeezed to long-off
flays a length ball outside off to deep point
misses his mark by an inch. this is a leg-stump half-volley, yuvraj is deep inside his crease, anticipating a full -999. flicks this to the deep square leg boundary.
looks to flick this leg side but this is a super cross-seam yorker that pin yuvraj plumb on off as he beats the swing. can't be -999, though
threads the gap on the off side. made room to generate power on the swing, powered to the deep cover boundary. what's better is it will be a  free-hit  as rabada overstepped

backs -999 and squeezes the full delivery between point and short third man. super timing, even better placement. opened his wrists late to find that gap and steer it -999. henriques showing there's more to his game than just big hitting
right into the blockhole on middle, squeezed to point

this is the yuvraj flick of old. the kind you saw him do against brett lee at the world t20 in 2007. length on middle and leg, yuvraj's swagger to the fore. clears the front leg and swings this over deep midwicket. sensational

beaten for pace again but this -999 flies over short fine leg. that was dug in short at 144kph, yuvraj looked to fetch it from outside off. with fine leg in, it kept going -999 after bouncing. shami had no chance
flicks a full ball from outside off towards deep midwicket, samson swooped in quickly
poor ball first up in a new spell. slides a length ball down leg, henriques uses the pace and tickles this to the fine leg boundary

has mathews effected a tumbling stop at deep square? they're checking. full marks for the effort. yuvraj cramped for room but he swivels on the pull and times it well. mathews does well to five full length and pull it back in, but his back leg may have touched the advertising triangle. harsh, harsh. full mark for the effort.
slower delivery but henriques can't find the gap. driven straight to sweeper cover
skiddy length ball on off, punched to long-off
looks to use the pace and glide this length ball behind point, but played too late this time

this time, yuvraj does what he missed off the previous delivery. shortens his length a touch but this is outside leg, yuvraj deflects this to the fine leg boundary. no chance for the boundary rider, he was too square
searches for a leg-stump yorker but ends up missing the mark. could've been a fine tickle to the boundary, but he played too early and missed.
works an incoming length ball towards midwicket
full on middle, tails -999 late, yuvraj plays this down to long-on
length on middle, defended solidly to cover

makes the cardinal sin of looking to fetch a bouncer from the fifth stump outside off, ends up top-edging it to morris at deep square leg. once again the extra pace that shami brings to the fore has resulted in a breakthrough. warner's -999 with a super yorker, williamson's -999 with a bouncer.
right into the blockhole, yuvraj works it off the pad to deep square
punches a length ball to mid-off, gets across for a -999 despite hesitation from yuvraj
angles a length ball on middle and leg, played to midwicket
lunges forward and turns the ball from length to the leg side
punches the short ball outside off to wide long-off
fires full on off, steered wide of point to get off the mark
flatter -999 angling in from wide of the crease, turned to deep midwicket

the googly has done the trick.  top-edge flies to deep square, where shreyas iyer does well to run in from the ropes, maintain his composure and take it running in. dhawan, for some reason, seemed to hold back as the ball dipped on him, and so couldn't generate the amount of power he would've liked.
slider across dhawan, who bunts it to samson at point
jayasuriya-esque.  gets on top of the bounce and uses the width to slap this behind point. third man had no chance
this is a typical dhawan heave. length on middle and leg, dhawan had made up his mind much before to go through with the swing. met that off the middle, sailed over deep midwicket.
beaten by a slower -999. gave him the charge too early and looked to go cover, missed the line altogether.
solidly behind the line of the length ball on the stumps
length outside off, dhawan uses the width to flay that on the up through cover point. exquisite timing
another misfield.  this time the cover fielder dives over the ball.

wide legbreak, iyer looks to hit that over the covers, and it turns more than expected and skews up off the edge of the bottom part of his bat. henriques chases back desperately from extra-cover, and it drops between him and dhawan coming in from sweeper cover
googly, pitching outside leg and turning towards the stumps. anderson exposes all his stumps to make hitting room, and flat-bats to long-off
back of a length on the pads, whipped -999 to the left of deep backward square leg
full on off stump, clears his front leg and drills it towards long-on
back of a length, spins back in sharply to hit pad. impact outside leg, missing leg clearly. wanted to flick it but it spun too much
slips -999 of rashid's hand this time. thigh-high full-toss on leg stump, swiped -999 through square leg
fuller now, and this is smashed back with venom. into the gap between the stumps and the non-striker and it races -999 to the straight boundary

short outside off, and nair has ramped this over the fielder at third-man. it seemed to come off the pitch slower than nair expected, and gave him the time he needed to play it, but it still came on quickly enough for him to comfortably clear the fielder
length ball close to off stump, punched down to long-on
slower length ball on middle and off, defended into the off side
ooh, back of a length outside off and samson looks for that stand-still pull he plays so well. this -999 skids through, though, and beats him for pace

a step down the track from nair and kaul bangs it in a little shorter, angling it into the batsman's body. looks to pull over wide mid-on, doesn't quite time it. the ball stops -999/3rds of the way to the boundary
again that offcutter, this time samson expects it, plays with the turn from outside off through midwicket
length ball, looks like the offcutter coming in towards off stump. samson plants his front foot down the pitch, ends up a little cramped for room, and is forced to defend
back of a length, this time he follows nair's movement -999 from leg stump. dabs it down towards point

back of a length close to off stump, and nair makes himself plenty of room, exposes all -999 stumps, and simply lifts the ball over the covers. not much pace at all, and nair had plenty of time to steady himself and time that shot
slower ball close to off stump, lets it come on for the dab to third man
back of a length on off stump and samson just swats that -999. takes half a step forward and launches this up and over wide long-on
back of a length, a bit of nip back in off the track to cramp nair for room. tries to force it through the off side and the ball beats his inside edge and hits him in the hip area
onto the pads now and bhuvneshwar has square leg back, tucked -999 to that fielder for a quiet -999

this -999 isn't quite as full, and samson has some width again. the shorter length allows him to slice this deliberately over backward point, and siddarth kaul, chasing to his right from third man, puts in -999 dives to stop the ball in -999 installments
fullish and fairly wide outside off, flat-batted to cover point
another outswinger on a good length, a bit closer to off stump, comes forward and eases with an open bat-face to backward point
length ball outside off, a tiny bit of shape -999, slapped to cover point
loopy slower full-toss wider outside off - wider than a set of stumps - reaches -999 and toe-ends it to short third man
just short of a good length and outside off, chopped -999. tahir dives to his right at short third man and takes some pace off the ball
picked off the pads to deep square leg
the batsman steps -999 outside leg and looks to whip it over midwicket. this is the slower ball chasing him. sppons a leading edge to backward point
slower ball outside off, swings and misses
near yorker on off, dug -999 to leg
full and angled across off, he can't connect with his leg-side slog

nasty collision between smith and stokes near the edge of the boundary. smith rams into stokes and tumbles over the boundary. his head bangs against an ad board. he seems okay. he gives the thumbs-up. this was the slower ball on off stump, coulter-nile swings it across the line. gets plenty of height. smith runs to his right from long-on, stokes to his left from deep midwicket. stokes takes the catch but goes over the ad board and collides with smith. it could have been uglier
seam-up, very full and angling -999 wide outside off, driven through the covers
third straight slower ball. third straight boundary. this -999 goes all the way. offcutter ends on middle, goes low, and scoops it all the way over fine leg
slower, fuller, wider outside off. suryakumar backed -999 outside leg, but still managed to reach -999 and slap it inside -999 over extra cover
slower ball on off, 118ks, suryakumar reads it. gets his front foot across off and deftly scoops it over short fine leg

clatters into the -999 of the helmet. nasty, nastly blow. banged in short, 142ks, deceptive pace. coulter-nile is late onto the hook. he is rushed for pace. the ball thuds into the helmet and drops onto the ground. christian immediately shows concern for coulter-nile. smith walks up and checks on his australian team-mate as well. this results in a hold-up in play
short on off, backs -999 outside leg and scythes it to sweeper

-999, back of a length on middle, punched wide of long-on. surya and woakes chance the second. the throw is the deep is flat, christian collects it and takes the bails off. woakes has been caught well short
slower ball, hip-high ball on off stump, suryakumar spots the drop in place. and swings it freely over long leg. pulled off the front foot for a -999. smack
back of a length and angled in, punched to midwicket
full on middle and leg, whipped -999 to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, pathan inches forward and jabs to cover
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, gets inside the line and helps it to long leg

back of a length on off, pathan tips it to short cover and chances a -999. the fielder, tiwary, swoops down on the ball and effects a direct hit at the non-striker's end. pathan just about slides his bat in time and gets -999
back of a length and angled in on middle and leg, worked -999 to deep square leg
back of a length and outside off, opens the face and runs it to point
stump-to-stump line, forward and pushed to mid-off
wide of the crease, short and angled in, tucked -999 to the right of square leg. long leg runs in and hunts the ball down
good length and outside off, beaten past the outside edge. jackson was stuck to the crease

back of a length and angling -999 outside off, gambhir punches on the up to cover, who fumbles and deflects the ball to cover. kkr look to run off the misfield. smith throws the ball to dhoni, who runs in and deftly flicks the ball onto the stumps, but jackson is in
jabbed into the covers as this was on a length and wide outside off
full on middle and leg, clipped -999 in the gap at midwicket
veering down leg side, glanced off the thigh fine on the leg side
is that a wide? no, the umpire says it hit the thigh pad. a good length ball on leg stump gets a flick in answer, but sundar misses making connection with bat. he is however alert to an overthrow
low full toss on off stump, nudges to short midwicket. the crowd goes up, thinking this is a catch.

he's gone! gone for 93. gone to a slower ball. is there life in this game yet? poor tripathi. he has timed better balls to the boundary. this -999 is short, it has ample room to free the arms, he does free his arms, but pulls it straight to midwicket. rovman powell, who is yet to get a game, takes the catch
bouncer - tripathi loads up a hook, but it climbs up beyond his reach. the umpire lets it pass
swings a back of a length delivery -999 to deep square leg
races down the pitch to carve a shortish delivery through to deep cover
tosses it up on off stump, drives to long-off
covers all his stumps and then flicks a good length ball through to deep square leg. well taken -999. stokes made sure to use only a limited amount of his power in that shot
looks for another slog sweep - he is playing that shot the moment a ball is tossed up outside off. this time though he inside edges to deep midwicket

appeal for a stumping as tripathi looks to block but he misses. clearly he hasn't read the ball turning -999 from the right-hander. jackson, the keeper, has not. takes it cleanly and then knocks the bails off. the batsman, however, listens to his instincts after he is beaten and drags his back foot back in time
that's a bad effort from woakes, and he knows it, screams at himself. at deep midwicket, he moves to his left, but is way too slow to get down. a slog sweep meant to be -999 becomes -999
goes back to hit a good length ball spinning -999 from him through cover
now he picks the slower ball. this is a legcutter, telegraphed to the batsman, so wide and with little love-notes. tripathi accepts with a slash over point

sails -999. pace on the ball is working to tripathi's plans. he swivels on the back foot, reaches up to the ball, which is over his head on off stump, and hooks it - right off the middle - over the fine leg boundary
opens the face and taps a shortish delivery towards point. smith steps down looking for a -999, waits for the fielder to misfield, and then gets through
fine leg is up inside the circle, so he shuffles across, trying to lift a back of a length delivery on off stump over yusuf pathan. no such luck
whips a full delivery tailing into him through midwicket
and they just keep coming. smith deciding he has to match tripathi, comes down the track, gives it a flat-batted slap, gets an inside edge past the keeper diving to his left
crunches a shortish delivery - at 140 kph - to point
and just to confirm that it is him, he shuffles across and tries to take a shortish delivery on off stump and whip it through midwicket. gets only an inside edge

what a delivery! it just kept closing in on rahane, who thinks he has the chance to run it to third man, a stroke he is impeccably good at. but umesh's pace - and his bounce - the ball just kept rising - takes the glove through to the keeper

lovely hit - almost carries to the point boundary. and yet the batsman puts in the slightest effort. just swayed his torso back and punched at the ball with an open face, intending to lift it over the infield
there's deviation - that's why they appeal for caught behind - as rahane hangs back, beside the ball, and looks to dab it down to third man. but the ball has simply swung posthumously
139kph, thunders in and bowls shortish on off stump, rahane hops back in his crease to run it to point
stands up tall and drills a shortish delivery outside of to long-off

turns it through to deep midwicket, from where samson races in, picks up the ball and sends it through very quickly, not even worrying about maintaining his balance while he releases because he wants to stop them taking a second. unable to do so, but good effort
lovely placement as he leans over the tossed up delivery on middle and nudges it through midwicket. -999 men in the deep race up towards the ball and make raina think -999
loops it up on off stump, he drives to long-on
flatter delivery outside off, karthik pulls to long-on
quicker delivery off the front of the hand - but since it is short and wide - karthik has everything he needs to cut the ball. then he gets a bonus - the fielder, samson, misfields on the boundary
drums a full delivery on off stump past the bowler's left to long-on
swivels on his back foot as he pulls a short ball on middle to long leg
reads the slower ball better, and having made room on the leg side, guides it through cover for the fifty partnership.

dropped by midwicket. a seriously well hit ball comes right at him, over his head, and samuels can't hold on. the force is such that it just thuds into his hands before he is ready and even propels him back on his backside
clears his front leg to try and hoist a back of a length ball over midwicket. a good old agricultural heave. the ball thuds into the back leg of raina
charges -999 of his crease, and gets a ball that is ripe for the off drive. this time, though, karthik mistimes the shot and has to settle for a -999
targets the stumps - and the inswing is no help to the batsman - karthik tries to punch down the ground and instead gets an inside edge past short fine leg's left

beautiful bowling. and at 144 kph, there is precious little time for karthik to react. he sees a good length ball, he knows it is still the powerplay and he has to hit -999. goes for the drive and is comfortably beaten
back of a length on off stump, defends
and now the ball lobs up in the region of square leg - from where the fielder was pulled -999 - and raina secures a -999 despite hopping about against cummins' pace
finally he tries a proper cricket shot and see what happens? takes a shortish delivery on leg stump and flicks it over square leg
good length ball on off stump, raina tries to smoke it over midwicket, inside edges onto pad
flat and wide, carved towards point. jakati watches on as the ball passes him, resulting in a couple of expletives being hurled at him by jadeja. -999 more nonetheless
short down off and middle, pulled to long-on
an adrenaline rush. flat outside off, flat-batted to long-off. not quite timed. a cruise of a chase this
flat outside off, tapped towards point
-999 more. -999 on the bounce. flat and wide outside off, samson gets underneath the length and lofts the ball over cover for another -999. great hitting, he's picking his slots
-999 more. this is the top tier. what is happening to batting in cricket. full outside off, samson's loft goes 99 metres long, over long-on.
raina drops short and pant says thanks. sits back, waits and waits and waits and then pulls merrily -999 over midwicket for a huge -999 to get to his fifty. a blitzy knock.
cut behind point for a couple. short and wide from raina, sliced behind point
and then mccullum pulls it back. flat and wide, hammered wide of long-on where mccullum puts in a dive to his left to save -999
a naughty misfield from smith on the sweeper cover boundary. flat and wide outside off, pant nails a powerful punch from the back foot. smith gets across to his left but lets the ball through
shortish and slow on off, pushed to cover. another dot.
flat on off, scythed towards cover
a good finish. yorker outside off, goes underneath pant's bat
flat and wide, hit -999 to deep cover
short and wide, carved to deep point for another -999.
flat outside off, dabbed to short third man for a -999
the offspinner bowling to the right-hander. flat on off, samson gets underneath the length and swats a heave over midwicket. if it was in his half, we was always going to go
short and wide from raina, sliced to the sweeper cover
strays down leg, off the pad towards square leg. a leg bye

gone this time. a short delivery on leg, karun looks to bail -999 of the stroke but bails -999 late. he then thinks he has enough time to ramp the ball over short third man. all he does it get an edge through to karthik. not a bad stroke with 209 to chase, but execution not too great
full and straight, flicked wide of mid-on for a run. this is good batting. singles off all other balls means it will be a good over
good length delivery outside off, carved to deep backward point. interesting position
changes the line. pushes it fuller and a lot wider outside off, a thick outside edge to third man
picks the length so early does samson and weeeeee, the ball goes over square leg. all timing. a length delivery on leg, he sees the length early and a swat gives him -999. lovely
goes across a tad and clips the ball from middle and leg towards square leg for -999 and keeps strike
loops it up again, it's a highish full toss, punched down to long off
half volley outside off, driven down to long off now
outside off again, he waits on the back foot and pushes it to long on
strays down leg for a wide
loops it with a lot of flight on off, it's tucked to leg for a quick -999 and maxwell runs across to fire a throw at bowler's end but misses and concedes overthrows
angling in from outside off, punched off the back foot for -999

there's an appeal for a run -999 as ab drove that dead straight and it hit the stumps at non-striker's end. sandeep is claiming it touched his fingers and replays show it did. it looks like mandeep's bat was down just in time but the third umpire wants to be 120% sure. not -999 gives the local crowd some relief

he's got kohli too, clean bowled! kohli charged down quickly, it was an inswinger from sandeep which pitched around off and middle and came in, kohli swung hard and missed it completely. what a blow for rcb, what accurate bowling from sandeep
stays a bit low outside off, kohli is on the back foot and defends as he watches it carefully
no movement now, slightly outside off and mandeep chops it to third man
some -999 movement now, mandeep watches the slightly fuller length, goes for a big swing and it misses the outside edge
just a bit back of length outside off, not too far outside off and mandeep punches it to cover point
134kph, bangs it a little short, kohli stays back this time to defend to off again
takes a step down to show his intent, it's a length delivery outside off without much room and kohli defends it to off
pitched up slightly, mandeep tucks it to leg for -999

-999 in -999 for unadkat. another slower ball outside off. rashid does not pick it. clears his front leg and toe-ends it in the air. unadkat himself settles under the skier

eeeeks, a full toss on middle, flicked -999 to deep square leg. should be hitting those for sixes.
