full on off, and that's been swept square. well hit, but stopped by chahar at square leg
good length on off stump. big step forward from uthappa, and defended back to harbhajan

dropped at square leg! what an effort from chahar, but the ball pops -999 of his hand. short on middle, and lynn pulled that hard. chahar dived to his right, but the ball just didn't stick in. chance goes down
tossed up outside off, and that's been given a wild leg-side slog. slices it, and the ball's in the air. raina gets under it from mid off, and takes a comfortable catch from near his face. big -999!
full on leg stump as he sees lynn walking across to the leg side. he tries to slog towards the leg side, but mistimed towards midwicket
full on off, spins slightly inwards. tries to drive -999 from his body, but mistimed to cover point

bowled! a flat delivery, drifting back in, samson stays low and looks to heave that sweep over midwicket. he gets a thick inside edge into his back leg, the ball then ricochets back and hits off stump. he was waiting for the right delivery which he could attack, but didn't quite execute with this -999.
flat and wide, the ball slides in again. punched to deep cover for -999.
flat down leg, nudged to deep square leg for -999
nicely bowled, sees rahane coming and so he slows the pace down and shortens the length. pushed to long-off well, good improv
flat outside off, punched to long-off
slow down leg, pushed to long-on for -999. very soft hands, and rahane comes back
quick and straight, driven to long-on for -999. good comeback again.
comes down and drives to long-off with the spin
flat and quick on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
picks the gap and gets -999. tewatia drops short, rahane rocks back and pulls that neatly into the gap at square leg for -999. lovely shot.
drilled right back at the non-striker's stumps. tewatia dives to his right. samson dives back. tewatia didn't get a hand on that.
flat and quick, on off, punched -999 towards point for a run.
inside edged, just past the stumps. back of a length outside off, short looks to punch into the off side, a thick inside edge just evades the stumps.
eeks, that's an ugly swing. full and straight, moving back in. rahane comes charging and hoicks the ball -999 through midwicket via the inside half. pulled in just inside.
excellent lines. not much rahane can do. on a length, straight. defended into the off side. typical boult, naggingly accurate.
yep, some swing! boult usually gets swing. a good length delivery on middle and off, the ball moves back in, in the air and off the pitch. a thick inside edge saves rahane.
on the pads on that occasion, drifting on the pads. there is some swing too. worked -999 through backward square leg for a couple. very neatly tucked -999
nice start from boult. full and straight, not much swing though, pushed -999 to cover.

a -999 to finish! another swervy slower delivery outside off, morris stands in his crease and smashes the ball over long-on for -999. rajasthan enjoy their hoemcoming too, beating the delhi daredevils by 10 runs
full and wide outside off, smashed over cover for -999. but doesn't do much to the crowd or delhi's mood.
takes the catch! a slower ball on leg, shankar bunts the ball -999 again to long-on. stokes runs in and takes a simple catch to seal delhi's fate. a match-changing 10 balls from laughlin.
full outside off, chipped -999 over cover. wild cheers from the rajastahn crowd because they've won this game without any extras in the next -999 balls.
smashed on the helmet! this is a terrific delivery again. doesn't bother with the slower ball, goes short and fast and accurate. morris can't connect with a pull, the ball pings him on the helmet.
a length delivery outside off is swung -999 to deep midwicket, it shapes -999 again.

markande finishes mumbai's innings with a scooped -999. he shuffles across off even before kaul delivers, the bowler pushes it outside off, kaul holds his shape and ramps it -999 fine of short fine leg to end the innings on a high. sandeep sharma embraces his punjab team-mate markande
very full on off - near yorker, inside-edged behind square on the leg side
knuckle ball outside off, tipped into the covers
banged in short on middle, spliced to long-on
full and outside off, steered past backward point
full and outside off, the free-hit it swiped off the inside half to fine leg
full and outside off, bumrah has a big whoooosh and misses. kaul has overstepped? tight call from umpire llong
back of a length on middle, swung -999 to deep square leg
arm ball, squeezed back to the bowler
swept from the stumps to long leg this time
back of a length, slides in on middle, hammered to long-on
suryakumar finally breaks free. flighted on middle, he backs -999 outside leg, and launches it over extra cover
tossed outside off, swept across the line to deep square leg
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, pollard chops his bat down and gets it -999 fine of short third man for a much-needed boundary
short, on top of off, punched back to kaul
shuffles across and whips a -999 to long-on
hurled short on middle, gets big on suryakumar as he hooks and misses
back of a length on off, punched back, pollard's bat is in the way, deflected to short midwicket
back of a length on off, stabbed -999 to short midwicket
yusuf reaches -999 for a cutter but misses it outside off. beaten. time -999
another slower cutter, dabbed to short third man
full, wide, slashed to sweeper cover
short and angling -999 outside off, guided with the angle to backward point
shuffles across and pats it to wide long-on for -999
cutter outside off, runs past the outside edge
nurdled through square leg for -999

saha steps -999, markande foxes him with a quicker googly, hits the thigh pad. lbw appeal, but umpire llong does not budge. going down leg? mumbai go for a review. spins in, bounces to hit the front flap, the tracker returns -999 reds. umpire llong is bemused. he reverses his decision
dhawan steps -999, has a big heave-ho, drags it behind square on the leg side
full on middle and spins in, driven to mid-on off the front foot
half-tracker outside off, dhawan lays into it and cracks it through the covers. sunrisers cruising
slower through the air outside off, saha stretches -999 and paddles it -999 behind square on the leg side
shorter and faster on middle, forced down to long-on for a -999
full and straight, clipped through square leg

dropped by kishan behind the stumps. he can't cling onto the rebound either. saha backs -999 for a cut, instead top-edges the turning ball. kishan is undone by the bounce as the ball bobbles -999. he dives forward but the ball evades his reach
dhawan runs down the track and mows -999 -999 to deep square leg. not middled
straight ball on middle, defended back to krunal
tossed outside off, nudged to wide mid-on
sliding into the pads, worked to ab at short midwicket. he makes a sprawling save
short and fast on middle, pushed back
stoinis dares to step down the track, sundar drags his length back and hurls it at 103.4ks, stoinis swings and misses. de kock gathers the ball and takes the bails off
stoinis forays down the track, sundar pulls his length back on off, stoinis still launches it over the bowler's head, roughly in the direction of the sightscreen. shot, stoinis
floated outside off, driven off the front foot to long-off

an appeal for lbw, not given by umpire  deshmukh. rcb ask for a review. really full on middle, too full for the sweep, stoinis misses the shot. this could go onto hit leg stump. the tracker, however, suggests it would head past the leg stump. stoinis gets -999 and gets a leg bye
pushed through on leg stump, rahul drops down to -999 knee and deftly paddles it -999 fine of short fine leg for -999
fired outside off, whipped to cow corner off the back foot
slower legbreak, spins -999 outside off, driven with the spin to the covers
looks like a googly but the length is short, punched down to long-on
short dart outside off, solidly punched down to long-on
sliding into leg stump, worked with the angle through midwicket
quicker through the air, fizzes off the pitch, clipped through midwicket
rank half-tracker on the leg stump, rahul pounces onto it and smacks it flat and hard over deep square leg
pushed through on middle and leg, skids in, punched -999 to wide long-on. mandeep effects a direct hit at the bowler's end and concedes an extra run
length ball on middle, driven down to long-off
tossed on middle stump, dips, rahul does not meet the pitch., therefore, drags it off the inside half past midwicket
rahul ventures down the track, yorks himself, but digs it -999
goes over cover, beats the sweeper negi. bounces into the ropes. don't think he would've been too disappointed by a -999 either.
deflected past the keeper. that's his first boundary, would you believe it? yorker length outside off, he brings his bat down at an angle to run it down.
at the moment, he's dealing in just sixes. this slower ball is bowled at length, samson backs -999 and lofts this through the line to clear long on
squeezes this yorker into the off side for a quick -999

right into the blockhole, he's toe-ended a lofted hit straight to mid-off. the muted celebrations in the rcb camp tell you a story. when was the last time you saw kohli take a catch and quietly and lob the ball back to the umpire?
slices this full toss towards deep point
goes back and across as he punches this short ball to sweeper cover
slow turn from length outside off, steered to sweeper cover
reverse-swept to point, played a touch too early and gave -999 his intentions
fired wide, way outside off. easy call
flatter and fuller on middle, driven to cover
shapes to drive but misses. beaten by extra turn
makes room and punches this to umesh at point
dropped by de kock!  went for a drive but got a thick edge that deflected off the keeeper's gloves and beat short third man to the boundary
slow turn from length on outside off, turned back to the bowler
eased with the spin to long off
rocks back and hammers the pull deep into the stands at deep square. picked the length early, did samson
drifts in to squeeze off an inside edge back to negi
clean inside--999 strike over the infield, down to sweeper cover. got more elevation this time, safe however.
full toss sliding down leg, tickled down to fine leg where woakes covers good ground to effect a tumbling stop, saved -999 runs for the side
slants this full delivery down leg, will have to rebowl that
works this length ball from outside off towards midwicket, a direct hit at the bowler's end and  samson would've been gone
skiddy length ball on middle, tucked to square leg
helped into the stands at fine leg. too short and angling in, stokes was waiting for it as he swiveled back and used the pace to wallop that deep
splits the gap between short third man and point. used the width to good effect. opened the bat face slightly to pick the gap. lovely.
nearly chopped on! stepped -999 to slap this over cover but this length ball angled back in to cramp him for room.
drifting into middle and leg, tucked with the angle to deep square. end of a neat, little spell from washington.
another flatter -999 on off, pushed past the bowler as they jog the -999
once again makes room to go over the off side, but washington fires this in. punched down towards mid-off. superb bowling this.
steps -999 but washington fires this in, defended back
flatter on off, turned with the spin to long on again
clears long on effortlessly. just hit that length ball through the line, so much power off the bottomhand. stunning from samson
slower bouncer, pulled over square leg, lands short of the man coming in from the deep.
backs -999 and belts this full delivery to stokes at wide long-off. a misfield gives them an opportunity to take the second
tipped over the long-on boundary by gowtham. this was a short-arm jab and the ball flew off the blade. had he been right at the ropes, this could've been an easier catch
right into the blockhole, squeezed to point. superb from laughlin
goes over cover, gets this into the gap. wide long-off and deep cover converge to cut that off
slower and fuller outside off, squeezed to deep cover
mistimes the pull that he looks to fetch from way outside off, lands between deep midwicket and wide long-on
beaten by sharp turn. looks to lunge forward and jab. lovely from shreyas
squeezes this flick to square leg, off the mark
first he takes -999 kohli and now has ab. absolute half-tracker down leg, ab rocks back and pulls this straight to deep square leg. unadkat takes an excellent low catch.
this -999 keeps low to beat the underedge as he looked to punch
slow turn from length on off stump, ab defends. took his bottom hand off the grip
walks across the stumps and wrists this full delivery down to long on
he's sliced this over deep extra cover, seemed a mishit but boy, this has carried all the way.
squeezes -999 this yorker to cover, superb bowling this. excellent execution
walks across and whips this on the bounce to deep midwicket
steps -999 but gets yorked nearly as this tails in a long way. ab was more than halfway down the pitch when he was sent back but buttler doesn't pick up the ball cleanly. run--999 chance missed.
walks across the stumps and whips this cutter towards deep midwicket
walks -999 and steers this low full toss into the gap at deep point
slower ball gone wrong, slides this down leg even as kohli walks -999 to flick. pressure on stokes
full toss outside off, kohli opens the bat face to slice this drive on the bounce over point.
chips this flick shot into the gap at midwicket, down towards gowtham. can't prevent the second though
slower and fuller outside off, squeezed to extra cover
walks across the stumps and flicks this full delivery to deep square leg
he's welcomed with a fierce pull that leaves midwicket with no chance. kohli wallops that a couple of bounces into the ropes.
makes room and punches this length ball through extra cover, stokes was after it but the ball kept gathering pace as it raced off the turf.
drift and turn from middle, defended gently into the leg side
works this with the spin to long on
works this flatter length ball to midwicket
slaps this through cover. too short, he rocked back and used the width to crash that into the gap.
drifts in a low full toss, driven to wide mid-off
-999! another huge hit. jadeja gets into the act. and it was about time he did so! a length ball that jadeja gets on top of from the crease and hammers over long-on
short, wide, makes dhoni reach -999 and he can't because of the injury, chops it into the surface. and that's fifty for dhoni
humongous hit from dhoni! a juicy half-volley, right in the slot for dhoni to get underneath it and bludgeon it miles in the air and over cow corner
jadeja drills a fuller -999 very hard back at the bowler and mohit bumps into dhoni as he moves to his right to try and stop it
steps down the track to meet a low full toss and hammers it to long-off. just -999. back giving lots of trouble

in the air and missed chance. mayank dagar dives forward but the ball dips horribly on him and ends up sneaking from underneath to the boundary. a full toss that dhoni shovelled to the deep midwicket region

full toss, booming drive through the covers by jadeja. sweeper moves across to his left and they take him on for the second. sran slips on the follow through and get behind the stumps to gather the throw as dhoni comes rushing back
this is brilliant death bowling. a wide yorker and all jadeja can do is dig it -999 to point
short ball, jadeja doesn't get hold of it again as he mistimes a pull to backward square leg
was that a wide? touch and go. very full and -999 of jadeja's reach. seemed like it was probably just within the line but the umpire thinks otherwise

short, cuts into jadeja and gives him no pace, pulled -999 backward of square leg and this time they charge back for the second. rahul takes the bails off after gathering the throw but jadeja's well inside
slower ball, dips late and sneaks down the leg side
full, wide, in the blockhole, jadeja jams the bat down and makes no contact
shortish, some width, slapped -999 to the sweeper at the cover boundary
another yes and no. dhoni sends jadeja back but he manages to get back in comfortably after tapping a slower -999 to midwicket
short of a length, opens the face to point

ashwin with a direct hit. and look at him take off. and look at the kings xi dugout. a lightning quick piece of fielding from ashwin. rayudu drills it to extra cover and ashwin just swoops down in a flash and nails a direct hit at the striker's end after dhoni sends rayudu back
back-of-the-hand slower delivery, rayudu backs -999 and leaves it hoping for a wide. but well inside
a timely -999 from rayudu breaks the shackles. shuffles across to a shortish delivery and heaves a pull over backward square leg
rayudu skips down the track but sran shortens the length and rayudu slightly chips it in the air. well short of the bowler
full on the pads flicked off them to the left of deep square leg
rides the bounce of a shortish -999 and opens the face to point
length on off, 130.5ks, flicked to midwicket
back of a length, runs down to third man with an open face
leg-side length ball, flicked off the hips to deep fine leg

sran with another catch and he's too chuffed again as he hurls the ball in the air. vijay steps down the track, completely foxed by the slower -999 from tye, and chips it in the air. sran snaffles it at extra cover
that's too short. ruins what was a good over as vijay deposits it well over midwicket with a ferocious pull
a length ball with some room, opens the face real late to stab it to third man
full, angled in, flicked to midwicket
that's sublime timing! a length ball that pitches on middle and is slanted across, rayudu drives past ashwin diving to his right at mid-off
slower length ball at leg-stump, 100.6ks - could it get any slower? - as vijay knocks it to point
tries to flick a leg-side fuller -999 and wears it on the pad

there's the early -999 that kings xi were looking for as watson's caught at short fine leg. a back-of-the-hand slower ball from mohit and watson tries to whip it through the leg side. gets the timing all wrong and skews it in the air off the leading edge
back of a length on off, punched with an open face to agarwal at backward point
opens the face very late to punch a length ball to backward point
deft! hangs back in the crease and opens the face of his bat to a short of a length delivery and beats short third man diving to his left
full, shapes -999 to find the outside of his bat as he throws his hands at it and clears the in-field over point
fullish on off, punched to cover
tapped to point and he is sent back

that's another poor delivery. morris is nicely feeding to the batsmen's strengths here. lots of room outside off, and all he swings across without moving his feet but still manages good meat to clear long-on by a distance
and attempts a third hit through the same region, but gambhir had boult from square leg after those -999 boundaries, and karthik knocks it straight into the hands of the fielder there
-999 ball after being dispatched for -999, morris offers the same delivery again, and karthik responds with the same shot. through midwicket
fullish length, flicked off the pads, just a pick-up shot over midwicket
slower length ball around middle and leg, drops it into the off side for a quick -999
short of a length, stops on him a little as he closes the face early and gets an inside edge into the pad
slower short ball, gets up too much, and called a wide

good catch from jason roy at long-on. again no room for lynn as shami angles in a knuckle ball to his middle and leg stumps. lynn miscues it, gets no power behind it, and roy dives in front to snaffle a smart catch
back of a length, angled into him, backs -999 and swings across the line to get beaten
short of a length, backs -999 and absolutely shovels it, reaches boult in seconds and he does well to stop it at deep point
short and angled across, a bit of extra bounce as he slaps it off the upper portion of the bat to deep backward point
short of good length, angled into the body, turned -999 into the leg side
googly on a middle stump line, pushed anxiously back down the pitch
short of a length, bowled with the front of the hand. gets on the back foot and punches to long-on
length on middle, flicked to deep midwicket

top edge lands between short third and short fine. lucky. it's a very slow short ball and he's through the pull too early. keeper doesn't know where it is as this lifts over his head and the fielders can't reach it
he isn't taking kindly to the demotion! in the mood today, uthappa. no nudging around - puts a big front foot stride -999 and meets it as it lands on the pitch to send the slog sweep into orbit
tossed up at middle stump, allows it to come on and nudges it to deep midwicket from the crease
chips it back at the bowler. and that's the game for kkr. a googly, lobbed up nicely on middle stump. boult wants to flick through midwicket but he's done by the turn and finds the bowler
full ball floated wide outside off. lifts it inside--999 to sweeper cover
slower ball on middle and off, fairly full. lets it come and opens his bat face to steer to deep point

shot. unadkat looks for the off-stump yorker this time and doesn't miss his length by much. but rana takes a big step back into his crease to create some swinging room, and simply lifts it over mid-off
back of a length, angled across to off stump, punched to deep point

short on middle and leg, and karthik steps across and pulls it over the backward square leg boundary - picks -999 the short boundary on that side, and clears it despite only managing a 64m hit. didn't look to hit it too hard, just helped it and found the gap to the right of deep square leg
in the blockhole close to off stump, looks to make room to drive through the covers, ends up squeezing it down to long-on instead, off the inside half of the bat
down the track to the ball angled across to off stump, and clips it deliberately in the air, -999 bounce to stokes at deep midwicket
shot! that's speared in very full, outside off, and he opens his bat face deftly to pick up a boundary to fine third man
shortish again, this time he slaps it to the right of the man at deep point
shortish outside off, slapped -999 to the left of deep point

has stokes caught that cleanly? the umpires are going to have a look. in uthappa's slot for the lofted drive, which he hits hard and flat, but stokes is on the boundary at long-on. he was stepping backwards as he took the catch over his head, about to tumble past the boundary, so he flicked it in the air, then stepped on the rope, and managed to return to the field of play and complete the catch comfortably enough in the end. perhaps unwise of uthappa to take on the deep fielder in this situation, but he's played an excellent hand for kkr
angled into the pads again, and this time he sweeps it -999 to deep backward square leg
flat length ball angling into the pads, and rana tucks it -999 neatly, nice and fine and the man at deep backward square leg is too far from the ball to even be in the frame
yorker on middle and off, shuffles across to clip to deep square leg
low full-toss outside off, a bit of outswing on that, flicked deliberately in the air, without too much weight on the stroke, so it drops well short of deep midwicket
slower ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler

back of a length on off stump, punched towards extra-cover, and then takes off for the quick -999. rahane moved quickly to the ball, but he took a touch too long to turn and aim at the bowler's end, and rana would have made it home even if he had hit the stumps
slower length ball on off stump, presses forward and defends studiously
low full-toss close to off stump, and that's beautifully timed by rana. just opens his face slightly and sends it racing -999 to the left of the man sprinting from deep point
short, a bit of width, but there's a man at deep point to stop rana's cut
full on leg stump, clipped to long-on

oh my god. is that the widest leg-side wide in the history of the universe? thankfully for the keeper, it was a slower ball gone wrong, and it gave him plenty of time to move to his left and stop it running -999 for more runs
in the blockhole on off and middle, clipped down to long-on
length ball on the stumps, clipped -999 through midwicket

oh no, poor fielding on the rope from unadkat. length ball attacking the top of off stump and uthappa slaps it in the air, on the bounce, towards deep point. unadkat falls to his right to try and stop it, and doesn't cover for the ball spinning -999 from him - should have known because uthappa sliced it
back of a length, angling into off stump, waits on it and stabs firmly towards backward point, who makes a diving stop but lets the ball roll -999 to allow the -999
tries to reverse sweep, but checks his shot. full on leg stump, forcing buttler to pull -999 of the shot. still manages to play it towards the right-hander's cover area
half-tracker on off, and allows stokes to flat-bat it past tahir to long on. a loose delivery, that in all honestly, should've been deposited over cow corner
full and wide outside off, and buttler bunts this down the ground to long off
flighted full and wide outside off. stokes tries to drive -999 from his body and carves it to cover
gives it some air, and pitches full outside off. but stokes backs -999 towards the leg side, and crunches this drive past extra cover!
full on middle stump, and that's been pushed to wide long on. stokes wants -999, but chooses not to eventually
beaten by an inswinger. this is a full toss swinging into the corridor. he looks to whip it but the ball has changed trajectory and beaten the inside edge

legcutter, back of a length outside off. slapped powerfully towards extra cover where rayudu is slow getting the barrier down and cops it right on the knee cap. you don't want a swelling there, it's awful...he's going to limp off for some treatment...oh no. he walks till the boundary line with the physio and changes his mind. goes into deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, spanked on the up to sweeper cover
full on off stump, flicked to deep midwicket's right
length ball outside off, shuffles and flicks it between long-on and deep midwicket
bouncer. dug in too short. he allows it to pass over his shoulder
knuckle ball. fired down leg side. buttler was exposing the stumps in readiness for the ramp, but this was far too wide to make a connection
slower ball on a length, just outside off. shuffles and clips on the up to long-on
slow and short again. on the fourth-stump line, and dk misses the pull shot. the ball, once again, goes over his blade and through to rahul on the bounce
low full toss on off stump, and russell taps it with hard hands towards cow corner. he's off the mark
slower ball, short outside off. russell has to wait ages before the ball comes to him, and he misses the cut completely. bounces over russell's blade, and through to rahul on the bounce
short ball on off stump, but stays terribly low! defended off the back foot

bottom-edged to the keeper! the knuckle ball earns him the -999. full and wide outside off, and lynn actually followed him to the off side, but the ball's too low and it takes a feather edge. an excellent innings comes to an end
back of a length on off, and dk opens his bat's face to run it down to short third man. lynn scampers across to the danger end
flat and full around off, turns it -999 to midwicket
full on the pads, flicked through midwicket
tries to bowl it quicker on the pads and slides it down the leg side
goes for the same variation but this time it's on a length, and uthappa is able to shift back and comfortably tuck through backward square leg
now the conventional sweep. the back-of-the-hand that spins in actually, and uthappa sweeps through the fine leg boundary
length ball outside off, not much spin into hhim, and uthappa gets down to split the short third man region with a reverse sweep
sliding into middle and leg, and brushes the pad as he tries to flick
darts in a length ball at pace on middle, and lynn defends back
short, flat, and spinning in, lynn backs -999 and slaps it through point for -999

in the air, and brilliant catch by karun nair. looked for a moment as though this was the usual narine, making merry against spin early on. it was a back-of-the-hand variant from mujeeb, not quite the flipper, but it slides into narine's pads, and he steps down the track and mows this over long-on. nair moves to his right and slides in front to complete a brilliant catch
back of a length, slight turn -999, narine slaps it to point
back of a length, not much turn outside off, lynn punches through mid-off without feet
back of a length, angled in at middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
length ball that tails -999 a tad late outside off, lynn is a long way -999 from the line, and swings and misses
fullish, angled in at the pads, clipped to square leg
short of good length, gets on top of the bounce to flick to deep backward square leg
bangs in a back of a length delivery at middle and leg, and narine flicks off the pads to deep backward square leg
back of a length, shaping -999 outside off, lynn reaches -999 and pats it to deep backward point
ruins a good over with a leg-side fuller delivery that gayle gets down and sweeps through backward square leg
good length outside off, jams the bat down and blocks into the off side
back of a length, spinning -999, punched to point off the backfoot
shifts back to a length ball and punches to cover
length, spins -999, punched to cover
length ball, waits on the backfoot to long-on

ah, how rushed was gayle there? rana just fires this in at pace on gayle's off-stump and the batsman backs -999 and just about manages to bring the bat down. a fraction of a second late, and he would have been gone. imagine if the -999 had fallen that delivery! what a strange combination of circumstances that would have been to help kkr
this -999's shorter still and gayle backs -999 even further.. doesn't manage to get on top of it entirely, but manages to cart it over deep backward point
teases russell by foxing him into thinking he may come down the track but in reality just backs -999 to a slower delivery and slaps it -999 through point
full around off, clipped to mid-on
flicked off the hips to deep midwicket
full on middle and off, right within his swinging arc, and gayle deposits it over cow corner with a clean swing of the arms. off the inside part of the bat but he has so much power in those arms
short, pitches down the leg side, and gayle gets over it

crackalicious! how's that to win the match - a -999 over wide long-on with so much strength it's landed into the crowd. dhoni absolutely bludgeoned that by going across and swinging it over the cow corner like that night at wankhede in april 2011. bravo lifts his arms and goes across to embrace ms dhoni, who's cool as ever. harbhajan comes -999 and lifts dhoni!
another shortish ball outside off, bravo stays back and cuts it over point for -999
it's that trademark bravo loft over the covers. short ball on off, enough room for bravo to throw everything at it, big and hard hit and it's sailed over the off side
edged and just past the keeper for -999! he rolled his fingers over that short ball, it bounced well and bravo hooked, got an edge and it went just over de kock's leap
here comes the short ball, not a bouncer, and raina taps it with a horizontal bat to midwicket
138kmh and raina had no clue about that! what a beautiful length delivery from umesh, in the channel outside off, raina doesn't know whether to go back or forward, drives and misses
it's angled -999 outside off and raina dabs it tentatively to point
risky -999 the -999 as umesh's short of length ball squared up rayudu a bit, he defended it off the back foot towards cover and raina made it just in time
taps the back of length delivery from outside off to negi at point again, the crowd showes how much they love him
swings it -999 from length as rayudu helps it towards backward point where negi puts in a dive
caught at mid-on, negi has struck! wasn't the short on the stumps but watson went back to pull and miscued it, easy catch for mid-on
high and long! lunges forward for the length delivery and gets under the ball really well to send that flying over long on. negi shut his eyes as soon as watson launched it
bit too short and watson pulls but miscues it to backward square leg
comes down now and pushes the ball down the ground with the spin to mid off
leans forward for the length delivery and defends solidly
starts with a full delivery and watson drives it down to long off
full and outside off, yusuf clatters it back into the bowler's hands
straying on the pads and yusuf deflects it -999 to the fine leg boundary. rare bad ball from the death-overs specialist
bouncer - at top pace - and yusuf is comfortably beaten on the hook shot
clears his front leg to take care of a near-yorker on middle and leg. -999 to deep midwicket
opens the face and launches the intended wide yorker over extra cover. that's fifty, off 48 balls.
misses a leg-stump full toss and is struck on the pad. late inswing for tye
drives to long-off
goes for the late cut, and ends up taking the ball right off off stump. clooooose
shifts back, gets low, and scoop-pulls to fine leg. the umpire, however, says there is no bat involved and signals wide down leg

caught at deep midwicket! mujeeb, who took a cricket ball to his eye, is bowling like a champion. taking pace off the ball and preying on the pressure piling on the batsman. shakib goes for the slog. mistimes it badly and has to walk back
pops up but it's too far -999 from mujeeb, on his right, to be a chance. beautiful bowling from the young offspinner, holding the ball back, deceiving pandey in flight and dip.

oooh, that cuts back in sharply off the pitch. the length is such that the left-hander thinks it is ripe to cut. but with the ball spinning the wrong way, shakib has to work overtime in pulling the shot off
follows the batsman as he makes room and as a result, pandey can only push it to long-off for a -999
overpitched wide outside off, and it's an attempted drive from pandey. comes off the bat's toe end but sneaks through between the umpire and non-striker. man at long on, however
back of a length outside off, and manish makes some extra way. opens his bat's face and slices a cut to short third man
slower ball, on a good length. wide outside off, and pandey's been deceived by the pace once again. tries to cut but the ball goes over his blade

slower ball again. back of a length outside off, and mistimes the pull again. comes off the bat's bottom-half and trickles -999 towards midwicket. the lack of pace behind that shot allows him to come back for another run
short on middle, and shakib's quick to swivel and pull. but mistimed towards midwicket, which allows them to scamper across for -999
good length outside off, and starts off with the cutter. pandey's through his drive too early, and takes a thick-ish edge. falls just short of point though. well deceived!
pokes it into the covers and looks for a -999 off the misfield. shakib says no.
top effort at short cover, tiwary diving to his left to stop a scorching drive

blistering hit! he is such a clean striker, especially with the cut shot. and he will have plenty of opportunity to play that on this bouncy pitch. third man and point may as well be doing the crossword
back of a length on off stump, blocks it
dude should have been -999 last ball, instead he gets a hip-high full toss as a free hit and launches it to the square leg boundary. this is the craziest powerplay ever!

picks -999 third man! what is happening?! shakib takes aim at a short and wide delivery and top-edges it straight down to third man. oh, but wait! it's a no-ball! shakib gets a life now! that's -999 wickets mucked up by kings xi within the first 32 deliveries of the game.
goes for the drive on the up - a dangerous shot on a bouncy pitch. finds cover
fittingly, iyer finishes the innings with a -999. banged in short and outside off, iyer holds a stable base and muscles it to the right of long-off again
pitched up and angling across off, iyer anticipates it. he jumps across off and swats it -999 to the right of long-off with the bottom hand
mavi has lost his head and line. iyer jumps across off, mavi sprays it past the marker. off-side wide
banged in short and outside off, iyer hangs deep in the crease and pulls it flat and hard over midwicket for yet another -999

101ks slower ball, dips outside off, iyer does not pick the change-up. he swishes so hard that he loses his shape and under-edges it back to dk behind the stumps. they search for a -999 but maxwell is sent back. the keeper passes the ball to mavi, who clips the top of the bails with an over-arm throw

change of angle? it does not matter. full and angling -999 outside off. iyer anticipates it. shuffles across off, like dhoni did the other night in bengaluru, and smokes it over the wide long-on boundary
mavi ventures wide of the crease, bowls a full -999 outside off, iyer backs -999 outside leg. he manufactures more swinging room and lifts it inside--999 over extra cover for another -999
maxwell ventures outside leg, chawla fires it at 103ks outside off, flat-batted to long-off
95ks, darted in from wide of the crease, cramps the batsman and pings the thigh pad
flat and heading into the pads, picked off to deep square leg
really full on middle, driven down to long-on for -999
front-of-the-hand slider, chopped to short third man
back of a length and fizzes through outside off, goes back and punches to cover
short to end the over! on middle stump, and iyer's happy to duck under this. collected by dk from near his face
offcutter on middle stump, smothers this towards the leg side off his pads, and played gently enough to take the second run
full on of stump, and that's a crunching drive off the front foot. excellent sound of the bat, but straight to cover
short and wide outside off. he gets on top of the bounce, and slashes a cut to deep backward point
back of a length on the fourth-stump line. forces iyer to tiptoe, and defended off the back foot
good length on off, and shaw mistimes a punch to long on. gets his captain on strike
saved by the lack of timing! looked to pull this off-cutter but the bat face turned in his hand, on the bounce to long on.
drills this to mid-off, rohit wanted the -999 but was sent back
flicked up and over, down to deep midwicket
works this full delivery from outside off towards wide long on
steps -999 and slaps this to raina at cover. he fires a throw at the bowler's end but lewis reacts quickly to plonk his bat back in
skiddy length ball, bunted to cover
punched off the backfoot back to the bowler. top over from harbhajan; just -999 off it
and again. fuller this time, and lewis drives but raina tumbles to his left again to stop it
brilliant stop by raina at mid-off as lewis slaps this off the backfoot and raina dives to his left to intercept it
short of a length around off, punched from the crease
length, spinning in, tucked -999 to square leg
shuffles across and punches -999 to sweeper cover
throws his hands at a wide -999 and gets a thick outside edge towards third man
length, angled across, shuffles across and blocks back
short of a length outside off, punched through the covers
full, angled across, driven to sweeper cover
fullish outside off, drilled -999 to sweeper cover
short of a length outside off, punched -999 but can't get it past extra cover
length, angled in, turned -999 to square leg off the inside of the bat
length ball outside off, mistimes a punch towards the bowler, who lets it go through him but mid-off tidies up
leg-side fuller ball, and he gets maximum reward for it. just times a flick off his pads and heaves it right over backward square leg. top timing
flicks a length ball through square leg
run -999 chance but he's made it> drills a fuller -999 from outside off towards mid-on and sets off straight -999. could a direct hit have had him in some trouble?
short of a length around off, blocked from the crease
ah, throws water on a good, tight over with this legside back of a length delivery that lewis swivels and helps along to the fine leg boundary
flashes hard at the sight of width but it's pacy and he isn't entirely behind the line as the ball shoots past the outside edge
short of good length, angled across around the fifth-stump line, lewis stands tall and punches to point who moves to his right and stops it
left alone outside off
fullish length, flicked off the pads through midwicket
much better. a length ball that's angled across and straightens around the fourth or fifth-stump channel, left alone
short of a length, down the leg side as it gets past lewis' attempted flick. csk can't afford loose deliveries like this
slashes this straight down the throat of third man. yusuf looked to upper cut, this -999 didn't bounce as much as he would've liked. easy catch, archer continues to impress with every outing.
right into the blockhole again, squeezed to point
whips this full delivery to deep midwicket. bowled at 141.9kph
short on middle, pulled all along the ground to deep midwicket where -999 fielders converge. pandey wanted the second, yusuf wasn't ken
bunts this length ball to point as they scamper a -999.

the inswinging yorker has done the trick. gets this to bend back in a long way from outside off from around the stumps, shakib jams his bat down late as the ball bounces into the stumps. 'should -999, should -999 not?' the ball thought to itself before disturbing the bails
slash and a miss. tried to smack the cover off the ball, beaten. into the stroke too early.
slower length ball outside off, he backs -999 and punches this to cover.
clears his front leg, gets down on -999 knee and lofts this over extra cover. mid-off was inside the ring so it was a safe stroke.
touch short, he rocks back and cuts this into the gap at sweeper cover
length ball, stops on him a touch as he looks to slap this cover, but hits it straight to the fielder and hustles a -999
back of length outside off, slaps this length ball straight to cover.
works this slower length ball from outside off towards deep midwicket.  excellent half-century
looks to swing over long off, gets a thick outside edge that flies to the third man boundary. streaky but it doesn't matter
works this length ball on middle and leg towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
change of angle, no problem. slaps this length ball over extra cover, raced to the boundary in a jiffy.
steps -999, opens up the off side and lofts through the line to clear long off. as stylish as it gets. superb balance
paddled wide of the keeper. slower length ball on middle, he got outside the line and helped it along the way.
slower delivery down leg, eased to fine leg.
excellent wrist work to flick this from outside off but tripathi throws himself to his right to effect a -999-handed stop. saved a couple of runs.
slower and fuller delivery that angles in from wide of the crease, defended towards midwicket
driven hard to sweeper cover

drilled back past the bowler, no chance for mid off. k gowtham hared around the ropes from long on to put -999 a diving stop. super stuff. saved -999 runs. -999 just think both batsmen assumed that will be a boundary.
angles in a short ball, pulled down to fine leg
leans into the drive, eases this straight to extra cover
forces this length ball wide of mid off, good work by unadkat
lands the offcutter at length on middle and off, punched to midwicket
gets this to bounce from length on off stump, dabbed behind the stumps as they scamper through
shapes -999 late. this is much fuller and starts off from middle, kw is squared up a touch as he defends.
too much width, williamson stands still and slaps this through point when it finally arrives.
slow turn back in from off stump, punched to long on.
works this shortish delivery to square leg, cramped for room once again.
works this gently with the spin to the leg side
eases this full delivery down to long on
works this with the spin to deep midwicket

chopped on! shortened his length, got this to drift in from around the stumps, dhawan looks to steer this past slip after first looking to sweep, but didn't have the room and ends up hitting it onto his stumps off an inside edge. his third failure in a row now.
short and flat on middle and leg, punched to midwicket
turns this straight to square leg. tight bowling so far from kg
sweeps and misses. no turn, looked to fetch it from outside off as well.
fired full and flat on the stumps, defended back
works this from length on middle towards midwicket
fired full on off stump, worked with the spin past midwicket

lovely! mandeep hasn't had too much of the strike but he's been very productive with it in this over. skidder at a length outside off, with some swing in. stays deep in the crease and gets his bottom hand under this to whip it over long-on
short ball at middle stump, pulled to deep midwicket
short and turning into the body. punches to long-on off the back footsh
swatted over deep midwicket. mandeep has nailed this slog sweep against the offbreak. good stride, clean hit. that's the fifty partnership
very short ball on the stumps, mistimes the pull shot and it lands short of deep midwicket. not done very well against half trackers this season...
short of a length outside off, punched straight to cover point
googly, back of a length at middle stump. tapped to midwicket off the back foot
half-tracker and he gets an inside edge after getting on the back foot for a pull. was really looking to launch this. ended up getting -999 runs down at fine leg
leading edge. this is why kohli is tentative against kuldeep. hasn't picked this googly as he looks to flick through midwicket
googly, short of a length and going -999 from off stump. gets on the back foot and tickles it through square leg
full on middle stump, and yet another watchful drive from kohli. this -999 to long-on
good length ball turning in at the stumps. tapped to midwicket
he is sweeping everything. pitched up outside off but lynn plants his long leg across and...sweeps
much flatter and quicker, lynn tries to sweep again and misses!
sweeps it in the air  but it lands safely beyond square leg as lynn went a fair bit across to off
a wrong'un around off and he goes back to push it into the covers for -999

the flight has worked, he holes -999 to long on! it was pitched up with a lot of revs, uthappa got near the ball nicely, struck it hard and straight but southee was waiting there at long on with his long arms. ashwin is pumped!
too much flight, too wide outside off with the turn and it's a wide
nicely flighted outside off, lynn moves towards the ball and bunts it down to long on
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat. de grandhomme searches for a quick -999 but he has been sent back. kishan can't throw down the stumps

southee tees off but he can't clear the short boundaries at the chinnaswamy either. back of a length and outside off, southee drags this slower ball to cutting at long-on. fine overhead catch from the australian
full-toss on the hips, swatted -999 to deep midwicket
wide of the crease, another slower cutter, another swing and a miss. the crowd has been hushed into silence
slower cutter outside off, he swings early and does not connect
off-stump yorker, jammed -999 to short fine leg
wide of the crease, chest-hunting ball, angling in, kohli rides the bounce and works the ball -999 through square leg
slower -999, again, short, wide, flat-batted to the off-side sweeper now
mid-off had just dropped back to the boundary before this ball, and baz swats this knuckle ball -999 to the left of suryakumar. he waits for the slower ball and forces it -999
back of a length on middle, climbs over the stumps, as baz swings hard, loses his shape, and misses
full-toss on middle stump, baz ventures across off stump, goes low, and scoops the free-hit ball over the keeper's head like a boss for -999. 13 runs off -999 legal ball
baz charges down the track, hardik darts a chest-high full-toss, spliced up and over the keeper. hits the ad boards on the flush. that's -999. the crowd finds its voice again
short and on off, kohli drops the ball to backward point and sets off for a risky -999. baz jams his bat into the ground and loses his bat. a direct hit from duminy could have had mccullum
back of a length and skidding into the pads, picked off through midwicket
full and spins -999 outside off, dragged across the line and against the turn to wide long-on
pushed through on off, presses forward and bunts to point
slower through the air and breaks -999 outside off, big swing and a miss
full and drifts in on middle, nurdled to square leg
flighted on middle, full, backs -999 and drives it to sweeper cover, where pollard puts in a sliding save to his left
slower ball, back of a length, climbs over middle stump as de kock swings early and misses again
de kock clears his front leg, backs -999 outside leg, this is fuller and nipping -999 outside off. de kock throws his bat at the ball but does not make contact
keeps it on a back of a length, the line is outside off, vohra rides it down to deep third man
back of a length and angling -999 just a shade outside off, possibly a slower ball, de kock waits on it before dabbing it to the leg side with soft hands
back of a length on middle, nearly 145ks, vohra dares to step down the track and only drags it off the inside half past the right of mid-on
back of a length and outside off from wide of the crease, punched through the line to extra cover

overpitched outside off, but the slower -999 does him in. tried to slog it towards deep midwicket again, but this time it's a -999-handed shot. doesn't have the distance, and stokes - at long on - settles under it
full and wide outside off, big stride forward but the drive's been mistimed
we often see a -999 fall after the time--999, but rarely a -999! offcutter outside off stump, but too wide. pant winds up, and thumps it over cow corner

iyer holes -999! a slower delivery outside off, iyer backs -999 and chips an uppish drive to long-off. he wanted to hit that straighter, but the cut on the offcutter took that -999 from the bat, which meant he could only slice the ball. tripathi just about holds on.

a slower offcutter around leg, pant goes through the shot, but it takes the glove towards buttler. he throws directly at the bowler's end, the ball ricochets -999. stokes runs around and lets the ball go through his legs. that's very sloppy
a slower ball outside off, chopped to third man. that's iyer's fourth fifty in five matches
that's the fourth -999 he's gone for. some more flight outside off, pant has had enough of plodding about. swings through the line and lifts the ball comfortably over long-on
81 kph, the googly, pitches outside leg. pant unwinds and looks for a slog sweep but misses. he's struck on the pad
nicely bowled, some flight and dip, around off, defended back
the googly, on middle and off, blocked back

chipped back to the bowler! it's a legbreak, around middle, extracts some turn. shaw stays in the crease, looks to drive the ball to long-off, but he's not in a great position. because of the turn, all he can do is hit a leaden-footed poke back to gopal

-999 more. that's the third -999 he's conceded. runs down to the pitch of the legbreak, knows it's wide outside off so the off side is a better shot. and drills a lofted drive over cover. just clears the boundary
-999 more, into the stands! this -999 is dropped short, around off. iyer rocks back and swats a pull over deep midwicket. great hit again. playing the spinner's probabilities
the quicker -999, iyer knew what was coming. all he does is chip a lofted flick over long-on. full and very quick, smashed!
it's very full again, around off. iyer clears his front leg and powers a drive to cover, all along the ground.
90 kph, flat on middle and off. iyer comes down and misses a flick, struck on the thigh pad
a googly, outside off, swept to deep square leg. too full
the googly outside off, just outside off, chopped -999 to point.
slower ball, wide outside off and buttler goes chasing after it again. misses the shot this time though, and through to pant on the bounce
good length outside off, and pulled over deep midwicket! backed -999 to show all -999 stumps, but great connection off the bat
short on leg stump, but short can't put it -999. mistimes his pull, and the ball goes towards the leg side
good length just outside off, and his punch finds the inside edge. races down to fine leg
full toss on middle stump, and buttler's leg-side slog goes behind square. no -999 there, and buttler earns another boundary
full toss on leg stump, and mistimes this towards deep extra cover
slower ball bouncer outside leg stump. tries to back -999 and hit it but misses. the ball goes between him and the stumps
good length, wide outside off. slapped off the back foot to shaw at cover, whose diving effort saves a boundary

tough chance, but dropped by pant! good length outside leg stump because buttler was shuffling across to the off side. misses the pull, and the ball hits his gloves as it goes down the leg side. but just too wide of the keeper
short on leg stump, and short checks his pull shot. it was the slower ball again, and he plays it to short fine leg
back of a length, but wide outside off. buttler tries to pull, but can only drag his shot to square leg
full outside off, and just the right length for buttler to get under it. picks the offcutter early, and thumps this inside -999 over cover

he strikes! it was the slider, came down again but the ball was much flatter and shorter. kishan runs down, and is nowhere near the pitch. that means the ball has enough room to turn, it finds a big gap between bat and pad to knock into the stumps.
slog-swept, t20'd -999 over midwicket. kishan trusts his form and instinct, saw some flight and decided early, smashed over midwicket
flat and wide outside off, carved -999 towards extra cover for a run
smashed for -999 into the gap at midwicket. flat around middle, hardik thrashes that with ease
flat and wide outside off, slapped to long-off. -999 more.
flat and wide outside off, flat-batted to deep cover
good length on off, and grips & turns -999 from kishan. tries to defend but takes the outside edge. falls safe however
full on off, and kishan shimmies down the -999. defends eventually
full just outside off, and kishan takes a big stride forward to defend
shorter on off, and he backs -999 to pull it straight down the ground. man at long on
good length outside off, and spins into sky's pads. defended towards mid on
full just outside off, and defended off the back foot
pulled from outside off to deep midwicket

dhawan has made a right royal mess at long off.  the harbour bridge as they'd call it in australia. iyer belted this full toss down to long off, dhawan failed to bend down properly. what should've been a -999 is now -999.
rolls his wrists nicely to play this half pull from outside off to deep square leg
slogs and misses. through the stroke early, beaten completely by this slower delivery.

lucky to get -999 with a juicy full toss, punched to long on
yorker-length outside off, squeezed to point
angles a length ball across, steered behind point
back of length angling into middle and leg, worked off his hip to deep midwicket
looks to arch back and upper cut this short delivery, beaten by the zip
has he gloved this? big appeal but the umpire is unmoved. iyer looks to hop across and whip this but misses. the ball may have brushed his thigh pad on the way
back of length outside off, he stands tall and punches to deep cover
full outside off, and that's been worked towards the leg side. no -999's in the deep, so srh finish with a boundary. sunrisers win by seven wickets!
full on leg stump, but yusuf backs -999 to the leg side to drill this straight down the ground. only a -999
short on middle, and that's been pulled. yusuf top-edges it, and that's perfectly fine, since short fine leg was inside the circle
full toss way outside off, and yusuf leans into this loosener. bends his knee, and pumps it over the bowler's head. straight into the sightscreen

short and wide outside off, and that's been flat-batted towards the bowler. christian drops the catch, but manages to go towards mid on to collect the ball. then has a shy at the stumps, and hey, it's a direct hit! williamson's just in. so that's -999 to the total.

a beauty! ball of the tournament. good length on leg stump, and spins across hales' body as he tries to defend. he's on the back foot, and the ball whooshes past his outside edge, and crashes into off stump. a legspinner's dream ball. time -999
good length on middle, and spinning into dhawan. he shuffles across to the leg side and pushes towards long off
full toss on leg stump, and that's been put -999! quick bat speed, and swept towards the backward square boundary
full just outside off, and that's been smashed past mishra's left. long off patrolling the boundary
short on middle, and no real spin this time. allows dhawan to stay on the back foot and pull towards deep midwicket
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to paddle this fine down the leg side
snakes back in full from wide of the crease, dhawan defends.
slower length ball that he punches down to long on
chops this attempted cut into the off side, christian hares across to stop that
slides a length ball into middle and leg, worked off his hip to deep square leg
pulled but gets this high on the bat, so no timing or power. down to deep midwicket
swats this short delivery to deep midwicket

very poor from plunkett. too short and angling down, dhawan helps this down past short fine leg. he'll put those -999 in his sleep. not the kind of ball you want to be bowling to someone who has a highest of 11 in his last five innings!
controls the pull to keep this all along the ground, down to deep square
drags this pull from way outside off to square leg, no timing again.
backs -999 but plunkett follows him by bowling -999 fuller, worked to midwicket
helped over short fine leg. too short and angling in, hales walked across and picked his spot. too easy
lucky to get -999 with that! too short and outside off, hales thumps this straight to point
makes room and flays this -999-going length ball to deep point
back of length angling -999, plays inside the line as this whizzes past.

oh, dear. maxwell! what have you done?  will that prove to be the difference? straight in, straight -999 at deep square leg. avesh hits the deck hard again with this short ball, rushed onto hales as he pulled from outside off, got more elevation than distance. maxwell came running in, trembled and never looked like taking it as it descended. gosh!
clever, very clever. made room to slap this over point but avesh cramped him for room. hales now changes his stroke and uses the pace to help this wide of short third man.
beaten for pace! shapes to pull from outside off but played too late.
helps the pull over mishra at short fine. too short and angling in from wide of the crease and he was ready for this.
full outside off, and driven straight past johnson's right. man at long on cleans up
slower ball to end the over. cutter on leg stump and further angling into duminy. tried to slog it towards the leg side but deceived completely
short and wide outside off, but way too wide on this occasion. duminy tried his best, however, to slap it over the infield
short! duminy sways to get under the line of the ball. a well-directed bouncer from johnson
sees the batsman charging down, and johnson goes short and wide. forces duminy to reach at it, and he can't get bat to ball!
full on middle and leg, and duminy clips it off his toes to the sweeper fielder on the leg side
good length outside off, and lifted over johnson's head. tried to swing through that arc, but comes off the bat's toe end
cutter outside off, but the umpire thinks it's too wide. hardik had let it go anyway. johnson's not pleased with the umpire's call. looked like it was just inside the tramlines though!
slower offcutter, grips and bounces, poked to the covers. well-deserved break for suryakumar and myself
full and outside off, forward and driven through the line to cover
short, wide, stays leg-side of the ball and scythes it -999 to the off-side sweeper
very full and angling wide of off, dragged off the inside half to the leg side
too full and too straight, picked off to deep midwicket
back of a length and skipping -999 outside off, beats the outside edge near the higher part of the bat
way too wide outside off, and uthappa leans into this -999. swats it over markande's head, and the ball lands on the sightscreen!
picks the googly beautifully! full outside off, and slogs this with the spin over deep midwicket! sixth ipl batsman to get to 4000 runs. what a way to reach the milestone.

narine has thrown axar off his line and length. short and slid past the tramline, off-side wide
104.3ks dart outside off, but this is just too full, narine gets under the length and carts it up and over axar's head for a straight -999
short dart on middle and leg, back-foot punch to deep midwicket
dragged shorter and sliding -999 outside off, narine inside-edges a pull past leg stump
arm ball from around the stumps to uthappa too. he hangs back and secures a -999 through midwicket
back of a length and angling across off, 99ks, slapped -999 to sweeper cover
pushed through outside off, the new ball doesn't turn, narine stays leg-side of the ball and scythes it over cover-point. karn nair chases the ball hard, slides, and hauls it into play
slider from wide of the crease, no room at all, squeezed into the leg side
tossed outside off, narine presses forward and drives to the right of extra cover
on a length and fizzes through outside off, narine plays for turn and is beaten on outside edge

back of a length and width outside off, lynn punches it through the line but can't piece the packed off-side infoeld
much fuller and outside off, lynn does not meet the pitch, and lets the hands do all the work. flayed to cover
back of a length and climbs on off, lynn ventures deep in the crease and fends it off

back of a length, angling in towards off, then nibbles -999 in the channel, lynn watches it through to rahul
takes the pace completely off this, only 97.5kph. shankar tries to slog it over cover, but inside-edges it towards square leg
appeal for caught behind, but not given! and rcb don't have a review either. it was short on middle, and he pull didn't come off. rcb believe he's top-edged it to the keeper, but replays say no
nice yorker outside off, but sharma is up to the challenge nonetheless. bends his knee, opens his bat's face, and squeezes it -999 to deep point
slower ball, but wide outside off. shankar waits for it this time, before driving it square. negi at deep cover though
full toss outside off, and he (almost) makes full use of that free-hit! smacked it to the long-off boundary, but umesh takes a catch there. they take -999

it's the slower ball, and pushed full and wide outside off. shankar is forced to check his big wind-up, and muscles this down the ground to long on. free hit because there weren't enough people inside the circle
wide yorker outside off, but sharma's through his attempted drive already. slices it over point to the man at the boundary
good length on off, and that's been fended -999 from his body. but takes the bat's toe end, and comes to siraj's left. he tries to take a diving catch, but the ball was just too low!
good length on middle stump, and tapped back to siraj off the back foot. sharma wants the -999, but siraj is quick to recover
back of a length on middle, and that gathers some extra bounce! forces sharma to sway -999 from the ball's line
full outside off, and that's beautifully lifted to the long-off boundary. what a start to your ipl career!
back of a length on off, and it's the offcutter. clipped off his hips to midwicket, and that gets the debutant on strike

full on off, and angling into his pads. iyer lifts it off his toes towards long on, but kohli's manning the cow-corner boundary. holds on to it despite being some ten feet inside the boundary line. iyer's sluggish innings ends. time -999 as well
back of a length on middle, and extra bounce this time! mistimes a leg-side whip to the man at midwicket
back of a length on off, and worked off his hips to the man at deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, and it's been carved off the back foot to point
back of a length on middle, and shankar opens the leg side and pulls it fine past short fine leg! uses his wrists to play it well
nice shape! good length outside off and shaping slightly inwards. he tried to glance it fine, but the ball just goes past his outside edge
good length on middle, and iyer walks across to the off side to tap it towards midwicket
short of a length outside off, shreyas slaps it and point flings himself to his right to make a brilliant stop
short ball that angles in and climbs onto him, arches -999 of the line
back of a length, slower at 106.8ks, flicked behind square leg
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked into the leg side
length ball on leg stump, whips it -999 to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, but he's taken the pace off this time. the batsman cuts this off the back foot to deep point
short outside off, and drilled straight down to boult at long on. just -999
makes it look soo easy! full on off, and ab shuffles across to the off side, gets down on -999 knee, and ramps it over the keeper's left! mr. 360!

harshal hits kohli this time! no malice though. a soft shot towards cover had the batsmen running for a -999, but harshal ran there to try and break the stumps at the non-striker's, but the throw finds kohli instead
is harshal okay? looks alright. full outside off and kohli came dancing down the ground before driving it towards the bowler. hits his palm on the full!
good length on off, but angling into kohli. tries to punch towards cover, but comes off the bat's inside half. goes towards midwicket
full outside off again, and this time the drive's been crunched! but stopped by the fielder at cover
flighted outside off, but too wide. ab takes a big stride towards the pitch of the ball, and lifts it over the extra-cover boundary. the margin of error that the bowler can afford is minimal
full just outside off, and defended back to mishra
flat on middle, and sliding through to kohli. punched off the back foot to the long-on boundary
wild spin, and well stopped by pant! full outside off, and legspin that goes further -999 from kohli. forced pant to dive to his right
almost a yorker on middle stump, and ab bunts it -999 towards the vacant midwicket region. forces the bowler to go chasing after it
flighted outside off, and driven with the spin. smothers it to deep extra cover
back of a length outside off, and this time there's some extra bounce. kohli works it towards square leg, and that's the time -999
slower ball, outside off, and de villiers muscles this towards the leg side. that area is packed by outfielders though
back of a length outside off, and that's been flat-batted to long on for a walking -999
back of a length on middle, and that's been glanced fine down the leg side! fifty for him, his 34th in the ipl
slower ball, but full toss on middle stump. flicked off his pads to deep midwicket, but he calls nice and early for -999. dala took a tumble on his bowling followthrough
full on off, and kohli chops it onto his toes! ouch. it was almost a yorker, and kohli inside-edges his cover drive
floated up outside off, driven to long-off
back of a length ball on off, whipped between long-on and deep midwicket
length, spins -999 outside off, moves across and tucks to midwicket

length on middle and off, blocked
too full outside off, another languid drive from kohli. smooth swing and tremendous follow-through as he crunches through extra cover
turns this gently into the leg side, that's that. csk cruise home in style with an over to spare.  they're all but into the playoffs.

walks across the stumps and works this length ball to square leg.  that's rayudu's century, what a knock!  points to someone in the coaching staff, does a circle around his head and then walks up to dhoni to give him a hug. lovely knock. -999 haven't seen rayudu smile like this ever before. -999've only seen him angry
squeezed down to third man to bring rayudu on strike
slams this pull to deep square leg. neither deep midwicket nor fine leg moved. ferocious strike
lands short of third man! rayudu went over mid-off, ended up slicing it towards third man.
banged in short, rayudu leaves. umpire signals -999 bouncer for the over. he shaped to pull but decided to let go late
full on middle, eased down to long-on, again
leans back and punches to sweeper cover
floated full on off, bunted to long-on off the front foot
goswami gathers the throw from kane williamson and catches watson short. rayudu pushes it to cover, and they chance a quick -999. but watson isn't quick enough. some respite for sunrisers
rayudu uses his feet, speared wide, swished to extra cover
looped up on leg stump, rayudu dashes down the track and launches it into the wind. into the midwicket boundary
skidder just a shade outside off, chopped to backward point
quicker ball, thigh-high short ball outside off, this 104ks dart is swatted off the back foot to the midwicket fence
another googly, sliding into the hips, helped wide of short fine leg for -999
googly spins from outside off, watson does not read it, slog-sweeps and does not make contact
straighter -999 on off, 97.4ks, tip and run to cover
back of a length and breaks -999 outside off, rayudu flashes and sends an outside edge to short third man
works this off his hip to midwicket
shows the full face of the bat as he defends to mid on
touch ahead of length on off, defended towards cover
beats point, races to the point boundary. once again there's width from sandeep, watson used the pace to steer this wide
reaches -999 to drive, mistimes this to extra cover
floats this full on off, watson punches this into the cover region to get off the mark with a couple
gets a fuller dart at 146.-999 ks first-up, and he drives it -999 to sweeper cover

and now unadkat grabs a chest-height catch. rohit is -999 first ball, and mumbai are losing some ground. rohit flays a pull to this short ball but it goes straight to long leg. that was travelling and unadkat reverse-cups and falls over as he completes the catch. that's a brilliant piece of fielding
tries to pull this short -999 but skews it in the air off the top part of the bat. unadkat at long leg moves forward and takes a superb low catch. around shin height
back of a length, misses the flick behind square as the ball goes off the hip
short outside off, lewis punches to mid-off off the bottom of the bat. he's struggling through these middle overs here. need to find some fluency
short of a length outside off, gets on top of it and opens the face to backward point who dives and prevents the -999
shortish, fails to time a pull between long-on and deep midwicket
advances down the ground and gets no elevation as he chips it -999-bounce to long-on off the toe-end
length ball, spins -999 slightly towards off, pushed back to the bowler
full and straight on middle, blocked off the front foot into the covers
googly, on a length, shuffles and works against the turn to midwicket

on the pads, no room to free the arms, and rahane settles for a measured nudge to square leg
flicked off the legs to fine leg
shuffling feet and pushed into the covers
marching down to meet the pitch, and deposited back over the bowler's head! such poise, power and timing
bottom-handed punch down to long on
that's a good response from pandya, shorter and sharper, tempting buttler into the ramp shot, but the ball is through him too quickly. cat-and-mouse stuff in that over
another attempted scoop, another non-connection. nothing ventured, nothing gained...
blam! so much bottom hand! over-pitched, in the arc, and utterly butchered for a -999-bounce -999 through long-off

more wristy flipping, from a good length on off stump -999 through backward square.

back of a length, into the body, flinched to the leg side, that's a better over for mumbai
a change of pace from mitch, clipped off the pads but well stopped at short midwicket
chiselled off the pads, -999 to deep midwicket
fizzing through to the keeper, short, sharp, aggressive ... and wide
that's a good length for these conditions, just back of full, skidding into the body, and duly defended to the leg side
flipped off the legs to backward square leg
on the back foot, left-arm over the -999, buttler slides back to meet the ball under his nose, deep in his crease

back of a length, backs -999 and punches it -999 to sweeper cover
length on middle and off, blocked off the front foot
drifts it onto the pads, tries to flick it -999 but gets hit on the pad. pitching outside leg
full and sliding into the pads, clipped -999 through square leg
back of a length, straightening around off, backs -999 and cuts to point

oh what a shot! finch has generated an unbelievable amount of power for a straight-batted shot to clear the extra cover boundary. very full and just outside off and this is so smooth - a clean lift to clear the ground
full on off stump, driven straight to mid-off
short of a length just outside off, gets inside the line and slices to third man

short of a length just outside off, gets on his toes and taps it to point

bowled him! good old spinner's -999 - keep the -999 option open to a nervous batsman and bowl at his stumps. stoinis looks like he wants to push it through covers but has pushed his front foot too far forward in anticipation. yorks himself and loses his off stump
dropped very short outside off but he can only get the pull straight to long-on

dropped. finch lunges to his right at mid-off but can't hold onto this miscued shot. kohli steps -999 again and turns this into a full toss. but his attempted shot is right off the toe-end and he ends up chipping it
slices over the off-side infield. rajpoot getting special treatment. length ball on off stump and kohli is jumping down the pitch before if lands. makes room and carves it over point

boom! kohli was setting up for that shot with rajpoot still -999 metres -999 from delivering. length ball on middle stump, he has taken a tiny step into the leg side and whipped this well over the midwicket boundary

good stop by tripathi. full and wide outside off, caressed -999 towards cover. tripathi dives to his left
and again! 146 kph, back of a length outside off, the ball pitches and moves -999 again. beaten quite convincingly
the beautiful test -999--999! a nice full delivery that pitches and moves -999. rana's feet are rooted and his drive is beaten
rana too has struggled against the bouncer already this ipl. a bouncer outside off, rana avoids that watchfully.
too full and lynn says why bother bowling there? an overpitched, hit-me, half-volley outside off. lynn gently drills the drive through cover for -999.

taken at deep square leg! 144 kph, it's another short delivery. another well-directed bouncer. uthappa struggles to time the ball or keep it down. he does neither and picks -999 the fielder. stokes is using that length exceptionally well. harried for pace.
nice timing. on the pads and flicked -999 nonchalantly into the gap at midwicket for -999.
doesn't carry to mid-on! another good delivery, back of a length on the body. he is so rushed on that that he splices the ball towards midwicket. mid-on can't get around in time to catch
keeps low? back of a length down leg, lynn looks to pull, but the ball keeps a tad low. he is hit on the thigh or midriff
good -999. full and straight, pushed -999 to mid-on for a -999.
a slower ball down leg, nudged down to short fine leg. 0 off 5. -999 maiden from stokes.
a full delivery on middle and leg, chipped -999 to mid-on. not found his fluency at all.
lovely shot, lovely stop. shortish and wide outside off, carved -999 towards backward point.
a full delivery outside off is driven to extra cover.

gowtham takes the catch and sends narine off. 21 off 7, that's -999 runs a ball. job done from narine. but that's the length to bowl to narine. another short delivery outside off, narine backs -999 and mis-times a pull. he was clearly rushed for pace there, and all he could do was splice the pull to cover.
that's how narine plays the short deliveries. gets outside the line and tries to hit short deliveries over point. misses.
can't scoop this slower length ball past short fine.
right into the blockhole, squeezed off the pad to the keeper. he walked across to flick but couldn't get any bat on it
walks across to help this over short fine, can only get hit on the pad, they scamper a legbye
walks across and sweeps this high full toss straight to short fine leg. mcclenaghan was on -999 knee as he looked to play the stroke but this was clearly over his waist.  freehit coming up
swing and a miss. another slower length ball, looked to fetch it from outside off
looks for a slower ball, end up bowling it way outside off, rolled to the keeper
defended gently to short third man, back-of-the-hand delivery this time

beaten! looks to punch on the up but is late on the stroke.
defends this length ball from the crease solidly
stands tall and punches this short of length ball to cover
full and swings back in late, pollard flicks to deep square off a thick inside edge

mistimes his pull and is gone as yuvraj takes a dolly at the edge of the ring at mid-on! huge moment in the match. this was short, rohit cramped for room as he looks to take him on and hit in front of square, got it high on the bat.
gentle dab towards point, wants the -999 but is sent back
thuds into his thigh pad as he tries to work this square. beaten for pace, played down the wrong line
steps -999 and works this leg side, into the vacant spaces at deep midwicket
beaten again!  at the moment, kishan has no clue. pokes tentatively, lucky there was no nick
beauty! slants -999 and holds its line to beat kishan's feeble push. zips through to rahul
slower and fuller again, kishan lunges forward and defends
right through lewis! the purplecap holder strikes gold! this is a knuckleball that comes back in to beat the inside edge and flatten off stump.
yorker outside off, jams it to extra cover from the crease
genius. kl rahul knows exactly what's coming. he's made it so - he's making the bowler do it. another slower ball dropped short, another reverse-swipe to third man
shot! rahul with the reminder he's still around. slower ball dropped short outside off. he swivels and reverse-swats this over short third man!
bye-bye! don't. bowl. short. it's climbing up at rahul's shoulder but he has swiveled much before it can get close and swatted to this to the long leg boundary
top edge lands well in front of deep midwicket. short ball and he looks to pull. hurried on it
backs -999, gets a length ball. can't make use of it. gets it wide of long-off off the toe-end
full on off stump, driven straight to long-off

offcutter, very short and wide. left alone
full toss on off stump, backs -999 and drills it to long-off

length ball at leg stump. plants the front leg -999 and tickles this to short fine
tossed up at middle stump, gets to the pitch and whips to deep midwicket
