oh no. poor bowling. rahul's been putting these -999 since he was 10. short and wide. decent pace on it too - perfect for a square cut that is executed perfectly
tossed up at off stump, leans in to drive to sweeper cover
short of a length on off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short of a length on middle stump, hurries him as he goes on the back foot and punches to deep midwicket
full on the stumps, stays in the crease and pokes this into the midwicket region with soft hands
short of a length skidder at off stump, steps -999 and drives to long-on
nice. waits and waits. it's a slow turner from markande, but it's very short. he hangs deep and bisects backward point and short third man

length ball into the pads, clipped into the square leg region
length on off stump, punched into the covers

dropped! an extremely difficult chance for cutting at cover point. rahul backs -999 and stabs aimlessly as this spins -999 from off stump. it floats high for cutting who leaps to his right with his left-hand going at the ball and tips it over the bar
miscued but he doesn't need to more than clear mid-on. he does it. beaten in flight and lofting agains the spin as he steps -999, but it's -999 bounce and into the boundary

shot!/ glorious flowing drive to beat extra cover to his left. an overpitched ball from hardik, who has managed to be all over the place in a span of -999 balls. nice transfer of weight through the forearms from rahul as he extends them and keeps them along the floor

deceived but he makes the best of it. short of a length ball climbing up at him, a knuckle ball. he's in position to try and flick this but has to follow with his hands as it cuts -999. runs it past slip
short of a length on off stump, stabbed into the off side from the crease

has he been run -999 at the non-strikers' end? ashwin's asking for it, which means he might have got some connection to the ball as it was driven back at him. nope, no contact. vinay was outside his crease - he was backing up - but ashwin who thrust his right boot -999, did not make any contact
bottom-handed maul down the ground! he just walked -999 after making connection, knew that was a -999 immediately.
shortish delivery outside off, left alone
flighted outside off, driven to long-off

that's more like it. a tossed up leggie that had drifted in, pitched and zipped -999 from the bat. takes the outside edge as the batsman tries a drive
seemed like the slower ball - he normally bowls 115 kph and this is 94 kph - met by a glide to third man
full on off stump, pushed to mid-off
nice and tight on off stump, gopal tries to dink and run into the covers but the fielder rushes in too quickly
good length ball on off stump, defended

duck on ipl debut! this is an absolute ripper from marsh! seemed to be following a straight line for the longest time - which is why buttler wanted to flick it -999 - but then the outswing starts. kisses the edge and settles in r ashwin's hands at first slip. good low catch too

has to get up on his tippy toes and blunt a shortish ball behind square leg

short ball outside off, rahane sways -999 from it and rams it to snatch the -999 runs that supergiants need for a massive victory. nine wickets and 32 balls to spare
fuller ball outside off, goes for a steer behind point. comes up with a whole lotta nothin
length ball, hammered down the ground. supergiants are almost there
drags a shortish delivery from outside off to short midwicket. rayudu puts in the dive and prevents a -999
fuller ball on off stump, driven to long-on

fired in on middle and leg, rahane uses the pace and picks it -999 to long leg

works it -999 off his legs. -999 through square leg
shortish, and it comes in at him at high pace. kp went back and swatted it over the wide long-on boundary. sheer power

that was simply done. he looks quite a bit better playing proper shots. gets the opportunity to do so when vinay bowls a length ball on off stump. driven gently down the ground. that brings us to a time -999
fuller ball outside off, rahane goes for the lofted drive. mcclenaghan is the man at deep cover, racing to his right, striving to turn it into a catch. but it falls well short of him
full ball on off stump, pushed to long-off
bat up high, leg splayed towards either side, set in the power position and vinay trumps it with a slower bouncer outside off and -999 from his reach

comes down the track and slaps a shortish delivery to mid-off
stopped by yusuf at second slip
zak, who probably didn't expect to bat on his return to competitive cricket, is completely deceived by that wrong-un

crafty stuff this! this was superbly flighted, but the wrong-un. mishra was lured into the drive, but was late on the stroke, got a thick edge and gambhir made that catch at slip look ridiculously easy. excellent captaincy in the first place to position himself there.
fired into middle and leg, hint of turn, mishra gets an inside edge that deflects off the pad and nearly rolls onto the stumps
looks to play the switch hit this time, but was way too early into the stroke, gets an under-edge that uthappa stops with his pad

played wide of gambhir at midwicket

beaten by the wrong-un. grips the surface and rips -999 as he prods forward to defend

steps -999 and thumps it towards long-off
width on offer, pushed to point

cuts and misses

poor stroke! looks to force -999 on the up but can only manage to slice it down towards hogg who takes a regulation catch at third man. once again, it bounced more than he expected. delhi in a familiar spot
super drive, but pandey took the pace off the ball by throwing himself full length to his right to save -999 runs
short ball on middle, he gets -999 of the way easily, good carry through to uthappa
picked -999 off the pads this time, work to do for hastings at deep backward square, they're back for the second easily
looks for some late -999 movement as he floats it full, but gets the radar wrong as he slips it down leg. nair would be kicking himself for missing the faint tickle

looks to play a cross-court forehand over mid-on, gets a bottom edge to the keeper
tickled down to third man

yorker-length delivery on the pads, worked towards deep midwicket

too full on the pads again, another neat flick but this time there's a man at deep midwicket to prevent the -999

he will be picked -999 all day, all night if he feeds him with deliveries on the pads. just -999 man behind square, so he can't really afford to drift. gambhir accepts the invitation as he wrists it superbly

quiet, for now. length ball on off stump, pushed gently to the left of short extra cover

length ball on off stump, and what a shot that is, just shows the full face and it races past the stumps at the other end and leaves mid-off sprawled uselessly to his right. long-on runs around to stop it

clipped to midwicket

yorker on middle, axar pats it down to long-on

off the inside edge and onto the stumps! rahane walked across toward the off side a little bit and the ball probably nipped in just a bit, rahane went for an uncharacteristic slog and only got an edge
yorker on the base on middle at 146 kph, pushed down the ground. excellent over. rushed both batsmen with his speed
short-arm pulled ot long leg and kohli always wanted the second. jadhav was hesitant, but he has to motor soon enough

wide yorker outside off, and its at superb pace too. kohli had backed -999 and he can't reach far enough to make connection. yells within the vicinity of the stump mic, and -999 can't quite say what he yelled because it wasn't pg
goes for a cut, but only gets an inside edge to long leg. the pace of morris has been too much for jadhav in those few balls
yorker outside off, beats him for pace. jadhav was going for a slice to third man, no contact

tailing in on middle and leg, nudged behind square leg. watson seemingly has a bat without a sponsor...
back of a length and outside off, pushed into the covers. kohli was haring up for a -999, but watson yells 'wait, wait.'

googly, pitched on a good length outside off, kohli though has retreated deep into his crease to give him the leverage to pull to deep midwicket

went on with the arm, ab seems to lower his backlift against spin. or against mishra specifically. picked -999 to long-on

so why would he go for a short ball at waist high? he's been bowling good pace, veering the ball into the right-hander and cramping him for room. here, he abandons all that, bowls a hit-me ball and gets pulled over deep midwicket

was that another chance? almost. the inside edge, as kohli plays a flick, was heading towards leg stump, but instead ricocheted off the pad. shami is getting the ball to move into the right-hander quite late
fuller ball on off stump, defended

that's dreadful. bowls a delicious short ball way down leg and kohli barely has to do anything more than help it -999. pristine leg glance, intentionally hit over the top

lbw appeal straight -999! shami still has the zip he gets off the track and its enough to beat ab. pitches just back of a length on off stump and darts into the pads of the batsman. plays a flick, can't connect. too high

shortish and outside off, punched through the covers. daredevils doing this easily now
back of a length on off stump, defended to point

clipped through midwicket

he was moving outside leg, then he was shaping for the scoop over fine leg, then he reacts to the ball in front of it - a slower short ball outside off - opens the face on it and nearly threads the gap between third man and backward point. leaps in the air as he was watching the ball travel while taking his -999, obviously gutted it didn't go through

nair has played a little beauty! that's the hundred stand. he knew aravind would go full, but didn't premeditate it. went across and down on -999 knee only after the ball was released. it was a full toss, which helped, and he glances it just past the diving keeper
looks for the fuller -999 just outside off, drilled to long-off
shortish and outside off, patted to deep third man

back of a length and outside off, pushed down to mid-off. kohli flattens the stump with his throw. de kock thinks about an overthrow. no luck there

and he's been sent packing! he can play this with his eyes closed. the pick up over square leg. almost jayasuirya-esque. harshal gave him the length to get under and de kock's hands are just too good. guess that's why he's such a good keeper too
cuts from leg stump, de kock then looked for a -999, but he is sent back. ab ran to his right from point and sends in the throw with not enough venom
driven past the diving midwicket fielder. aravind was moving to his left, and it would probably have still not stopped the -999
strides down the track, but when he can't get to the pitch of the offspinner on off stump, samson can only push it back to the bowler
moves beside the good length ball on off stump and pats it through the gap past cover
comes down, knowing the bowler would toss it up after his short ball was punished, nudged to midwicket
he's pitched camp there and will not budge. rcb had backward point and short third man, but de kock threads that gap with a cut. took the ball from off stump
well-executed yorker on off, jammed back to the bowler.
slower cutter outside off, pandya backs -999 this time and struggles to reach this.
very full on middle, better delivery, skewed to wide long-on, -999 more

clever batting, knew the gaps in the field and found -999 brilliantly. yorker outside off, well bowled, but that is not the best delivery with this field. steered past short third man for another -999
full and wide, just inside the tramline though. pandya shuffles across but cannot connect with his attempted cut
legcutter on middle to start, pushed to the sweeper cover as rayudu gets fifty. nice rearguard knock this

-999 more. -999 sixes in the over. mumbai suddenly have all the momentum. full on middle and off, pandya gets down and shaped for another slog sweep but because the ball did not spin, he went through with the lofted straight drive, right over the bowler's head. huge over
and again, this is even bigger. gets down on -999 leg, and pandya slog-sweeps this way over midwicket. into the stands it goes. this is match-changing batting from pandya. what an over so far
-999 more. poor bowling, in the slot on middle and leg. pandya swings and connects adequately. over midwicket for -999 more
flat on middle, swept to short fine leg
big, huge -999. tossed up on middle, rayudu runs down to the pitch, gets there, gets under it and gets -999. a lovely swing of the bat through the ball, right over the bowler's head

skied but lands in no-man's land. flat on off, no spin. pandya looks for a mow over midwicket but top-edges it towards mid-off. dhawan runs around from cover but cannot make the distance. falls right in front of his valiant dive
short on middle and leg, turned to short fine leg

ooh, looking for a massive hit. comes down, maybe gets too close to the ball, and skews -999 to long-on

some flight on middle and leg, rayudu steps down but improvises a checked defensive stroke

gone. bhuvi has the -999. guptill's ipl debut has not gone to plan. but not much any plan could do for that delivery. fullish length on a fourth-stump line, guptill comes forward and defends, but a hint of -999 movement helps in taking a thin feather through to naman. great start this for sunrisers and bhuvi
good length outside off, guptill doesn't bother with this
guptill now has -999 ipl runs. and what a way to get them. strides forward and taps it past point, just a forward prod. and it scurries past morgan at point
not much swing but the perfect line and length. good length on off, a bit of -999 movement, enough to force guptill into a defensive push
another yorker on leg, jammed to point. the throw to the batsman's end is needless and sunrisers get an overthrow
positive intent right -999 from hooda. full outside off, the ball still swinging and it was that -999 movement responsible for hooda not timing the lofted drive. over cover
warner showing how to do it. gets a good length delivery and swivels into his pull, past square leg, -999 more

excellent short delivery, and an even better catch from hardik pandya running in from deep midwicket. back of a length on middle, morgan is hustled for pace and pulls in the air. looked for that gap over square leg, but it hit the upper half of the bat. hardik pandya came running in and dived low to take a good -999-handed catch. held on even as his arms hit the ground. rolled over to ensure he did not let go off the ball.
good length on middle, powered to mid-off from the crease for -999

muscled over cover! clears his front leg, takes a flighted ball on off stump, opens the face of the bat and then concentrates on getting it over the fielder inside the circle because there is no -999 behind him

another couple. big ground in hyderabad and warner is picking the gaps nicely. waited a second extra to cut the ball to the right of the sweeper

slower delivery on off, played -999
good bowling. the same reaction to a free hit from bumrah like the previous match, full and wide outside off. jammed to point

nurdled down to short fine leg

that slingy action takes the ball on middle and leg, whipped off to square leg

thumped past the diving mid-on fielder. tried to play the -999 bluff, but yusuf was up to the task.

reaches -999 to drive that to sweeper cover

crunched to axar at sweeper cover

punched to long-on, nice sound of the bat as ball made contact

played towards short mid-on for a quick -999

-999 of the better catches you would see this season. gambhir looks to turn it wide of midwicket, but the ball bounces a bit more than he expected, it was the googly, he turned the bat face early, and so the ball lobbed in the air. there was no -999 at midwicket, and so it looked like it would fall in no man's land. but glenn maxwell anticipated well and hared in, timed his dive to perfection. stretched full length forward to pull off the catch inches from the ground. ensured the ball was lodged in his hands safely even as his elbows hit the ground. tremendous athleticism, but surely it has come too late for kxip?
outstanding stop by marsh, throwing himself to his left to save -999 runs
steps -999 and squeezes it into the gap at deep cover, didn't get it off the middle, the bat face turned in his hand as he made contact with the ball
punched to wide mid-on, mohit gets to the ball but can't prevent the -999
spins back into middle and leg, played wide of square leg
steps -999 and drives it down to long-on
paddled to short fine leg

eased to sandeep at short third man, he rushed in and dived, -999 don't know for what. as a result, couldn't fire the throw

punched, but straight to cover
straight to square leg, but they still get a -999. poor fielding there by axar
looks to pull, ball fizzes past his glove. given wide since it was down leg. healthy bounce on that occasion
nips back in off the deck and hits uthappa on the pad as he plays outside the line, abbott ran across the pitch in an attempt to kick the ball onto the stumps, which he did, but gambhir was well in

yorker just outside off, flat-batted to long-off, where southee allows a second run with a fumble

off-stump yorker, dug -999 into the midwicket region
back of a length slower ball on off stump, and that's an excellent shot to a difficult ball to hit. lets it come on and uses his wrists to pick the gap between short fine leg and deep square leg
back of a length outside off, uses the pace to ease it towards third man

that's -999 of watson's weaknesses, trying to pull spinners even when it isn't short enough. plays the trajectory rather than the length of this quickish delivery, and he's lucky that goes on with the arm and misses leg stump
flighted on middle and leg. watson looks for the big inside--999 drive, is cramped for room, and hits it back to the bowler. into the ground and bounces up to the bowler

fuller now and watson drives to long-off
slower this time, nice change of pace. hangs in the air and drops on a length on leg stump. watson is too early into the sweep and he's hit on the pad

dipping offbreak on off stump, and ab gets his front leg across and plays a risky - in any other format - whip that races -999 to the right of short fine leg. if he missed, he was lbw for sure
tossed up on off stump, clipped to long-on
not really short, not really wide, but kohli is back in a flash to bring his wrists into a rasping square cut that races to the point boundary

length ball on middle stump, and ab hangs back and swats it -999 to the square leg boundary. that wasn't a short ball. he just waited for this sort of length, and pounced as soon as he saw it - which, needless to say, was earlier than 99% of other batsmen
back of a length on off stump, straightens a touch and goes past the outside edge to hit the back thigh. ab was deep in his crease, looking to work this through the leg side

short on middle stump. gets on top of the bounce and defends with soft hands, down to backward point
short, this -999's cuttable, and he doesn't quite keep it down. buttler falls forward at point and the ball bounces just short of him

short on off stump, rahul rides the bounce and chops it to the right of third man

a bit fuller and wider and rahul slices his drive between backward point and cover point. not timed perfectly, and third man slides around to keep it to -999 runs

short again, but this time pollard is through the pull too early, off the right hip and rolls towards short third man

mistimes a pull to deep midwicket, -999 bounce to the fielder.  kohli whacks himself on the pad.  frustration creeping in? surely
squeezed to long-on, faf was moving to his left even before de villiers completed the followthrough
swung across the line, mistimed to deep midwicket. hit it off a thick inside edge

tickled to short fine leg

cry of anguish from kohli as he runs for the -999. it was short outside off, he looked to hit it too hard, got it off the bottom of the bat to long-off

punched to deep midwicket
driven into the gap between sweeper cover and long-off, excellent running

disbelief on m ashwin's face. not the welcome to the bowling crease he would have expected. fires it quicker outside off, de villers gets across and sweeps it fiercely into the deep backward square leg region. he was hitting it towards the shortest boundary. a 66-metre hit. but that would have been -999 at any venue. nearly carried 30 rows back
takes ages for the ball to get to abd, who was nearly through with his stroke, hit hard to long-off
driven into the gap at wide long-off,  fourth half-century stand between kohli and de villiers this season
makes room and cuts it towards deep point
lofted over the bowler, -999 bounce to long-off

what does it say of a stroke when even faf can't get to the ball despite a full-length dive? not much pace on offer with that length ball, ab forces all the pace by making room and slapping it into the deep cover region, faf got to the ball, but couldn't quite stop it cleanly and could only see the ball roll off his hand into the boundary
skidder outside off, whipped to long-on
high tull toss into middle and leg, swung -999 into the deep backward square leg boundary. spoilt what was otherwise an excellent over
play and a miss. looks to back -999 and cut that -999 over point, beaten for pace this time
looks to arch back and ramp it over the keeper's head, but rahane failed to account for the slower -999, it got stuck in to the surface for a wee bit longer than he would have liked
drops it with soft hands to iqbal abdulla at point, a nanosecond's eye-contact and they were off for the run
tried to over-hit the pull, mistimed it to square leg, dhoni was halfway down the pitch by then, so rahane didn't really have a choice but to run
makes a bit of room and squeezes the full ball into the gap at square third man
plays it across the line to long-on, trusted the pitch on that occasion, no damage done
drifting into middle and leg, worked with the angle to long-on
too full outside off, rahane squeezes that -999 to deep cover, looked like it hit the toe end of the bat.  muted celebration for his half-century
gets a good stride in to ease it to long-off
drifting into middle and leg, turned to deep midwicket
maybe he's mindful of dhoni giving him the charge. fires it short and wide outside off, steered to deep point
dabbed down to third man
slower -999 on middle, dhoni was early into his whip, gets hit on the flap of the pad, but rahane was ready for the run
gets -999 with the half-volley, thumped straight to cover
uppish, but safe. rolls along the carpet to binny at third man
inside edge as he looks to cut, rolls to the on side and they steal a -999
looks to step -999 and go over midwicket, is late on the shot. the full ball hits his pad
punched to abd at point
optimistic appeal from the bowler as dhoni misses the tuck off the pad, it was comfortably sliding down leg side
uses the pace of the bowler and runs it down to third man, 141 clicks on that delivery
gets half-forward and plays it back down the pitch with soft hands
width on offer and he's crunched that behind past cover. freebie, you have to say. rahane won't miss -999 on such gifts. it was sitting up nicely for him to play the cut shot, which he did
length ball on middle, defended back to the bowler
full and aimed at off, jammed to sweeper cover
pretty full on off, driven to sweeper cover. duminy wants -999. jp dives full-length and makes his ground. a direct hit from rayudu could have had negi. duminy gives his partner a thumbs-up
slower ball on middle, with extra bounce, dabbed on the pitch for -999
slid down leg, wide
pitched up and outside off, squirted to the covers
yorker outside off, duminy reaches -999 but can't carve this -999
yorker at the base of off, 139ks, jp duminy carves it -999 to the left of third man. harbhajan dives belatedly. looks like a reluctant drive. a yorker has been squeezed for -999. well done, duminy
floated on middle, driven smoothly to long-on
length ball on off, patted to cover

length ball on the off stump, the batsman rolls his wrists and sweeps it well. hardik pandya, running to his left from deep backward square leg and buttler, running to his right from deep midwicket, collide. buttler's chest bumps into pandya's face. nasty collision. hardik is down. looks like he is in great pain. pandya has been lifted off the field. pandya's lower body flung over the ad boards after colliding with buttler. the ball was touching his back during that moment. that's a -999.
short and wide outside off, cuts firmly to sweeper cover
drifts into the pads, picked -999 to deep midwicket
hurled at 97ks, slogged from outside off to long-on
leg-stump ball, duminy rolls his wrists and sweeps through backward square leg
slid through on off, dabbed towards point
fired short from round the -999, backs -999 and punches through the covers. buttler dives and cuts it off to -999
flighted on off, samson goes for a sweep. hits it in the air. pierces the gap between deep square leg and fine leg
hurrying length ball, blocked back to the bowler
that's h-u-g-e! tossed on off, samson races down the track, meets the pitch, and launches it over long-on. he holds his pose and admires the shot. he timed the pants off it

slides on middle and leg, krunal connects with a slog sweep and sends it flat over deep midwicket. iyer runs across and dives to his left near the boundary. he only comes second to the power of krunal
flighted on off, dabbed to cover with soft hands
skiddy ball on middle, pushed to long-on

the middle stump is tiled back. mishra pumps his fist. mishra lets rip a tossed-up googly. rayudu dances down the track, swings, and does not connect. he did not pick that at all. his stumps are splayed
slider on middle, nudged to midwicket
down the track and laced to long-off
back of a length and outside off, guided to point

duminy can't hang on to the catch at slip. short and zipping through outside off again, rayudu slashes hard as the outside edge flies to slip. duminy leaps, attempts the catch with both hands, but the ball bursts through. morris applauds duminy's commitment
delicious full toss on middle, only punched to mid-on
short and zings through outside off at 142ks, past the swinging bat of rayudu
zipping short ball outside off, beats rayudu's nervous prod -999 from the body
good length and outside off, skewed to third man off an outside edge
slower ball, dipping on the batsman, kohli is prepared for it, waits and flicks to the the right of deep midwicket

attempted yorker, but kohli has worked on countering it and it shows in how well he execute the slice behind point. he knows bowlers want to bowl wide at the end of the innings to ensure the batsman can't reach it. that's mostly because batsmen premeditate to hit to the leg side. but kohli rarely premeditates. responds to the ball in front of him, as he does here, giving it direction. amazing strokeplay

picked the change of pace and turns it to deep midwicket. kohli scampers across for a second run, but he's made to sweat even on such a large ground because spears in the throw right next to the stumps
comes down the track and works a slower ball from outside off to deep midwicket
slower ball, more noticeable off cut there and this dips too. rahul can only defend it down the pitch
that's the big dipper slower ball, only it dipped down leg. he cut it right over the top of the seam to make it hurtle down on the batsman. kl was running down and can't make contact
another -999 round-armed in on off stump, maybe just a bit outside. rahul stays back and cuts to deep point
goes back and punches to deep midwicket, almost with a straight bat
slung it through on off stump, kohli dabs it to point
on leg stump, patted towards long-on and kohli yelled '-999' straight -999. the fielder runs up as quick as he could, had to move to his right too. that's more than enough for him
95 kph, wide outside off, rahul wanted to slap it through the covers but misses. keeper misses as well and kohli pounces
sliding down leg, rahul looks for a -999 towards fine leg. nothing doing
goes back and flicks a shortish delivery through to deep square leg. another couple. good work from lions. they've handled -999 danger well enough. still watto left
there's the leading edge again - just like how shamsi dismissed mccullum - but this time dk is lucky enough that the ball travels high and far enough past the bowler's left. superb googly
swept to short fine leg
quicker delivery! does raina in. it went right over the wide line, and a little too quickly for the late cut that he was looking for

run--999 chance! raina had gone back and cut towards point, but it's not watto there anymore. karthik had hared down the pitch, and has to hare back. the throw comes to shamsi, he takes it low and underarms it at the stumps. direct hit, but not -999
starts with an 88 kph length ball on off stump, slog sweep to deep square leg
shaping to cut, but shamsi bowls it flatter and gets some turn to refuse the room karthik wanted. lovely, lovely over!

bit appeal for lbw, it was the wrong 'un. raina was haring down the -999 as well and he lost all his shape slogging at the ball. he did that because he wasn't to the pitch and panicked not knowing which way the ball would turn. comes into him, hits the back pad, but because he was so far down, he was safe from the lbw
smeared down the ground! he took the risk. he felt he had to, with the running, now he hits the chinaman bowler back over his head after running at him
flicks a flighted ball on middle to deep midwicket

another -999 that goes -999, karthik steers it to point. seems to be a run--999 chance, the fielders yell 'bowler' to help point -999, but he had slipped and by the time he recovered and threw, raina was safe
closes the face against the googly and the leading edge wanders -999 to short third man
fuller delivery on off stump, pushed back at the bowler and though watson misfields, he does recover quick enough to prevent the -999
comes down the track and tucks a slower ball on leg stump to deep midwicket

falls safe between the sweeper and the cover running back as karthik plays a swat off the back foot after he is surprised by the bouncer! watson is getting the ball to misbehave like kids when the teacher goes -999.

lovely batting! just the way he waited on the ball to find the gap behind point. then he imbues enough power on the short to beat third man on the boundary. course, it was a short ball outside off and had to be put -999
fuller ball outside off, driven to cover where kohli prevents the -999
back of a length and just outside off, 'yes, yes, yes, yes,' says raina after dabbing it in front of point
shortish and outside off, goes for the cut and inside edges it to cover
good length ball, slower as well, mccullum pats it into the covers and set off. but smith isn't keen on the -999. good call that, sent him back early and that really helps
short fine leg dives over the ball. it's a short -999, but not rising as far up as mccullum expects. more of an inside edge, but it finds the gap to the left of chahal
so the bowler immediately goes short, which is fine for smith who doesn't like coming forward. patted into the covers for a quick -999
monstered over long-on! and he did it so lazily! barely a press forward, but ample work with the hands. swung it -999 with such power.
simple cricket. it's a good length ball on middle, mccullum blocks and gets across to the other end. reducing dot balls can do wonders in a chase
another cutter to finish a great spell from bhatia. -999-0-19--999. nurdled to deep midwicket.
full and straight at 111 kph. kept -999 with a defensive flick to midwicket
full on off, skewed to midwicket with a closed bat-face.
cutter to start on leg, worked to square leg for -999

straight and gone. yusuf misses a straight delivery. full and fast, yusuf shuffles across, anticipating another of those cutters but the quicker delivery skids on and strikes yusuf in front of off. impact just inside off, easy decision
nice stroke. not placed as well as he wanted. slower ball on middle, suryakumar gives himself room to drive over cover.
good tight start to shakib. good length on off and tapped to point

-999, gone, poor call from gambhir. gambhir is distraught. good length on off, clipped towards midwicket. he wanted -999 immediately but he clearly misjudged it. tiwary ran in from mid-on, picked up cleanly and fired a good throw to dhoni who had to just take off the bails. gambhir's desperate lunge doesn't save him and pune have the openers.
another well-executed stroke. morkel takes pace off a fullish delivery outside off but suryakumar executes the late glide to third man
pulls the length back a tad, on off and middle. worked to short midwicket
too full again. not a great start from supergiants' bowlers but take nothing -999 from that shot. full on off and suryakumar flicks into the gap, past midwicket. wonderful use of the wrists
amazing shot. too full from morkel and straight, suryakumar lays into an on-drive and times it beautifully. races -999 for -999 past mid-on
another slower -999 to finish. chipped past the bowler, to mid-on. pollard hurtles back for -999. -999 completely different strides but they make it

excellent delivery. in all fairness, this has not been a bad over. another back of the hand slower ball on middle, buttler looks for a heave over midwicket but misses completely. since it is straight, the stumps are clattered. buttler's impressive cameo ends.
ooh, buttler misses an innovative shot. full and wide outside off, buttler stays where he is, doesn't bother moving his feet and reverse sweeps but misses. dot ball

and again. not a bad delivery again, the slower delivery -999 of the back of the hand. but buttler shuffles across, shapes for the ramp, waits for the slower ball to come to him before helping it along over the keeper. easy.

not great captaincy from miller. cannot have fine leg up to this man. fullish outside off, that isn't a bad delivery actually, but buttler has such good hands that all he needs to do is get across to the line. he gets there and uses his hands to scoop the ball over short fine leg
yorker outside off. parthiv shuffles across and shovels a drive to long-on. not bad to get buttler on strike
lovely. backs -999 again, makes some room and lofts the cover drive over cover. on the bounce and over the boundary. runs coming too easily suddenly
nice, well played. backs -999 and punches a well-timed drive on the up, just past mid-off. picked his spot well
this is too wide, down leg. parthiv misses a flick
good call from the umpire. full and quick, just past leg stump. parthiv shuffles across and tries to ramp, but misses. getting increasingly uglier
good yorker. full and wide, rayudu scythes but an inside edge back up the pitch
no timing at all, but he gets to fifty in the most ungainliest of ways. walks across and bunts a flick on the bounce to deep square leg. did not look too pretty on that delivery
an uppish flick over midwicket for -999. good batting. backed -999, did not get the ball he wanted but still found some runs
flat and quick outside off, skewed to deep cover. mumbai accelerating.
flat down leg, chipped to midwicket
very quick and flat down leg, off the pad to short fine leg, says the umpire
pushed quietly to long-off. another fifty for rayudu
-999 more. really good batting. shimmies down, gets a similarly full delivery and drives over cover for -999
gets to the pitch this time and another straight -999. good batting from rayudu. turning it on. runs down to the pitch, a clean golf swing takes the ball over long-on
very flat, very quick on middle and leg. clipped to midwicket
lucky runs. drifts outside off and parthiv looks for another muscular drive through cover, but he gets a thick outside edge which races -999 past short third man.
full on off, no flight. no turn. belted down to long-off, just -999
short and wide, hammered to deep cover

gone this time? flat and quick outside off, parthiv premeditates and comes -999 for a drive over cover. but misses. nikhil naik takes the bails off quite quickly, but parthiv gets his back foot back just in time. very marginal this. the third umpire is taking his time. parthiv was walking back but stops, finally. and rightly so, because it looks like there is just a smidgen behind. parthiv is safe, again.
flat on middle, and full. rayudu was shaping to sweep again, but improvises with a drive to long-off
101 kph, flat on middle and leg. played with the angle to square leg, who fumbles while diving
quite full, still no flight. parthiv runs to the pitch and mis-times a lofted drive to mid-off. -999
nurdled to square leg
nicely bowled, 93 kph. outside off, rayudu looks to loft a drive over cover but the skiddy nature of the new ball means rayudu inside-edges to square leg
a bit of flight on leg, worked -999 to deep midwicket
he won't spin too many. full outside off, skids on nicely to the bat. driven to long-off
oh lovely. the test match trick. a short delivery followed by a full -999 outside off. rayudu's feet are not quite to the pitch. he attempts a drive but the ball swings past the edge
well bowled. back of a length, more a length we have been accustomed to, on leg. aimed at rayudu's ribs. he awkwardly gets to the delivery to play -999
excellent batting. wonderful response from johnson. good length on off, parthiv drops his hands and pats it towards point with soft hands. rayudu calls him through
a shot fraught with risk. but parthiv executes it. full on off, similar to the first ball. but he goes through with the flick and connects. goes very fine, past the keeper and short fine leg
shot! wonderful timing. full again, outside off, sixth-stump line. parthiv strides forward, quite a tiny stride, but times the punchy cover drive past cover. awesome stuff
very straight, parthiv gets an inside edge that saves him. full on off, parthiv looks to drag the nudge but can't do so adequately. lucky he got some bat on that
another -999 goes, those zing bails light up yet again. another yorker on leg, johnson doesn't have an idea and misses. leg stumps is uprooted and johnson falls. all over for kings xi
full and straight, miller squeezes his drive off the inside half to long-on.
very high full toss again, just under the waist this time says the umpire. johnson awkwardly keeps it -999
swung across the line and bowled im. speared in the blockhole and axar tries to mow. misses and the stumps are clattered
and again, miller gets across and sweeps the full toss to a very fine fielder at fine leg. just the -999, would have been -999 had that fielder not been positioned there
miller stays in his crease, trying to sweep and misses but well down leg. easy call
through miller. without miller's stance, that was -999 stumps down leg, but miller backed -999, looking to make room. through the feet

ooh, very high full toss. and a no ball is called. the crowd comes to life. follows miller who backs -999, miller swats the full toss past square leg for -999. miller was a few inches down the track, marginal call
eeks, looking for that yorker on leg. drifts down leg though
don't get it. very very full, and very very wide. maxwell gets across, looking to help the ball past square leg, who is in the circle. but all he can do from that position is chip to deep midwicket
low full toss on leg, good bowling. skewed to deep midwicket, just the -999.
excellent bowling. very full and wide again, maxwell shuffles across but hammers the drive to long-off
nicely played. full and wide low full toss outside off. bunted -999 over the bowler for -999. looked to drag it to square leg but that ball was too wide, in the end
lap swept to a very fine fine leg. low full toss down leg, miller uses deft touch but just -999. with that man there, could miller have done something different with that full toss?
131 kph, well bowled. miller backs -999, looking to make room, but mitch fires a yorker down leg after following him, from around the -999. through the legs for a vital dot
another cutter to finish, 108 ks. tip and run to point
another slow cutter, banged in mid-pitch. worked to midwicket with soft hands, panyda gets there and fires a throw. a good throw would have had marsh
very slow, finally pollard gets it straight. nurdled to midwicket. maxwell doing it nicely
to the other side of short third man this time. slower delivery but wide, and even though it is slow, it is an offering and maxwell carves a cut past bumrah, -999 more
lucky boundary but maxwell will not care -999 bit. slower delivery outside off, 106 kph. maxwell gets an under-edge past the keeper.
108 kph, slowish on off, tapped to point for -999
good length on leg, worked -999 to deep square leg. successful over for mumbai, they should get ahead if they keep chipping -999.

gone this time. vijay looks for another but has to go now. shortens his length, takes some pace off the ball, and bowls it wider outside off. vijay advances and goes through with a flat-batted stroke but ends up eop-edging it towards point. hangs there for a while before buttler settles under it. good take.
another pick-up stroke for -999. easily done by vijay. good length on leg, straying in line. allowing vijay to see it early and whip it -999. over square leg for a massive -999
good length on middle, swatted -999 towards wide mid-on, who has to hustle across to cut it in. does so
back of a length and straight, nurdled off his hips towards square leg

direct hit from buttler. mumbai are celebrating, has vijay made his ground? vijay pushes a length delivery to extra cover and sets off for a quick run. vijay has just made his ground, excellently judged -999.
excellent yorker on the base of off stump, dhawan looked to go over midwicket but quickly adjusted to jam his bat down in time to play it towards cover
looks to go over long-on, but can't get underneath the delivery, somehow manages to find the gap at wide long-off, enough time to get back for the second

not a ball that deserved a -999, but bhuvi has done his job. he swung that high full toss on middle towards long-on. the only mistake was he didn't get it off the middle, and faf took the simplest of catches. this has been a terrific cameo nonetheless.
low full toss outside off, he walks across to flick, gets a top edge that falls in no man's land at long-on. the important bit is they squeeze the second -999 in

almost a -999 of the previous delivery.  dhoni isn't happy with the ball. there was a man at 45, but bhuvi once again backed -999 and backed himself to play it wide of the man. that brought a smile to warner's face too.
too full outside off, bhuvi makes room, opens the face of the bat and slices it wide of short third man. clever
uses the pace of the bowler and helps it down to third man, where ashwin took a split-second longer to release the ball. enough time to get back for the second. dhoni is unhappy with that effort
length ball outside off, dabbed to point

softened him with the short ball, and then the death rattle. this -999 was floated full on middle, ojha looked to loft that over long-on, but missed it completely. the middle and leg stump was flattened. cr7 celebrations again. what a night he's having
excellent bouncer, allan donald-like, on middle. ojha is hurried into the pull, the ball whizzes past his left glove. dhoni likes that
thumped, but a super stop by tiwary at extra cover.  he threw himself to his left to save -999 runs
sees dhawan walk across to scoop and floats it short and wide outside off, he looks to ramp it over short third, but is done in for pace
tucked behind square on the leg side for an easy -999
slows it down again, dhawan skipped down the track but had to readjust, crunched towards point where smith dived over the ball
another carrom ball, this -999 was full outside off, driven to long-off
lands the carrom ball where he wanted to, finally. ojha gets forward and defends
slows it down nicely, dhawan is caught in -999 minds, but finally decides to dab it to point for a quick -999
fires a carrom ball on middle, swept to deep fine leg
uppish, but safe as he punches it to rahane at long-off
excellent stop off his own bowling, this was punched on the up
drops it with soft hands to the off side and sets off for a run that wasn't on, dhoni moves to his left, takes the gloves off and fires a throw at the batsman's end, he was gone had he hit
punched past the bowler to long-on
eased wide of point for a quick -999 to raise the 50
dhawan's decided enough is enough. skips down the pitch and lofts the length ball over the bowler's head. it didn't matter to him that dhoni was standing up to the stumps.
it's the carrom ball this time, a touch short on middle and leg, whipped to deep square
cuts it wide of cover, ashwin's extracting some bounce here
appeal for lbw as dhawan stabs outside the line of the ball, gets an inside edge. would have been very close otherwise
lucky to get -999 with a slider that goes wrong, looks to help it past short fine, didn't get enough bat on it
gets onto the backfoot and defends with a dead bat

and he strikes with his first ball, again. this -999 drifts back in from wide of the crease, hooda is early into his reverse paddle, the ball lobs off his glove to dhoni who dives to his right to complete the catch. trouble for sunrisers

he's run -999 of luck. this was banged in short outside off, tare looks to pull but there was no conviction in the stroke, only managed to top-edge that -999 to thisara, who judged it well at cover. it was swirling in the air for a while but thisara called loud and clear, and then took it the aussie way, with his palms facing the sky.
pushed back to mid-off for a quick -999, the run was possible because the non-striker trusted dhawan's instinctive call. well done
pulled, not of the middle as m ashwin does the mopping up at deep square leg. was into the stroke a little too early on that occasion
tests the bounce of the surface by banging another short ball, this -999 was outside off, dhawan watched it through to dhoni
looks to whip it over square leg, the ball deflects off the thigh pad to the off side
unlucky for the bowler. floats it full, the ball swings back into middle and leg, dhawan drives, but gets a thick inside edge that flies past leg stump and into the fine leg boundary

lucky break, he's already had a couple of lives. marsh digs it in short, tare fetches the pull from outside edge, but gets top edge. dhoni anticipates that and hares backwards to pull it back in just before it crossed the advertising triangle
stands tall and punches it straight to point

that should relieve some pressure. length ball on middle, he rolls his wrists over ball nicely to generate power as the ball sped -999 between square leg and midwicket. top shot, he should feel a lot better
slices it to rahane, just short of him at point. once again stayed back inside the crease to play it over point, lucky to survive
mumbai's ranji trophy winning captain is struggling against the swinging ball here. goes for the drive, no feet movement whatsoever, beaten by the outswinger again
lucky to get -999 with that poor ball. full and way down leg, clips tare's pad on the way through to dhoni. any bat on that and it would have raced -999 into the fine leg boundary
bangs it in outside off, tare sways -999 of the way. not a bad first over, that
first runs, and off the pad. poor ball first up to a new batsman. sprays it full and down leg, tare misses the flick, but the ball deflects off the pad into the fine leg boundary

not the kind of ball that deserved a -999, but try telling that to dinda! he's delivered a big, big -999. the in-form david warner can't believe what he's done. this was short and wide outside off, warner went for the cut and managed to hit it straight to ajinkya rahane at backward point. the leap is back, the celebration is back. supergiants couldn't have asked for a better start

outstanding stop by smith at cover point. saved a certain boundary. it was short, enough width on offer, warner slapped it and expected a boundary till he saw his mate dive full length to his left and stop it with -999 hand
length ball on middle and leg, whipped to m ashwin at midwicket
starts off with a full delivery that swings back late into middle, warner squeezes it to mid-off
another whip, this time hooda comes around quickly to keep it down to a -999
flicked past the diving midwicket fielder, hooda had some work to do in order to get to the ball from deep square. risky from smith, but the confidence shines through
too full and outside off, gets a bit of swing -999, carved to third man
gets forward to go over cover, got it off the bottom of the bat this time, jammed back to the bowler
slip in place, so what? walks down the pitch and hammers the length ball over mid-on, -999 bounce into the boundary. he wants to finish this off soon, no doubt about it

extra bounce has done the trick. this was a length ball on middle, it nipped -999 off the seam, faf looked to run it down to third man but the extra bounce meant a feather off the shoulder through to naman ojha. he's done his job though. something to cheer for the crowd, but they know it's a little too late
wrists the length ball from off stump to midwicket
stands tall and then angles it down to nehra at third man, can't prevent the second. tad slow, but understandable considering he's coming back from an injury
why would you want to test the bounce on this surface at 130kph? way over smith's head, ojha sticks his right hand -999 to take the pace off the ball
length ball outside off, driven on the up towards sweeper cover, excellent running between the wickets. smith was always in it for the second
flicked from outside off towards long-on
whipped off his hip to bipul at deep square leg
bunts a short ball to point
back of length delivery sliding across, defended to the off side with soft hands. another productive over for the batting team
gets across and flicks it into the gap at deep midwicket, made the second very easily

the slower -999 on middle, but punished. classy from steve smith. picks the -999 off the hand and whips it over midwicket, -999 bounce into the boundary. supergiants are powering ahead. wonder if this is a calculated attack in a bid to boost their net run-rate
floats it full and far too wide outside off, wide called. suddenly, he's under pressure
whipped -999, no chance for mid-on. this was like a helicopter shot played all along the ground. too full, and smith pounded that -999 with his powerful wrists. delightful!
nearly through, smith was shuffling across, but the ball was dipping on him, he missed it completely. it wasn't far -999 from leg stump. the ball clipped his pad on the way through to the keeper

ducks.... under a mathews bouncer! that's a little too much respect as the short ball goes over off stump
smoked! vicious hit from ojha as he stands and flat-bats a length delivery -999-bounce into the cover boundary. who needs feet movement in t20?!
fuller delivery cramping him for room, but ojha is able to whip it -999 over midwicket for a couple of runs before the deep fielder from square leg can catch up
full on middle, driven to long-on for another -999

fuller delivery on middle and leg, bopara steps -999 and makes room while doing so, drilled into the covers

tries it again, but this -999 doesn't rise as much as he hopes. that's what the batsman has to contend with on a slow, -999-paced pitch. not easy to trust your big shots, and that's what's needed for a run-rate over 11

fuller delivery outside off, pushed into the covers

crucial strike. thisara is a dangerous batsman at the death. russell delivers another short bumpy ball, thisara backs -999 and mishits the attempted cut, finds manish at backward point. he hops up and takes it
dug in short on off, bailey rocks back and unleashes a strong pull in front of square on the leg side. the man from deep midwicket runs across to his right and keeps it to -999

skiddy short ball climbs on middle at 140ks, beats thisara's slice, surprises robbie as well. that boinged off the surface, -999 byes
banged in short and on middle, thisara sits on the back foot and pummels a -999 over deep backward square leg
greets maxi with a bumper, flies through to the keeper. maxwell jerks his head -999 of the way

morne strikes! on the customary back-of-a-length side is morkel, saha hunts for another pull. this was not all that short to warrant the stroke. he can't connect well this time, much like the previous attempt. gets a bottom-edge onto the thigh, rebounds to yusuf at a widish slip position
back of a length and on middle and leg, tucks viru up for room. nudged in front of midwicket

short and rises over the stumps, viru jumps across off, pulls and meets with thin air
makes room and swings across the line of this length delivery but gets an inside edge that rolls towards deep backward square leg
he tucks the length delivery through midwicket to bring up the record opening partnership for royals, beating a -999-year old record
he is beaten a touch by the lack of pace on this delivery and ends up slicing it towards point
creates room and thrashes the length delivery to deep cover, just for a -999 this time
bowls a low full toss and watson takes full toll, powers it through mid-off for a boundary. there is no -999 in the deep to cut it off
loud appeal from dhoni for a caught behind as watson misses the pull shot, but the umpire calls it a wide as it's way down the leg side. it would have been a wide to a left-hander
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it down to long on for a -999

take that! he gets his front leg -999 of the way and hammers this length delivery flat and long over wide long-on. that 's his fifty in his debut game.. what a change from his struggles during the world cup
length delivery, he comes forward and whips it through midwicket for a -999
he makes room and chops the length delivery through point for a -999 to the deep

turns, but this is short again, rahane goes deep in the crease and punches it to deep extra cover for another couple

pushes this well wide outside off and it's short as well! rahane has all the time to do whatever he wants to do with this, he slaps it behind point to pick up a boundary

he waits on the crease and whips the length delivery to deep midwicket for a -999

tight line around off, the batsman pushes it straight to cover point

high elbow, superb forward stride, timing and panache! this shot had everything. it was on a length and watson punches it superbly through cover
on the pads, he waits and clips it to deep square leg for a -999
he picks up another boundary with superb timing! just punches the fuller delivery in the air, over shane watson's head.. the timing does the rest

almost a yorker just outside off, abdulla makes room and looks to drive on off, and gets a thick edge fine on off for -999

full on off, driven down to long on. there's a confusion as they think of -999. wiese turns around for the second but is sent back. malinga doesn't collect the ball which makes abdulla think of overthrows but wiese is flat on the ground
nearly in the block hole again on off stump, punched back to malinga
right in the block hole again under pressure, wiese blocks it back. he had no choice
yorker at 138kph on the off stump, digs it -999 towards point for -999
starts with a wide down the leg side

first-ball duck for rilee rossouw! harbhajan came round the -999 and angled this -999 in, looked like rossouw played for the straighter -999 but it came in and disturbed the stumps
back of length outside off, pulled to the leg side for -999
outside off and he guides it straight to short third man

that's how you spell chaos.comedy! it was fullish this time with some room, he drove to sweeper cover for -999. both batsmen were running down the same side of the pitch, on the leg side, and then kept runnng diagonally to collide. sure shot run--999 chance but pandya doesn't collect the quick throw
takes a step down, short of length ball outside off with hardly any room and he defends it back
towards the stumps now, pushed down to the left of midwicket for a quick -999
charges down first ball, pandya pitches it outside off, kohli swings ans misses

-999 catches dropped, he's bowled this time! gayle charged down the track, bhajji delivered this -999 in towards off and middle from outside off. gayle missed as he slogged and the ball did the rest

dropped by simmons at cover! this was short of length and gayle slapped it straight at the fielder, waist high.. should have been taken. this could turn costly. too hard on mitch mc.. he almost has the big -999

another famous win for bangladesh. the players hug each other. this is definitely bigger than the win against india. sa were ranked no -999. no longer though. now they slip to the second position. tossed-up on the stumps, ntini tries to flick it to the on side, gets a leading edge which balloons over cover. mortaza runs back and takes it. the players mob each other. stumps are grabbed as souvenirs. the show has just begun for bangladesh. the celebrations will go long in the night in dhaka and other parts of bangladesh. they have a devoted contigent who live outside the country. this will be a special moment to all of them.  this is sriram veera, signing off for cricinfo. good bye and good luck.

there it is, mccullum's not wasting time! full outside off stump, he uses the feet well, and smashes that through the covers and just sets off for the pavilion, cool as a cucumber! new zealand have made the semi-finals!

cleaned em up! it was full, no room to hit, and oram swings across the line only to hear the death rattle behind him! what a celebration from nel as he savours the sight of splayed stumps in front of him!
full on off stump, he nearly falls over as he works it to short midwicket
back of a length again, he pushes to point again
back of a length outside off stump, chopped to point
good length outside off stump, he gets a good look at it and then leaves it be
good length on off stump, pushed down to long-off
full outside off stump, and he clobbers it powerfully past mid-on to get the crowd buzzing
too full drifting down leg stump, and he clips the low full toss -999 to deep backward square leg
now he too makes room to leg and ntini fires it in full, mcmillan defends to the off side
fullish on middle and leg, styris chips that down the ground and it lands safely in front of the man down there
backs -999 to leg, ntini chases him with a bouncer, which sails over his left shoulder as he gets down on his haunches, wide is the signal
full, he lines up and swings that down to long-on for -999
moves to leg, ntini follows him with a yorker outside leg stump, styris counters that with a firm drive to mid-off
short of a good length outside off stump, he opens the face and runs it down to third man for -999
bang, thats -999! makes room to free the arms, and smacks the half-volley between cover and mid-off
he backs -999 to leg, trying some sort of late dab over the 'keeper, but is beaten by the pace and bounce of ntini
good length outside off stump, he square-drives past point and thats another styris fifty in this world cup...ho hum
short again outside off stump, styris looks for the pull but chops into the ground as he swivels
dragged in short, mcmillan doesnt do much, just stands and lobs it up in the air backward of square, and the ball lands between -999 men, running in
back of a length outside off stump, sits up a touch, mcmillan is surprised by plays it with soft hands to backward point, set off, and is sent back
yet another -999 down to the long on
fuller, on the middle and leg, wristed past square-leg
slightly slower, outside off, jabbed -999 to point
on the off and middle, pushed to cover
on the middle stump line, sliding towards middle and leg, glanced off the hips, past square-leg
full, straight, on the middle stump line, tapped back to pollock
fuller, outside off stump, driven towards cover
and again. the bottom-hand came of the bat handle this time, the bat-face shut and the ball rolled back down the track
on the middle and off, punched back to the bowler
off cutter, on the middle and leg stump line, attempts to turn it to on side, misses and it thuds into the pad
back of length, outside off stump, cut to deep point

good length and now he drives to cover
overpitched outside off stump and he drives into the covers

this -999 nips in off the seam, sharply, striking him high above the knee roll as he was pinned to the crease, a very good shout, looked close but harper shakes his head...and hawkeye shows that it was indeed carrying on over the stumps

good length on middle and off, nudged behind square for a -999

now he steps -999, looking to get aggressive, the balls not there to be creamed, he  gets under it, but luckily for him it lands safely over mid-on's head
slower -999 again on off stump, styris drives to mid-off

flat down leg stump, worked right to short fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, driven into the covers for -999, no hassles at all

back of a length on leg stump, turned around the corner
good length outside off stump, fleming drives and gets gets beaten

back of a length on off stump, styris gets right behind the line and drives back to nel
good length on the stumps, pushed to mid-off
back of a length outside off stump, pushed in front of point and he calls for the -999, but is sent back

back of a length, opens the face and steers it down to third man for -999
back of a length outside off stump, nudged to backward point

good length outside off stump, porterfield stands grounded and flashes the booming drive at it, missing completely

back of a length, pushed to cover

comes -999 of the track, bowler drops it short, he swings across the line, misses, the ball rolls off his pads back to razzak, who throws back to the stumps, misses, bashar at short fine leg doesnt back up and thats the easiest -999 runs ever

beaten by a quicker -999 outside off stump, pitches on a good length and swings past his forward lunge

but thats brilliant! again the ball was full on leg stump, and this time aftab connects well with his lofted shot, slamming it over wide long-on for maximum, woof!

doosra again, and another -999. mccullum goes for the sweep from off to leg and doesn't seem to have read the -999 that's leaving him. ball balloons up off the top edge and chamara silva, prowling at short fine leg, moves quick and pulls off a sensational diving catch. it was dipping quickly but he lunged full length and held on.

the doosra does it, turning into the left-hander, full and on off and oram pushes it back tentatively. it loops back low to murali and he latches on well, tapping it form his right to left hand as he juggles the catch. murali's second good catch of the innings and the first -999 that produces a -999. there's a certain joy in his eyes when he pouches them.

turned to the leg side, the full balls are being easily dealt with here

full ball on off, turned -999 past the square fielder for a -999. good stop but he can't stop the -999
pushed square off the back foot and they think of -999 but decide against it in the end

jayasuriya bounding in now, and firing those customary darts. on off and pushed to cover

round the -999 for the left-hander, tucked -999 to the leg side

misfield, unfortunate for bond, gibbs opens the face of the bat and times the ball beautifully through the off side, the fielder at cover runs across to his right, misfields on the dive and the ball races -999, another desparing dive can't cut that off
good length outside off and defended to point
misfield, played down to backward point and ross taylor over runs it and lets the ball slip through his fingers
nice delivery, lands outside off and jags back in, kemp keeps his eyes on the ball and defends off the full face to the off side
outside off and dabbed down to third man with an open face
good length on middle and leg, delivered at a lively pace, kemp goes back and defends to mid-on
pushed to the off side
kemp struggles to connect the ball cleanly as he tries to work it to the off side and ends up chopping it down on the crease, the ball lobs up on the first bounce and rolls to the keeper
good length outside off, kemp gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
good length on off and middle, pushed to the on side

big edge and taken! short of a length outside off and wide, de villiers stays rooted to the crease and tries to slash over point, the ball gets the top half of the bat and an easy take by mccullum.  bad ball, poor stroke
the free hit costs nothing for nz, yorker outside off, gibbs gives room and digs it -999, the ball gets the underedge and rolls to mccullum
gillespie oversteps, bowls that really wide outside the off stump as well, either way the delivery wasn't legal
full and outside off, gibbs tries to drive through the covers but doesnt time it well, the ball gets the underhalf of his bat and rolls back to gillespie
teaser from gillespie, lands it on a good length outside off, gibbs tries to drive without using his feet, the ball just beats the underedge of the bat
fuller in length, on the pads, smith works it to the on side off his pads
good length outside off, gillespie works up some pace, smith gauges the bounce and lets it go
driven uppishly over the covers, he gave himself room and timed that sweetly
short and lively welcome from tremlett
uthappa steps -999 or -999 paces to the off and is bowled by a full delivery ... a gamble, but aren't most shots at this stage of twenty20?
down the leg side, no sniff of swing, right where it was aimed, a heave and a miss from dhoni
driven with bottom hand aplenty to long-on
flowing square drive, all along the ground to the man on the boundary edge
launched over wide midwicket for a -999-bounce -999, beautifully picked up and timed
squeezed off his toes to short fine leg
slog-driven to long-on
-999 step this time and flicked to deep midwicket
much better, much crisper, -999 steps and hammered over extra cover
a swing, a thick inside edge beats short fine leg. 'son of a biscuit eater,' yells maddy. well, almost ...
straight, patted back to maddy
lovely shot, outside off, full length, angled through the cordon and -999 to the third man boundary. great skill and improvisation
premeditated, and carved off middle stump -999 to deep point where flintoff stoops and fields
whipped wristily into the leg-side, fuller length again
full, on leg stump. gambhir needed to play that finer to beat the field, but it's a good diving stop nonetheless at short backward square
the shot was on, but sehwag missed with a slashing cut. a bit fortunate for anderson there ...
raps the pads and runs -999 to gully
cracking effort from broad at third man, hauled in a certain -999 after a bit of width from flintoff
too much room that time
strange shot that time, sehwag hops across to whip into the leg side, but is beaten by the bounce. nipped off the seam and through to the keeper
fuller and straighter, sehwag hustles his shot into the leg side and finds the gap
outside off stump and climbing through to the keeper
flintoff finishes with an emphatic thump that harbhajan this time can't cut off. england reach 200 and save some pride, but it's india who march on

that's an incredible catch from harbhajan on the long-on boundary! he reached up and back and plucked the -999 from thin air, inches inside the rope and right in front of the england dug--999! risked life and limb and came up trumps!
that must be the lowest-key maximum of the day. helped over deep midwicket, to a bare ripple of appreciation
down on -999 knee and slapped over the covers. good, but not good enough
way down the leg-side but dhoni does well to save -999 byes
back of a length, and clubbed down to long-off. it's all a bit futile now
massive intent, but not enough connection. midwicket cleans up
now he's too full, and the umpire is in danger as pietersen drives hard and straight. another boundary
deposited into the stands! far too short from joginder, and kp climbed into it, over midwicket
dabbed into the leg-side, and collingwood threatens to take -999. pietersen isn't so keen
stand and deliver. collingwood steps inside the line and swats that firmly behind square. top shot. a fraction too short, and the man drops back at deep midwicket
driven firmly but no great power, down to long-on
slower ball, and pietersen doesn't quite pick it. the ball was in the air for an age, but just plopped -999 of reach of deep cover. a bit of good fortune for england
over wide long-on

calamity. rp singh trips at third man on his way to trying to catch a huge top edge. he can only make a fumbling, desperate grope at the ball as it rejects his advances to fly on its merry way through. rp checks his studs afterwards
driven -999 to mid-on and the strike's rotated again
tighter line, and a good delivery now - play and a miss through to the keeper
a touch of width and cut behind point
swivels in his medium pace and beats him, the ball jumping over his bat
speared in full, on leg, nibbled -999 to short cover for a quick strike-stealing -999
on middle, short enough to be worked into midwicket for a -999
straight as you like, forcing the defensive
straighter, drops his hands down on it and they run through a -999
movement -999 again, wider this time, maddy cuts tamely at it - with no footwork
nearly starts with a -999 - pitching on a great length, nipping -999 from the right hander and almost kissing the edge
good sportsmanship from symonds, running in at mid-on - he nearly got there to take the catch with the dive forward, but tells the umpire immediately that he did take it cleanly
outside off, too full, vaas drives it hard down the ground but doesn't quite time it and it's collected inside the straight long-off boundary
dribbled -999 to mid-on for a quick -999
short, on leg - a long hop - and vaas wrists the ball up and towards hayden at deep square... but he can't quite meet it before it pitches
full delivery - lee's done well with such deliveries this tournament - and it's dug -999 here
the batsman likes the pace coming onto the bat; he presents the face and the ball runs -999 to mid-off
a touch of width outside off, driven -999 to mid-off and that rounds off another tidy spell
a hint of swing -999, the batsman waits and cuts through the gully
slower ball, picked, and driven -999 in front of midwicket for a comfortable -999
tight line again, and a good length; can only be driven -999 to the fielder at cover
half-volley, driven back -999 straight towards long-off
outside off, played down to third man
extra nip off the pitch, and sangakkara's scything cut finds only thin air
banged in, and balloons off the glove as dilshan is beaten for pace. an attempted pull lands behind square, but safe
straighter and fuller, and played with a vertical bat for a change
backing -999 - the batsman's curse in this tournament - and johnson finds just enough swing to evade a slashing drive
clipped off the toes, but straight to midwicket
full and straight, turned into the leg side
on the spot again, with a touch of outswing as well. dilshan leaves well alone
straighter this time, and nudged for a -999
width, and that's sri lanka's best shot of the day - a full-flowing cover-drive that no--999 can intercept

he frees his arms this time, but to absolutely no avail - a massive windmill of a wind-up, but a ball that was intended to vanish over the covers instead spirals down to brett lee on the third man boundary. credit to clark, he built the pressure and silva cracked
more of the same, no room to free the arms
immaculate line and length - it's just like watching the ashes all over again - and silva defends with a perfectly straight bat
shorter and straighter, tucked off the ribs but can't beat the field
fuller and shaping back into the right-hander, clipped off leg stump and a scurried -999
width outside off stump, but silva misses -999 with a cut shot. too eager to cash in?
not such a good ball. pitches outside leg and stays that way
half an appeal as johnson jags -999 off the seam but that was missing leg, and too high as well. good ball all the same
an attempted cut, but too late on the stroke
on leg stump and clipped fine. a welcome boundary
that's just horrible. -999 steps down the track and an almighty slog over the infield. except he doesn't make contact at all. australia are bossing this contest
outside off, and a more sensible choice of stroke this time, a delicate dab down to third man
a massive swipe across the line. sri lanka are losing their heads now
dabbed -999 to cover, tip-and-run stuff, and a direct hit from symonds would have had him gone for all money. reckless stuff
dropped - that was an easy chance that hodge made into a tough opportunity with a mistimed leap at cover. another careless shot though, sangakkara was driving at a ball that wasn't there for the shot
on a good length outside off stump and shaping -999. defended with a vertical bat
swing, connect, deposit into the long-on stands. that shot was as vast as the victory itself
tucked down to third man with a shimmy at the crease - as if he was in ten minds
another attempted yorker, but this time it comes -999 as a low full-toss, and that's mullahed down the ground for the straightest and sweetest -999 of the innings
fuller length, almost yorker-length, swinging -999 and dug -999 to point
smeared through midwicket. a step and a shimmy, and a massive swing of the blade. hayden at his bullying best
fuller and straighter, and drilled down to long-off
short and pulled, so quickly into position and it whistles -999. hardly any margin for error
a smidgeon of width, and gilchrist flails an attempted cover drive - it loops over the infield and plugs at point, ten yards in from the rope. a bit chancy that time
very full and on the stumps, the batsman goes a bit to leg and opens the face of the bat to run the ball to the off side
full and straight again, played defensively to the leg side
short of a good length and outside the off, good pace on this, flashy cut played and missed
very full and on the stumps, prised -999 to the on side

very full and on the stumps, attempted yorker from gul. it's well dug -999 by mashrafe mortaza. mahmudullah wants the -999 and sprints down the pitch. unfortunately the ball deflects of mahmudullah and goes straight to gul. gul picks up and throws down the stumps and that's another -999 gone
short -999 dug in on the off stump, mortaza goes back and defends the ball to leg
pushed towards short midwicket for  a -999
dropped, junaid tries to clear the straight boundary this time but hits it towards gul on the boundary who makes a hash of it, the ball hits his hand, bounces once and goes over the boundary
played towards short third man for -999 more
dabbed towards the off side for  a quick -999
junaid uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and with a free swing of his arms, he lofts afridi over midwicket, the ball bounces just inside the rope

flicked off the pads behind square for a -999
butt moves back in his crease and plays a wristy drive to long-on
defended towards midwicket off the back foot
driven of the front foot to deep point

-999, stumped off a wide, excellent reflexes from mushfiqur, razzak fired -999 down leg side, younis khan tried to turn it behind square but missed, he over-balanced and lifted his back leg and in the split second that he needed to get back into his crease, mushfiqur had whipped off the bails
played towards third man off the back foot
good length delivery angling across the right-hander, hafeez defends the ball towards cover off the front foot

on fire! it's sehwag gone now and india are in deep, deep trouble here. that was a soft dismissal after an extremely promising start from sehwag. that was short of a length and outside the off, sehwag plays -999 from his body without much conviction, trying to steer the ball through the off side and only manages an edge. mark boucher pouches the catch.

another! dinesh karthik falls! that was a rather uncontrolled shot first up. pollock pitches -999 up on the pads and karthik flicks lazily. the ball loops up in the air and straight into albie morkel's hands at square-leg. karthik didn't even try to hit that -999 especially hard. now that's put india in a spot of bother after a reasonably good start on a tricky pitch.
overpitched and on the pads, sehwag once again has no trouble working the ball -999 through the on-side

gone! india lose their first -999. it's gambhir who falls. he comes down the pitch and tries to heave the ball over the on side. he can't quite get hold of it and the ball goes up in the air. this time the fielder calls it - it's graeme smith - and settles under a catch at mid-off after running a few yards.
fullish and on the pads, sehwag once again is quick to go across and dab the ball -999 to the leg side for runs

on the pads once again and boucher once again flicks superbly to the backward square leg boundary, poor line from harbhajan

another short, wide ball. amid all the stunning cricket india are giving -999 a lot of extras as well.

just short of a length and on the off. driven -999 to the off side. rohit sharma swoops down on the ball from cover, picks the ball up -999-handed on the dive and throws almost parallel to the ground. the throw is powerful and accurate and nails the stumps. that is a sensational bit of fielding and a big, big -999 for india
fullish and a touch too straight, the batsman can walk across and work that -999 down to fine-leg

short of a length and outside the off, left alone to the keeper. strange scenes here. after that stunning catch karthik has taken over the gloves from dhoni. now the captain is at mid-off. perhaps he wants to bowl later on?

stunner! that is an absolute ripper from dinesh karthik in the slips cordon. it's a wide, swinging, full delivery from rp singh and smith has a real go at it. the ball flies off the outside edge really quick and wide. karthik throws himself full length to his left and catches this -999 with both hands. that is a catch right -999 of the top drawer. you won't see too many more like that.
fullish and on the off, a hint of swing -999 for the left-handed smith, punched to mid-off

very full and on the stumps, rp singh gets this ball bang on target. the ball swings back in gibbs has only got his foot a bit down the pitch as the ball beats the bat and crashes into the pad. there's a spontaneous appeal and the finger goes up! india strike. gibbs is not happy with the call and is shaking his head but he has to go. that was the perfect left-arm seamer's delivery to the right-hand batsman.

low full toss pulled high in the air off the bottomn of the bat and that's a poor piece of keeping from akmal who calls for it... and then fluffs it. that may be amusing, but let's hope for his sake that it doesn't come down to a run...
