superb yorker, dhoni digs it -999 on the leg side
another 50 for kohli, he gets there by swatting a short ball to deep midwicket, he barely celebrates, did not even raise his bat, he looks super determined and knows the job is far from done
short of a length and wide outside off, dhoni cuts hard to deep point, just the -999 this time because it was hit powerfully
charges the bowler and ends up yorking himself, dhoni gets a thick inside edge on to his boot and back towards the bowler
bowled wide outside leg stump, kohli reaches for it and plays through square leg
cut hard off the back foot but to the fielder at point
another short ball, but yuvraj misses the pull and gets hit on the pads right in front of the stumps, but -999 think it pitched outside leg so that can't be lbw
a loose, friendly full toss and yuvraj puts it into the stands at cow corner, just stood in his crease and smacked it cleanly
the googly does not come on to the bat and yuvraj can't beat point with the cut
nudged off the front foot through midwicket, yuvraj says no to the second again
flicked off the pads to deep square leg for a -999
a good length ball on middle and leg, yuvraj tucks the ball behind square leg and he is hobbling again, it's a real struggle for him to run, shouldn't he go off?
short of a length angling into the left-hander from around the -999, yuvraj jumps up and defends
there's that cover drive from kohli, gets forward and punches the ball through the line, timing it superbly, they could have run -999 but yuvraj's leg isn't in good shape
good length but the line is down leg side, that's a wide

tucked off the hips to fine leg and yuvraj hobbles in pain as he begins to run. what's happened there? it's his left leg and he was hopping through to complete the run. the physio comes on to take a look at what's wrong. yuvraj had jumped back to glance the ball off his hips and as his left foot landed it twisted as he set off for a run
edged but wide of first slip and it beats third man! he wanted to play it to third man but there was a slip in place and it wasn't too wide of him
steps -999 of his crease but has to check his shot towards cover after hazlewood shortens the length and denies dhawan the room to attack
good length on middle and off, dhawan comes forward and plays towards cover
tip and run on the off side, soft hands pushing the ball towards cover
dabbed behind point for a -999

shot! sails over maxwell's head at deep square leg! it was a length ball at a faster pace on leg and middle, dhawan plants his foot forward and swings across the line, great timing and balance on the crease
good length on middle and off, not coming on to the bat, dhawan pushes off the front foot to mid off
hazlewood falls over in his follow through after delivering a short of a length ball down leg side, dhawan can't connect with the pull
boom! boom boom rashid? will that catch on? no, probably not - great hit over long-off
slogs this to deep square leg
down the leg side, zadran attempts to whip but can't connect
short and slow, zadran steps back and sort of slaps it, or tries to, but it bobbles back to russell
mistimed down the ground. though it's his lack of timing which affords -999
a huge slog across the line but he can only sky it into the leg-side, and fletcher takes it comfortably - that was in the air for a long, long time
power! slower-ball bouncer and nabi waits, and waits, and waits, before pulling in front of square for -999
full bunger, bunged off to the off side
slower ball this time, nicely stroked to long-off
tries it again and connects this time, lofting it over cover, albeit without any timing
windy, wooly, swish of the blade, leaning back and dreaming of crashing this over extra cover, but his dreams don't come true
too straight and he clips this to deep square leg
uppishly forced to deep mid-on
ah, lovely little tickle there from najib past fine-leg
again defended to point
back-cut to point. he thinks about a run but the fielding is alert - alive, energetic, dominant
carved -999 to the off side
on middle-and-leg, it's defended
forced to long-off
a slowish, loopy delivery and a touch shorter, he tries to loft it but can't get underneath it and bravo holds onto the skier at long-on
quick -999 -999 to cover
very slow - -999 don't have the mph for you unfortunately, but it can't have been more than 65mph. driven -999 to mid-off
a slower ball which he dabs -999 to cover
this is nicely timed by gulbadin who meets the ball and drives it crisply to the left of mid-on - but it's well fielded
short of a length, clobbered to mid-off
beats him! well bowled, just outside the off stump and the turn beats gulbadin's hopeful poke
off the mark nudging to leg
late-cut to sammy at the first and lone slip who takes a very slick, smart catch, low to his right. shenwari looks aghast and confused at his stroke, as indeed we all are
wants to turn it to leg but can't
tame dismissal. shahzad danced down the pitch, stepping to leg and hit him straight to mid-off who took a decent, if facile, low catch
badree sees shahzad coming and drops it short
walks at badree, defending it back to the bowler
much quicker ball - shahzad tries to cut, and does cut, but straight to point
well played - plants his front foot solidly and sweeps with power
leg-spinner on middle, stanikzai comes down the pitch to defend
flicked off his pads to retain the strike
capitalises on this shorter ball which is much too straight and unthreatening, and he hooks him fine for -999!
an extravagant defensive to a slower ball from brathwaite
lovely stroke! not quite timed, but lofted it over the leg-side for -999, and the storm is -999
tries to mow this over midwicket but it's a touch too full, the ball bobbling -999 to the off side
full but on his pads and he flicks to leg
defended on the front foot
bowled him! the wrong'un and ghani doesn't pick it, the ball turning nicely through the gate
very full. shazad, remaining back in his crease, defends on the back foot and literally walks a -999
short and straight, allowing shahzad to tuck him around the corner for a couple
shazad, fleet of foot, dances down the pitch to work it to leg
flighted on middle. shahzad smothers
driven back to the bowler
bosh! steps back and slaps this over the bowler for -999. didn't quite time in and it plugs in the outfield, but he got a good enough connection on it
a confident drive to mid-off, standing tall
full and straight. ghani, the right-handed 19-year-old, defends

down the leg side, he goes for a flick and is caught behind! russell appeals, but ramdin, diving low to his left, isn't sure whether he took it cleanly or not. replays show the ball found its way into ramdin's fingers but, as he tumbled to his left, the ball touched the ground so it's not -999
very good yorker! shahzad just gets his bat down in time
pulled to leg, and afghanistan notch a famous, brilliant win!
a full toss, pushed down the ground - he can't get hold of it and hobbles through for a -999
full toss but only for -999, pushed to deep midwicket

lofted it high, high, long, long and here comes naib who takes an amazing, brave, brilliant running catch! what an incredible take under pressure, falling awkwardly and he looks in some pain. stunning!
down the pitch and swings and misses again! dot ball
swings and misses! dot ball
another yorker attempted but brathwaite calmly, cooly, turns it to leg for a -999
he's second-tiered him. a massive, massive blow as naib offers a full-toss. monstrous blow over midwicket
he's off balance, trying to loft this over cover but afghanistan have another -999! a loose shot in the circumstances, picking -999 deep extra cover who, cool as a cucumber, takes an easy catch
speared into his legs, naib is convinced he's got his man, jogging backwards while appealing, then falling onto his backside!
shot. absolutely nailed it over long-off. he really can hit a laaaang ball!
spearing into his pads, driven to mid-off
goddim! darted this in, bravo tries to work it off his pads but misses and he's trapped in front
short and wide but bravo's cut can't find the gap
punched to the misfielding cover who, as befitting his title, misfields
an injudicious reverse sweep to a delivery too full to be sweeping
another easy -999 to leg as bravo turns his wrists on it
turned to leg
down the pitch, clipped to long-on confidently to retain the strike
holds this -999 up nicely, just on middle, and bravo blocks
cute. a delicate late-cut-nudge
touch of turn back into the right hander. he punches for -999
full, wide, defended
beats him! outside off, he came forward fishily to this straighter delivery and missed it
too short and turned to square leg
wow - he's got all of this. he has utterly nailed it over wide long-on!
another attempt at pulling this into the deep and he mistimes it, but the ball lands safely between the -999 men at deep midwicket
fuller this time, charles - miles back in his crease, like lewis - waits, before stroking to leg
doesn't move his feet, disdainfully trying to smash this to leg but can't time it
huge blow over midwicket - a loopy, flighted gift and charles has murdered it

that was tough work for vandersay, but he's still standing. fierce short ball looking for his badge, he plays a pull in self-defence and the top edge does not hang in the air long enough for de kock to get under it
fast, short, on leg stump, ugly heave down towards long-on
well bowled. swaps the yorker for a slow bouncer and shanaka, who had backed -999 for the upper cut, cannot time his stroke well enough
eish, the yorker goes wrong and at that pace, shanaka only had to get an inside edge on it. gets a lot more than that. lovely flick to the long leg boundary. the fielder was up inside the circle
wanders down to third man

not when he bowls it like that though. full, fast, and straight. vandersay blocks it, and the ball pops back up at steyn. appeals for the catch off ricochet on the boot. but he was just being coy. ravi, though, was already going up to consult with his partner.
slows it down, dilshan minds it as he defends with soft hands into the covers and then he looks for a -999. can't they see faf is not the man to be playing such games with?
steered behind point again as the batsman waits on the left-arm spin
steered behind point
beaten in flight! beautifully bowled, phangiso. did he preempt it. held the ball back, and dilshan's slog sweep was nowhere near it
tossed up on off stump, driven back at him
eased into the covers as phangiso prepares to bowl -999
opens the face against a shortish ball outside off, wiese moves across to his left to get behind that
nudges it behind square leg. the middle stump, or even off stump line, has been dilshan's bread and butte rthis innings
waits on a length ball on the pads and works it through square leg

faf's having a party in the infield and sri lanka are only too happy to wander in and be suckerpunched. a length ball outside off sticks in the pitch a bit and robs jayasuriya of a pretty drive on the up. shouldn't be playing those shots so early into his innings against the older ball
fullish and just outside off, defended into the covers
full and wide outside off with the keeper standing up, slashed -999 to the sweeper cover

again, dilshan exploits the leg side field with great skill. wiese isn't the fastest of this lot, so he can be confident of working him around. the batsman shuffles across and whips a back of a length ball from seventh stump behind square leg
he is a lovely timer of the ball, but like all left-handers, he seems a bit airy outside off. pokes an angled bat -999 from his body again and gets a thick outside edge through point
leans towards a fuller ball and tucks it from outside off through midwicket. runs on offer there every time you hit it with all the men in the deep
good length ball on middle and off, defended
opens the face and finds a way to get off strike. more unintentional, because he had been looking at a gap squarer than where the ball went
lovely again. picked his spot, but before that he had picked the length. it was limp and short, milinda moves back and short-arm pulls it to the long leg boundary

and all he gets is a golden duck! what can you do? the last ball didn't turn, this pitches wide outside off and hurtles into the stumps! no magic from the pitch, just the left-arm spinner deceiving a batsman in bad form with a beauty. beautiful bowling from phangiso. tossed it up to entice the cover drive and drove through the gap to derail thirimanne

played for the turn and looks up with horror in his eyes once he heard the rattle behind him. do those new fangled stumps still rattle? phangiso is not a big spinner of the ball, certainly not when he's been hit for a couple of fours in the first -999 balls. speared it in flat, it sneaked through the gap between bat and pad as chandi went for an expansive cover drive without moving his front foot across. captain walks off with dilshan in his ear
drilled to long-off
another rush down the track, but this time phangiso adjusted well. fired it in quicker, and shorter and refused him any swinging room. dabbed towards point
more! down the track and his quick feet gets him in prime position to lift a lenght ball over long-on
and the wise old man thumps him! dilshan does not want south africa an escape route. not even a breather as he takes a simple length ball on off stump and slog sweeps it -999
back of a length and outside off, steered to deep third man
and another! gleefully presses forward at a length ball and bashes it over long-on. that's the equivalent of a bonk on the head
that's the shot of the night! 140 clicks, heavy projectile heading for your head, and chandimal was on the front foot, pushes his weight back, and hooks it for a -999!
good length ball outside off, pushed into the covers
quick and on middle and leg, dilshan was looking for his flick but didn't quite connect properly. -999 behind square leg

simple as that! he's well, half-dilscooped dale steyn. the guts need to be appreciated though, to go down face to face with the ball delivered from a speed demon. didn't time it, and most of the impact was off the thigh pad. steyn simply turned around and walked off
flatter delivery outside off, cut into the covers. looks like sri lanka are trying to push it fast and refuse any room to ab
flighted outside off, slashed to long-off
offers a short ball down leg, pulled -999 to long leg
flighted on off stump, punched past the bowler even as chandi shouts 'mili, mili, mili!' to push him over to cover the extra yard
goes back to a good length ball and pushes it to long-off
back of a length and outside off, punched through the covers
gets down the track and works a good length ball through the midwicket region

that's the captain deciding herath is too dangerous to keep bowling as he pleases. plays the shot that every spinner hates - the sweep - and it connects so well that thirimanne, who only had to move a little way to his left, misfields
played the trajectory - which was flatter - as he goes back to cut. but the ball comes on with the arm, skids on rather and had been been any slower, he would have been bowled
wanted to jump down, but herath trumped him by going flatter and on leg stump. wanders -999 off the pads
crisp drive towards mid-off. faf reached the pitch of that with a long stride
tossed up on off stump, defended to point
slashed to backward point
lovely placement from the mighty hash. he stood still, didn't make any movement to get across to a flighted ball on off stump. camped on leg, he nails a drive to the right of deep cover
plays the angle into him - and picked the right ball for the sweep because it was fullish too - -999 to short fine leg
keeps to his crease, watches the ball carefully, settles into a late cut and is suddenly at the other end
flighted in on middle, amla stays leg side of it and drives to short cover
there's the arm ball again, and even amla hasn't read it. plants the defensive bat where it would have arrived had there been any turn. inside edge to square leg
nudged behind square leg, but it hasn't travelled far enough to be any runs
good length ball on middle, defended
a whiplash from amla to reach the ball - held back a bit just outside off - and hits it to the covers
steered into the covers off a lovely long stride
that was the straighter -999, clever bowling from herath. targeting the stumps, and the ball was tossed up to disguise that. faf went to drive through the covers and instead gets the inside edge

big ole swing and a miss from mcclenaghan... and this time stokes hits at the non-striker's end, relaying the ball on from buttler. another brightly buffed final over from stokes, conceding just -999 and saving another run at the end there. so, nz put up 153 for 8. is that enough in the can for cricket's catenaccio masters?
back of a length, at the body and elliott misses with a flick to leg, stokes swoops on it like a seagull on a wotsit  but can't prevent -999
another slowie, on the stumps, whipped into the leg side for -999
slower ball outside off, swing and miss from elliott but they run anyway... stokes is tossed the ball by buttler but misses with a shy at the other end

tries to hit on the up - and sends it straight into the safe hands of jordan at long-off! third -999 for stokes, nz struggling to get -999 as england wrap them up in a chokehold. santner had the right idea, to hit inside -999, but lacked the muscle or timing
canny stuff from stokes, digs in a cutter halfway down, it spins and loops past the horizontal bat

bludgeoned, a full toss from rashid and anderson gives it a spank straight back down the ground. jordon puts in a super effort from long-off, sliding on his shirt front  to get an arm in the way, but his momentum helps carry to ball over the rope
pushed through on middle and leg, taylor works it -999 through midwicket... he's hobbling at the other end, not sure if he rolled his ankle, or what
floated up -999 the back of the hand, spinning back in, taylor blocks it toward his toes
pushed through, another googly on the legs, anderson clips it off his hip
flighted, possibly the googly, anderson gets down and swats a couple through square leg
pushed through with a flatter trajectory, taylor dinks -999 back down the ground
tossed up down the leg side, poor ball to start with
on the stumps, no width now, taylor drives down the ground to get off the mark
pitched up, full and straight, anderson backs -999 and hacks through the covers to the sweeper
on the hips, anderson stays back and nudges the ball fine, good running brings them back for -999, wasn't a great throw to buttler
short, at the batsman, blocked down into the covers

slung down well outside off, munro gives chase... and slices it h--999--999--999--999--999--999--999--999-g-h straight to third man! another key breakthrough for england, munro was flying but plunkett has lassoed him to the ground, clearly a plan to try and frustrate him and a wild hack went straight to moeen walking a few yards in from the fence
again plunkett goes full and wide, aiming for the tramlines... munro doesn't pull the trigger but neither is this called wide. maybe a touch lucky
fired across the bows from over the -999, too much width, -999 to the extra column
flighted, straightening outside off, williamson deftly dabs it straight to short third man
tighter lines, skidding on and pushed into the off side
late cut, that's running -999 behind point, silkily done by kw! dropped back and waited for the ball, spinning -999 and sent scuttling to the rope
dragged down a little in response and flicked off the legs
shot! munro brings -999 the reverse-mullered-sweep-cum-pull and sends it high over point for -999! that's the opposite to williamson, totally ungainly but equally effective
tossed up and driven back past the bowler for -999 more
full and straight, dug -999 back down the ground to long-on
back of a length outside off, england thudding -999 on the middle of the deck, slapped through the off side to the sweeper
shortish at the body, flicked fine off the thigh pad

beautiful stroke, caressed for -999 over long-off! that is quite majestic from williamson, set himself in the crease and lofted stokes back down the ground for the first maximum of the innings... fire meets ice
banged in halfway down, 137kph/85mph and rising towards the armpit, swatted -999 to deep square leg on the pull
short of a length outside off, williamson dabs -999 more to third man
opens the face and pushes just to the left of cover to keep the strike
a length ball is pushed back to the bowler
pushed down the leg side again, this time no contact from roy...neat take from ronchi
ah, that's lovely from roy as this time he stands his ground, santner slips this down the leg side and roy sweeps it very fine
what power, again! moves outside leg stump, santner follows him with a full delivery, fired in at the toes, and he's able to bludgeon it straight down the ground
comes down the pitch outside leg stump, takes the pad into the leg side and a scampered leg-bye brings up the fifty
round the -999, full at the stumps, pushed firmly to mid-on

that is a sensational drive and the timing is so good that even the rapid russell can't cut it off from long-off ! kohli came forward and moved slightly outside leg and drove a length ball on the up through extra cover, russell was tearing across the turf and dived but the ball beat him comfortably
mis-timed back to the bowler, bravo does not turn around and try and run -999 dhoni

that's swatted flat in the air, brathwaite comes running in from the long-on boundary and dives forward to try and catch it, the ball bounces just in front of him and goes past for -999. kohli dragged that with a flat bat from wide outside off
dhoni moves his front foot outside leg and drives a near-blockhole ball to long on for a -999
a length ball outside off, kohli's bottom hand comes off the bat as he drives to deep cover
a slower full toss, quite high with not much dip, dhoni tries to glance to the fine leg boundary but short fine leg is in the way, bravo is lucky to get -999 there
good length outside off, dabbed off the back foot towards point
that is a filthy long hop (is there another kind?) and rahane goes back and hammers the pull with tremendous power to the midwicket boundary
cut off the back foot to deep point
flicked off the front foot in front of square leg for a -999
played back to the bowler off the back foot
cut off the back foot through point for -999 more
bowled down leg side, that's a wide
turned through midwicket with those sublime wrists and this time the -999 is easier to complete
slashes and -999! the thick edge flies between the keeper and short third man, kohli marks the occasion with a fist pump. adrenalin is not in short supply -999 there.
another run -999 chance! kohli races back for the second and has to dive full length but he would not have made it had ramdin collected the throw cleanly from deep square leg

kohli has been reprieved and how! bravo beat him with a dipping slower ball and for some unearthly reason, at this stage of the game, kohli wanted to steal a bye to the keeper. he charged -999 of his crease for a crazy bye and rahane sent him back. ramdin under-armed at the stumps and just missed off stump. kohli was so far -999 that bravo collected the throw in the middle of the pitch and threw at the stumps, but he missed leg stump by a whisker. kohli survives. west indies have their hands on their heads. what on earth has happened.

another bouncer, kohli misses the pull and then looks expectantly at the umpire, there's no call of no-ball at first but kohli insists and eventually the arm goes up. west indies are not happy. free hit coming up
the faster bouncer, outside off, kohli drops his wrists and lets it go
there's the first of many, a slower ball that dips on the batsman, played off the front foot to midwicket
driven off the front foot into the covers where gayle dives to make the stop
short ball, poor length, it sits up, and rohit is in his element now on an absolute batting beauty of a pitch, he rocks back and pulls the ball over midwicket
dabs the ball to third man off the back foot for a -999
played off the back foot towards point for a -999
wham! the free-hit is a length ball, rohit clears his front foot, presses forward and frees his arms, smashing the ball dead straight over the bowler's head

that's a high full toss, and rohit smashes it, pulling it high and far over the long leg boundary, that was a fast ball above the waist but rohit was quick enough to pounce. a no-ball for height and a free-hit coming up.
good length angling into the right-hander, rohit tries to turn through square but misses
played with soft hands on the off side for a -999
on the front foot this time, down on -999 knee, and he executes the sweep perfectly, after that previous ball benn bowled fuller and on the pads
shot! rohit has time to go back because the length is short and space to free his arms because the line is wide, he then laces the ball through cover with a lovely drive
the quicker and flatter ball outside off, rohit stays in his crease and drives firmly but can't beat cover
goes back and gently defends to the bowler, some turn and bounce for the towering benn
rohit opens the face as it turns a little and guides it past the diving gayle at first slip
a hard-run -999 and a full-length dive to beat the throw from mid-on, though benn missed at the bowler's end. rohit knew he had not pushed the ball forcefully to the fielder and called immediately
a full delivery on off stump, rohit drives off the front foot but can't beat mid-off
rahane moves forward and towards the off and jabs the ball down towards midwicket where badree is on the edge of the circle
a length ball angling in to middle stump, rohit presses forward and plays the ball through square leg by closing the face of the bat
extra bounce outside off from short of a length, rohit rises and tries to cut but is beaten
and there it is! rohit leans forward and towards the off side to launch a length ball through the line over long-on, clean strike
good length just outside off, defended from the crease on the off side, top start by russell
short of a length and that ball climbs on rahane who gets on tip-toe and fends it down behind square leg for a -999
shoddy fielding from badree at midwicket, rohit turned the ball off the pads straight to him and he came running in and just let it go past
good length and angling into the pads, rohit misses the glance and gets hit on the thigh, he wants the leg bye but russell moves across to field so quickly that rahane sends him back
that holds its line from a good length outside off, rohit tried to defend from his crease and ended up playing inside the line and was beaten
a full ball on the pads, hittable, rohit leans across in his crease and flicks gently, to midwicket

what a shot, what incredible power, russell gets down on -999 knee and just blitzes the ball to the cover boundary, how quickly that travelled off the ball, tracer buller, as india's team manager would say
deathly silence at the wankhede. length ball with room outside off, russell slams it straight over the bowler's head, and very far, very very far
gold for india, a dot ball. bowled full and straight, played back to the bowler.
just a -999, simmons pulls but can't beat the man at deep midwicket
flat and fast, slapped down the ground to long on for a -999
fired wide outside off stump, nearly a wide, but no quite, the batsman slogs and misses
in the blockhole again from around the -999, driven to long on, simmons made room by moving outside leg
nearly in the blockhole, russell backs -999 and slugs it towards long on
this is some power hitting from russell, he moves back and towards the off and pulls a short ball over deep midwicket, such power, did not look like he timed it but when you have those muscles ...
in the blockhole, top delivery, russell plays it back to the bowler
short of a length from around the -999, simmons moves forward and towards the off to glance off his hips, doesn't make proper contact to short fine leg
a full toss outside off, rather low, russell hits it to long off for a -999
a full ball outside off, driven along the ground to long off
nudged off the back foot towards short fine leg, simmons enters the world t20 with a half-century in a semi-final, top innings
short of a length on middle and leg, played off the pads to deep square leg
driven firmly back down the pitch, kohli dives to his right and fields nimbly, throws the ball back to dhoni quickly too
played off the pads behind square leg

would you believe it? he has struck first ball! can this man do no wrong on the field? the ball was short and it skidded on to charles who went back and played a flat-batted pull of sorts, he lofted it straight to rohit, who ran in from long off to break the stand. incredible. very ordinary ball, but clearly the force is with kohli tonight
steps -999 and hacks at the length ball, hitting it along the ground to long on
a fuller ball outside off, charles moves outside off stump to swat on the leg side and gets hit on the pad, not sure why pandya was appealing, that hit the pad miles outside off
backs -999 outside leg and drills the cover drive to the fielder in the circle
gets beaten outside off stump, closed the face as the ball held its line

shot! pandya hasn't quite learned that he isn't express pace, keeps banging the ball short of a length and charles has thumped it off the front foot to the cow corner boundary, the west indies dugout rises to applaud charles' fifty, he's played really well
backs -999 outside leg and plays the ball towards cover point, pandya followed the batsman to cramp him for room
a top edge just evades a backtracking short fine leg, a couple more. strays down leg and simmons is through the pull way too early.
once again, darted in on middle, a tad short though. bunted -999 towards cover. another dot
flatter again on middle, pushed back to the bowler

beautiful shot. a clean swing of the bat and a lovely place to hit the ball too. very full on middle, simmons backs -999 and offers the full face of the bat, golf-swing. straight over the long-off boundary
flat again, fired in on simmons' pads who flicks to square leg. sufficiently in the gap in front of square for a couple
flat delivery on off to start, not much turn. enough time for charles to go back and nudge to square leg
slower ball on off stump, turned -999 to long-on
yorker on middle, jordan says pot calling kettle and blocks. brathwaite claims the ball, and appeals for a catch. nope. not getting that
yorker on off stump, squeezed -999 to third man

a good throw would have ended bukhari's innings. bukhari swats it -999 to the legside and turns for the second, but although the batsman is struggling, taylor has too much work to do, his underarm throw misses the stumps.
decent yorker again, turned towards deepmidwicket
length ball on the stumps, bukhari is trying to whack it, but connects only well enough to get a -999 to long on
shortish slower ball, angled into the body. cooper tries to pull but it hits him on the stomach. batsmen scamper through
nutmegs him with a yorker. that was full, going just down the leg side, but cooper gets -999 leg either side and it goes through the gap
shortish ball outside off stump, bukhari chops it square on the off side
fired full and fast on the toes, bukhari hits it to long on
full again on the pads. cooper sweeps it to square leg again, all along the ground
fullish ball, punched to long on
length ball turning into the batsman, who can't get bat to it. there's a shout, but that's going down leg
full on the legs again, swept square this time, to deep square leg
poor ball to start. fires it full and way down leg, cooper paddles it fine to complete a fine, fifty. netherlands needed that.
length ball on the legs, tom cooper goes back and drives it to long on again
more runs down the ground. this is hit past the bowler and long on comes around to clean up
bit quicker length ball, driven on the up to long on

nicely flighted again, ben cooper drives to long on
floated up on off stump, driven straight for a -999
yorker again, williams gets an edge to it, but a diving barresi can't stop it
yorker again, but williams digs it -999 well, wide of long on for another couple

yorker again, driven to mid off for -999

he's got the big -999! van der gugten has been terrific in this match and he's delivered the -999 of the zimababwe captain, with some help from borren at cover. taylor backed -999 and tried to lift it over the covers, but borren leaps and pulls it down -999-handed to breathe new life into his team's hopes.
length on the stumps, taylor keeps strike by blocking it into the off side and calling williams through
full on the legs, taylor places it well behind square on the leg side, so there's enough time for -999

so close to finding the man, but taylor doesn't connect well enough. he slogs across the line as malik sends down a length ball on the pads. taylor gets it high on the bat and the advancing sweeper can't quite get there. batsmen get -999
length ball outside off stump, williams knocks it down to long off
full on the toes, taylor chips it to long on for a -999
wide down the leg side. always a danger with this plan of stacking the boundaries on the on side
length ball on the legs, taylor just gently taps it to square leg and there's enough time for -999,as the fielders have to run in from the fence
full on the pads again, worked to fine leg

quick -999. short ball outside off, a slower -999 -999 think, and though taylor hits it straight to backward point, his partner wants a run. taylor puts in a dive at the other end, but probably would have been ok
attempted yorker, but masakadza comes down the pitch, turns it into a full toss and whips it -999 to deep midwicket
fired in full at the stumps, taylor opens the face and finds a gap in the cover region

full on the toes, knocked to long on for a -999
full on off stump, driven far enough -999 from mid off to allow a -999
yorker on off stump, masakadza blocks it back to the bowler
length on off stump, a thick inside edge squirts to square leg and there's a -999 on offer
full on the pads, taylor turns it behind square on the leg side and fine leg and deep square leg link up nicely to keep it to -999
full on the stumps, taylor clips it to leg but finds short midwicket
short of a length just outside off stump, left alone
switches to a length ball and he makes room and looks to pull in front of square, slaps it straight to long-on
rightfully put -999, this was a friendly full toss outside off and he smashes it over extra cover, beats the fielder in the deep
good yorker, just wide of the off stump and he made room and failed to get bat on it
makes room to a fuller delivery and he can't get it past cover

a low full toss wide outside the off stump and he mistimes it to the off side
biffed straight back to the bowler and good reflexes by o'brien, this was a length ball and anwar looked to pull, instead flat-batted it back to the bowler
yet another full toss and it's only a -999, flicked to deep square leg
gets -999 with a full toss as anwar can only find long-off
makes room and carves it over point, didn't time it well
he bowled this full and wide outside off, khurram makes too much room and has to really reach for that, outside edge to third man
slower ball and he forces it down to long-on

he drifts a bit too wide down the leg side
a bit too straight and he clips it straight to midwicket
keeps it outside off and he dabs it down to third man
fullish outside off and he pushes it wide of mid-off
keeps it straight again  and anwar can only push it back to the bowler
tucks him up for room and he defends
there's a direct hit at the striker's end, dabbed towards third man and he sets off, anwar grounds his bat and he's safe
a bit too straight and he flicks it wide of midwicket
this was a slower ball outside off and dabbed towards third man
he goes back and works it to the on side
hits his pads and rolls -999 to the on side

that's -999 for the over! another soft dismissal, stirling tosses it up from round the -999, patil went down the pitch and looked to flick it over midwicket, no elevation at all and an easy catch for porterfield at short midwicket
continues round the -999, he gets forward and defends
that was easy! stirling tossed that up outside off and dropped it short, tempted amjad to go for the airy cut, catching practice to short third man, the bowling change works
slapped -999! this was hammered in short, porterfield stood tall and slapped that high and long over deep midwicket
an overthrow! this was tucked towards midwicket and porterfield was off the crease and had to hurry back to beat the throw, the fielder backing up couldn't collect cleanly
the shorter -999 this time and he swivels and looks to pull to fine leg but that goes off the glove
fuller delivery and he makes room and drills it down to long-off
this -999 skidded through and he made a hint of room and dabbed it towards point
flatter -999 and he flicks it to square leg
comes forward and drives to mid-off
this time joyce comes down the track and gets to the pitch of it and chips it wide of long-on, good placement
flat -999! there were cries of 'catch it' after the ball sped off the bat but the fielder at deep midwicket could only watch, tossed up and he gets on his knee and slogs, clean hit
stays back and punches it to the off side
porterfield looks to play the reverse sweep, the ball hits his pad, there's an appeal but the ball pitched outside leg
this was pitched up outside off and he gets forward and scoops it over cover, it was too wide outside off
bowls it on the stumps and he checks his shot
shorter and he defends this high on the bat, porterfield runs and heads back
awesome back foot punch, this was a length ball, moved -999 and he had the room to stand tall and punch it wide of point and cover, stand and deliver
he drifts wide down the leg side, looks to tuck it -999
that hurried on to him, he was too early on the pull and the ball struck his elbow and dropped to the off side
good length on middle and off and tucked to the on side
they will take whatever brings them some runs! the batsman looks to swing this length delivery across the line but gets a thick inside edge down to fine leg
slower delivery on the pads, the batsman looks to heave it to the leg side, but misses it and gets hit on the pads
another -999 goes down! or does it! it is a quick short delivery that flies past the outside edge to the keeper, who goes up immediately. shapoor joins in a little later but aleem dar is unmoved..

another -999 down! shapoor got taken for runs off the fuller -999, but his short delivery does the job. the batsman veers -999 to the leg side to smash it over the off, but gets a thick top edge that lobs up for the keeper
murdered down the ground! wow, what a shot this -999 is! it was an attempted yorker gone wrong, but the batsman finds enough space to get under it hammer it over the umpire's head..

that is the end of khakurel's fantastic effort! he looks to heave the length delivery to the deep midwicket boundary but gets more height than length on that.. ashgar stanikzai does very well to run back from midwicket and grab that comfortably in the end
another boundary! well done khakurel, who gets to his half-century, with a sliced boundary through backward point. the floodgates have opened for nepal.

another attempted slower ball, but this is a full toss that the batsman drags straight to midwicket! could have gone anywhere really. but he is also struggling to complete the run here. just makes it in time, the replays show
this -999 is a good slower ball, right in the block hole. the batsman does well to jam it -999 back down the pitch
another slower delivery, this time the batsman squeezes it down to third man

the mid-off fielder is up and nepal take advantage! this was a slightly slower ball but the batsman spotted that and lifts it over the infield. it just beats the mid-off fielder but this outfield is quick enough to take it to the boundary
he makes room and slices the short of length delivery over point for another couple of runs
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
quicker delivery outside off, it should have been hit. but this -999 is outside the wide marker. nepal wouldn't mind
this -999 is fortunate! he gets a thick outside edge that just evades the diving gully fielder and runs down the boundary
finally -999 ends up over the boundary! he moves across to the off side and gets a short ball to boot. he whacks it really hard over the short fine leg fielder and that goes all the way
again, tries to hard to whack it down the ground, but only hits it straight to long on
high full toss outside off, the batsman misses -999 on some free runs as he gets a thick outside edge to short third man.. he was looking to hit it through cover
flatter outside off, there is no turn so the batsman manages to chip it over extra cover for a couple of runs
tossed up and it's almost a yorker, the batsman digs it -999 back to shenwari

wow! he is keen to find that extra cover boundary. this -999 is over the field, only just though. but this is well hit, as he went along with the spin

this is a poor shot! he looks to hoick the flatter delivery agains the spin and gets completly beaten
beautifully driven through extra cover! the infield is crowded but malla takes advantage of a full and flighted delivery by driving it expertly through the gap
it's a play and a miss and it gives nepal a wonderful win against arch-rivals afghanistan - their first against the opposition in t20s

malla, at long on, corrects his last -999 mistakes and finally takes a catch. it's a simple chance for the fielder as stanikzai lofts the full toss straight down the ground. that shot lacked punch. that's also the end of line for afghanistan
this -999 is brilliantly hit in the same gap at wide long on! the batsman waits on the back foot and pulls it right in the gap this time.. no chance for that fielder from long on to cut this off
swings it across the line and gets an inside edge to midwicket and they come back for the second

this is stupid from the fielder! he gets a redemption chance as the batsman repeats the shot - it's almost an action replay. all the fielder has to do is watch the bounce and exactly like the previous delivery, he is not able to keep it in

lovely yorker! this -999 misses everything. the batsman heaved at it but it slipped under the bat and somehow missed the off stump too

this -999 just beats regmi at backward point! it was another good delivery on off, the batsman ended up slicing it behind point.. and regmi, if he was -999 inches taller, would have got this -999 easily. -999 fielder converge near the boundary and manage to keep it in
another -999 right at the base of the stumps, not much room to get under it. but asghar hits it firmly down to long off and comes back for a second as the fielder was touch slow
another good delivery! it's full and it's headed on the middle, the batsman punches it down to long on for a -999
what a good yorker that is! nothing much the batsman could do with it, he digs it -999 back down the pitch
a good over this -999! he bowls a quicker delivery that is defended back to the bowler.
comes down the pitch and defends the flighted delivery to the leg side
loopy and full outside off, the batsman dabs it to midwicket for a -999
a nudge to short fine leg brings them a quick -999
no room on this -999, the batsman punches it straight down the ground to long on for a -999
bowls a skiddy delivery that the batsman punches to cover off the back foot

stays in the crease and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man

towards midwicket for -999 more to end the over

short of length ball well outside off, spinning -999, steered towards backward point, where there's a diving stop

tapped towards cover for a -999

shakib once again skips down the track, moves -999 from leg as well, then thrashes the ball through cover for -999

bowled 'im! that's how you respond to being hit for fours, anamul is walking back to the pavilion, he was looking to play through the off side once more, he inside-edges it and loses his stump

-999 in the first over for tanwir, hong kong fans will be ecstatic, as will nepal fans, sabbir rehman doesn't last long, he's trapped lbw and this is a dream start for hong kong, it was a short of length ball angling in from outside off, strikes him in front of middle and that was going on take leg stump
beaten by the -999 movememnt here, squares up the batsman, superb start from tanwir

moving -999 outside off and that's left alone

clipped to square leg for a -999 to end the over

just outside off, blocked back towards the bowler

big shout for leg before, but zimbabwe have their man off a run--999, a second -999. good length ball turns off the pitch as mustafa lunges forward and outside off. he was hit in line, but it would have missed leg. the appeal had made mustafa forget this had gone straight to short fine leg
tossed up and angled across him, khurram prefers to stay back and dab to point

shortened his length considerable there and khurram pulls strongly to deep square leg. they jog along thinking it was a boundary, but have to motor for the second. relay throw from the deep and had there been a direct hit, it might well have been -999. instead raza gives -999 -999 overthrows
races down the track but he hasn't struck it as well as he would want to. falls -999-bounce to long-on.
lovely flight on this -999 as he targets middle stump. defended
and more turn. tossed up on off stump and he tickles it towards short fine leg.

that's a ripper! he's found the perfect length with this, there was good flight, the ball was drifting in as well which meant the batsman had to play. but once it pitched, there was appreciable turn and it beat the outside edge by a big margin
just a touch short and he rocks back and cuts to the sweeper
loopy legspinner, driven into the covers

full and flat, but khurram preferred to wait on the back foot. ended up doing too much of that as he is hurried into playing a shot. gets an inside edge to the right of the keeper
darted in on middle and leg and he sweeps it down to deep square leg

shortish with a hint of room outside off and he punches off the back foot. goes straight to cover, but he fumbles it. taylor's not going to be pleased. he's made himself clear about wanting to field a lot better than they've been doing

tossed up on leg stump, chipped over the leg side and a little wide of long-on

goes on with the arm as this is flatter on middle and leg. tucked towards square leg

moves outside leg and he's lofted this just about over the man at long-on. rather short boundary there as he goes through with the shot. didn't get all of it, but gets the benefit for his recklessness

full and flighted, the batsman flicks it to deep midwicket

-999, another chance! another drop! the batsman gets a thick outside edge and ziaur at point is no tamim - he tries to leap for an over head chance, but is not able to complete that.. still a good effort. what more, they pick up a bonus -999 as the batsmen look for a non-existent third.
excellent over till now! this -999 is a nice legcutter that beats the bat

whoaa tamim! this is a stunner at short third man! bravo looks to drive this through extra cover, gets a thick outside edge and tamim - he flies to his right and plucks this from thin air. what a catch that -999 - great -999-hander -- it was high too! what a contrasting day. bravo falls for a first-baller again.
he swings and misses.. a wonderful legcutted that beats the outside edge as sammy swings his bat

another -999 goes down! russell throws his bat at this slower -999 and sends this miles high towards long off, where shakib - who is no mahmudullah - settles under it and makes sure he gobbles it up...

the catch is taken! gazi at extra cover makes up for mahmudullah's mistakes by taking a simple chance. it was a touch slower outside off and samuels, who struggled today too, punches it straight to the fielder
short ball, gets the top edge, but this -999 sails over the keeper's head.. this is cruel for ziaur..he has bowled a good over, but he has been hit for -999 boundaries

another drop by mahmudullah at long-off! what's going on.. this was a difficult chance though. sammy drives this inside -999 towards wide long off, but the fielder got both hands to it.. pushes it to the boundary to rub salt on his own wounds

another poor effort by the fielder! it's mahmudullah, who waits for this lofted drive at long-off - it's an overhead effort - and it goes through his hand .. sub-standard fielding this.. it drops inside the boundary..
full and wide outside off, the batsman squeezes it to short third man where a misfield allows for a -999

this could have been a run -999! the batsman pushed the full ball straight to short third man and called for a -999. he was going to be well short, but the bowler, who was not close to the stumps, misses it at close range.. what more, he has overstepped too

well judged by tamim at long off! this is a good take. on another day, this would have sailed into the stands, but gayle gets under it and hits it as far as the boundary. tamim takes an overhead catch, then realises the momentum is taking him over the rope, so lobs the ball up, goes -999, comes back, and completes the catch. end of a painful innings from gayle
pushed quicker wide outside off and the batsman misses the intended drive.. excellent over from shakib
full and wide, another good delivery! samuels stretches -999 and blocks it to off
a good -999 from shakib! in the blockhole and gayle can only dig it -999 to long on

flatter delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a quick -999
he comes round the -999 and bowls a flatter delivery, the batsman easily pushes it to long on for a -999
allows this -999 to spin -999, then crunches it to deep cover for a -999
this is poor bowling! it's flighted and going down the leg side, smith just helps it along and beats the short fine leg easily.. he has been sweeping so well, so that's not the line to bowl

he is beaten by the slower ball completely! looks to hoick the length delivery to the leg side, but it stays a touch low and strikes him on the pads.. mashrafe asks a question but that would have just gone over

fuller delivery outside off, it's driven to deep cover

again outside off and he drives off the backfoot to cover
lands on a good length outside off, dippenaar stands and defends
fuller outside off and he drives nicely to murali at mid-off and gets a quick run
streaky shot, gibbs turns that off the pads in the air over midwicket for -999, ball came onto him earlier there
good length ball on the stumps, defended to point
drifts down the pads and stands up a little, dippenaar easily flicks that down to malinga at deep backward square leg
on the leg and middle, tucked past square-leg
classy square-drive. slightly short of length and outside the off stump, dilshan whiplashed it past backward point
huh... vaas really goes in search of that almost wide delivery outside the off stump. throws his bat at a fullish delivery, outside edge takes it to thirdman
pushed across vaas who pushes at it, gets an inside edge that takes the ball to the on side&
hit straight to mid-off and they run with the stroke. vaas will be on strike now.
slanted across again but this time well outside the off stump, left alone
full and pushed across, vaas goes back and across to push it to mid-off. the length demanded that he be on his front foot but vaas is hanging back at his crease
beaten! slanted outside off, vaas pushes inside the line.

and then there were -999. maharoof' lack of footwork does him in. on a driveable length outside the off stump, maharoof drives, his feet sticking adhesively to the crease, and doesn't lean onto his drive, gets an outside edge and is swallowed by smith in the slips.
banged in short and pulled over the infield. didn't time it well though.
full and on the off, coming in a touch, maharoof has a waft at it, gets his bat down slightly outside the line and the ball rolls to the on side
length delivery on the off, coming in a touch, pushed to the on side
and again.
beaten outside off.  length delivery that held its line and maharoof ended up pushing inside the line
overpitched on the middle, driven to wide of mid-on
short of length outside off, pushed to point
middle and leg again, flicked down to dippenaar at backward square leg
drifts to leg and its flicked in the air past square leg down to peterson in the deep, who doesnt field cleanly and they get -999
moves into him from outside off, turned to midwicket with a call of 'no' back to dilshan
fuller and dilshan drives to kemp back at the circle at mid-off
lands outside edge, jayawardene manages to keep that down and gets -999 down to third man
good ball outside off stump forces jayawardene to play and miss, didnt move the feet at all

and he ends his spell as he started it, lands -999 on that sweep spot outside off stump and foxes the batsman into a false defence, ball narrowly misses kissing the outside edge of the bat, well bowled pollock
worked from middle and off to midwicket
lands outside off stump and draws the edge from a leaden-footed dilshan, but lands safely in front of smith at slip and down to third man, well bowled
nudged from off stump to wide of peterson at square leg for a -999
jags in a bit from outside off, jayawardene gets an inside edge onto the pads
good length on the stumps, jayawardene defends back to pollock

pollock strikes! good delivery on a sweet length outside off draws sangakkara into a tentative poke at that -999, and the slight deviation gets the faint edge, pollock leaps up in appeal but sangakkara's already turned for the pavilion, what a fine strike from the veteran bowler
slightly short of a good length, punched off the backfoot to mid-off
full outside off stump, defended to ab de villiers at cover
this time, however, he times his flick better and gets -999 down to deep fine leg
again middle and leg and moving down, jayawardene tries to work that to square leg but cant time it well, ball pops off the pad and rolls close to the stumps, pushed -999 by the batsman
fuller on middle and leg, cant work that -999
tight stuff from ntini, forces tharanga to defend back to him
short of a good length outside off stump, pushed into the covers
lands on middle and leg and catches tharanga high on the right thigh
this -999 kicks from middle and off and surprises tharanga
lands on a good length and moves in, but he has time to push that into the covers
fuller on this occasion, and jayasuriya works that from off stump all the way past kemp at mid-on for -999, thought about the third but refrained
lands on middle and off, no room to move whatsoever, jayasuriya defends to cover
ohhhh! pollock lands this -999 a fine length and beats jayasuriya's forward prod by a whisker
lands on a good length and nips into the upper thigh region
full outside off stump, jayasuriya tries to cream that past cover but gets an inside edge
another good ball, lands on middle and off and swings past the bat, tickles the edge but lands in front of boucher
excellent delivery, lands seam-up outside off stump and draws tharanga into the defensive stroke and then nips past the outside edge
good length delivery on off stump, jayasuriya squeezes that past gibbs' right for -999 down to third man
shorter this time, jayasuriya chops that to cover on the bounce
fullish outside off stump and jayasuriya gets on top of that ball, defends to cover
slashed in the air down to third man
back to tip and run. pakistan seem content to allow that at this stage
short but a lovely change of pace and styris through the shot and almost taking a fresh guard by the time the ball loops past him
tip and run into the covers
very short, taken high above his head by  akmal and after a long delay benson signals a wide

styris launches another -999 over the top and into space at long on
big swing but styris misses what would have been a heave to end all heaves
oram misses a swipe but there is still a leg bye as it bobbles off his pads
a second dot ball will cheer up pakistan
afridi appeals but nothing doing
lovely back-foot drive, waited for it and slammed it through the covers. seven balls, 19 runs
good line, length and turn to end the over
blocked with accompanying chirrups
no run, lots of noise from the keeper and bowler nevertheless
paddled to the man on the cover boundary and both fielder and batsmen amble through
steered into the covers
blocked with no fuss
still too much width, dabbed down to third man
better delivery this time
ambitious stroke, down for the sweep and attempts to flick an off-stump ball over his shoulder. doesn't connect, but that'll make the bowler think
poor bowling from malik, drifting onto the pads
pakistan are losing the plot a bit here. too short again, this time from malik, and styris cashes in with a thumping cut through point
and the end of a fine over for new zealand, as afridi drifts onto the pads and watches aghast as the ball whistles down to the fine-leg boundary
more runs now as fleming takes the attack to afridi, and wins.
lovely strike - too short again, and effortlessly cut behind square for another -999 through third man
tucked up on leg-stump
dropped into the off side, finds the gap and good running
too short and smeared into the leg-side. fielded with a tumble on the boundary's edge
driven into the covers
a bit of a shimmy at the crease, and that's well played in the end, finding space on the off side
new zealand are looking to dominate afridi, but he's bowling cleverly so far
more belligerent strokeplay, and this time there's a -999 into the covers
bit of a whoosh outside off stump, but finds nothing but air
scampered -999, but makes his ground comfortably

that's a beautiful shot to bring up the drinks break. fuller and swinging, and perfectly timed through the leg-side. bisects the -999 fielders converging at midwicket, and beats them both comfortably. well played
nothing doing this time
slower delivery - that was a 62mph off-cutter, but well picked and tucked -999 for a couple
short of a length, and pushed back onto the stumps
that's much better, hounding the top of off stump, but squeezed -999 for a -999
poor ball - too much width, and over-steps as well
a lot rests on new zealand's captain ... as ever
punched to point. a good over from iftikhar
driven with more power, whipping the ball from off stump to mid on
fleming turned square as he pushes the ball back up the pitch
drive-push to mid off, no power in it
paddled -999 on the leg side into  space
steered to fine leg
blocked to end the over

driven to extra cover, an utter mix-up between the batsmen after a diving stop by farhat  at point and akmal had to hit the stumps from about -999 yards -999 with styris floundering to get back ... and missed
slightly wider and styris opts to leave it alone
syris shapes to flat-bat a short and wide ball through the covers but misses
full, driven to extra over
short, seams back in and styris plays it off the back foot
-999-quarter controlled shot off the edge down to third man where it is well stopped
and as if to prove me utterly wrong, iftikhar strays to leg and fleming flicks it into the gap between midwicket and mid on
fleming being tied down by some tight bowling. again, he can do no more than pat this into the off-side ring
slightly shorter and played off the back foot to cover
turned straight to midwicket
patted into the covers
driven with some power but straight to mid off
worked with the angle behind square and long leg has a lot of ground to make up

angled behind square on the off
lovely ball that leaves fleming in the air as he gropes for it

leg-side, but can't middle an attempted flick
forcing shot off the back foot, slightly streaky as the ball flies through the vacant gully region. cleaned up on the boundary's edge

shorter and beaten. looked like an open face and an attempted steer to third man

short and leg-side, played down off the hips
left alone, a decent end to a poor over

left alone outside off stump
driven to mid on

neat drive through the covers, well timed and all along the ground. that underlined the difference that getting your feet in the right place makes

short and swished into the leg side. pakistan need boundaries, urgently

intended loop over extra cover
angled again but this time with less power and squarer

pushed through and shoaib slightly hurries as he drives it to long on
neatly steered square on the off and again placement means they can run -999 to the man in the deep

better line
wide and goes on with the arm as yousuf stretches to try to drive. the ball glistens in the lights, showing that the outfield is damp

tight bowling and a chorus of encouragement comes form almost every new zealand fielder

edged with uncertainty through third slip

wide and left alone
afridi forced to play from the off

unwinds at 77mph, on the button and played into the covers

another boundary and that's a great little dinky back-cut - too short from franklin, you can't put it there at his pace, and the ball races -999 to the fence

onto the back foot, can't put it -999. tight stuff from the kiwis here

excellent delivery to finish as this -999 cuts back into the batsman, but there's a squirted -999 available on the leg side. good over

on off stump again, and pushed into the covers. probing stuff

in and -999. west indies are not even referring them. afridi sends down a trademark thunderbolt, meaner, faster, straighter and bouncier than the previous -999. in less than a twinkling, it was across the turf, skidding past thomas' backfoot defensive, pinning him in front of middle and leg. -999 can't believe they did not refer it, might have been worth a try. afridi on a hat-trick.
